max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6031524514155047762\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_59M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529850549062#c6031524514155047762\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 7:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_59MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nBecause the bad actor is in control of a considerable amount of hashing power (more than 50%) they will be able to broadcast their private version of the blockchain and form blocks faster than the rest of the network, which means that they will be able to form a longer blockchain. Because of the longest chain rule, it is generally regarded that the longest blockchain is the valid chain to mine upon.<br />\n<br />\nAs a result, the rest of the miners on the network will be forced to switch to the longer chain. The previously private version of the blockchain is now considered to be the correct one, and all transactions that were not included on this chain are reversed.<br />\n<br />\nThe bad actor also retains his bitcoins as he did not include those spent transactions on this version of the blockchain, meaning that those funds are capable of being spent again.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/blockchain-bitcoin-must-be-kicked-out.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_60b+seedNNWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_60b+seedNNWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6090679703163762631\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_167M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1530695355764#c6090679703163762631\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 4, 2018 at 2:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_167MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.zeebiz.com/india/news-bitcoin-believer-cryptocurrencies-banned-in-india-sc-hammers-in-last-nail-in-coffin-53798<br />\n<br />\nSUPREME COURT HAS NO SUCH POWERS TO OVERTURN A RBI BAN ON CRYPTO CURRENCY..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE A LAW MINISTER WHO DOES NOT KNOW HIS JOB... RAVI SHANKAR PRASAD EXISTS TO GIVE MODI AN ENDLESS EGO MASSAGE..<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_167BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_164T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_164TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_164TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_164TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_164TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_164TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_164TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_164TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_164TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_164B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5208554012934115356\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_164M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1530695682849#c5208554012934115356\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 4, 2018 at 2:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_164MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/blockchain-bitcoin-must-be-kicked-out.html<br />\n<br />\nThe price of bitcoin has fallen roughly 70 percent since its record high near $20,000 last year. The big plunge in bitcoin's price has has drawn comparisons with the Nasdaq's sharp fall in 2000 and the failure of many cryptocurrencies has been likened to some of the companies that crashed during the dotcom boom.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA MUST BAN BITCOIN.. ITS REAL WORTH IS ZERO..<br />\n<br />\nOver 800 cryptocurrencies are now dead and worth less than one cent.<br />\n<br />\nThere has been an explosion in ICOs. Companies raised $3.8 billion via ICOs in 2017, but in 2018 so far, this number has already shot up to $11.9 billion.. However, hundreds of these projects are now dead because they were scams<br />\n<br />\nSwirlds has started a new company, called the Hedera Hashgraph Platform, which will solely focus on creating a distributed ledger using the Hashgraph algorithm. They will launch of their own cryptocurrency.<br />\n<br />\nPoW consensus mechanism used in cryptocoins like Bitcoin and other blockchains is fundamentally flawed because its inefficiency. As a solution, Hashgraph operates on a self-designed voting algorithm combined with the \u201cgossip about gossip\u201d protocol.<br />\n<br />\nThrough the combination of these two mechanisms, consensus is achieved extremely fast, secure and fairly distributed. Security is achieved through their asynchronous Byzantine fault tolerance protocol.<br />\n<br />\nsuperior alternative to blockchain by being faster, fairer, and more secure. It has the ability to process hundreds of thousands of transactions per second. By comparison, Bitcoin typically processes less than 10 transactions per second, and Ethereum usually processes less than 25.<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph is an algorithm. There is no company called hashgraph, but we have two companies that use that algorithm. The first one was Swirlds, which was incorporated back in 2015.<br />\n<br />\nedera Hashgraph is a separate org.<br />\n<br />\nHedera Hashgraph is the company chartered with creating the public infrastructure built on the hashgraph algorithm.<br />\n<br />\nBlockchain as a term refers to two things: a data structure (a chain of blocks of transactions) and a consensus algorithm (a way for the community to come to agreement about which block goes on top of the chain).<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph is different as it\u2019s not a chain, but a graph. So, each member of the community on hashgraph doesn\u2019t have to wait to put in blocks. Individuals just submit these transactions to the network whenever they want, without anything slowing them down.<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph represents this data structure (a graph that\u2019s cryptographically secure using hashes) and consensus algorithm (a way for the community to put transactions in order so that we all have a common understanding of the order).<br />\n<br />\nBlockchain as a technology will diminish. Blockchain, along with the way that it\u2019s implemented using proof of work with bitcoin and the current version of Ethereum, is on its way out and will ultimately be replaced.<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph is a blockchain-alternative that achieves high scalability without sacrificing securityHashgraph makes use of \u201cAsynchronous Byzantine Fault Tolerance (BFT)\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph uses two unique techniques \u2018Gossip about Gossip\u2019 and \u2018Virtual Voting\u2019 to achieve a fast, secure, and fair consensus.<br />\n<br />\n\u2018Gossip\u2019 is a commonly used term in computer science, which can be defined as calling any random node and telling that node everything you know, that it doesn\u2019t already know. In distributed ledger technologies (DLTs), transactions have to be broadcast to every node across the network.<br />\n<br />\nA gossip protocol can achieve this transfer of information incredibly quickly. \u2018Gossip about Gossip\u2019 refers to attaching a small additional amount of information to this Gossip/transaction payload, which are two hashes containing the last two people talked to. Using this information, a Hashgraph can be built and constantly updated as more information is gossiped by each node.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_164MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_164BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_164B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_165B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c705300927272957852\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_165M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1530695922724#c705300927272957852\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 4, 2018 at 2:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_165MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUE FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph is the only DLT in use today that represents Asynchronous Byzantine Fault Tolerance. This is the strongest form of security for a distributed system. This means that no single member (or small group of members) can prevent the community from reaching a consensus, nor can they change the consensus once it has been reached. Moreover, each member will eventually reach a point where they know for sure that they have reached consensus.<br />\n<br />\nOther blockchains use a weaker version of Byzantine Fault Tolerance. When a \u2018double spend\u2019 occurs, you have to wait for the network to \u201cbust\u201d it. However, blockchain does not have a mathematical guarantee of a Byzantine agreement, leaving you behind with an \u2018unconfirmed\u2019 status, and possibly, the money you were paid may disappear as it will remain \u2018unconfirmed\u2019 for ever.<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph is fair in that it serializes all transactions with cryptographic timestamping, unlike in a blockchain where miners determine the order at which transactions are placed within each block. The transaction order can be extremely important, for instance, consider purchasing the same crypto asset where the first buyer will likely get a cheaper price.<br />\n<br />\nA Hashgraph is basically a history of how the nodes have talked to one another. This is an unusual concept, but it allows networks to reach consensus very quickly and with strong mathematical proofs.<br />\n<br />\nIn proof-of-work blockchain, some blocks are mined and are later discarded. The efficiency is the fraction of the blocks that are not discarded. In hashgraph, every event that is gossiped to the community is kept, so the efficiency is 100%. No resources are ever wasted on discarded blocks, because there are no discarded blocks.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hedera hashgraph platform provides a new form of distributed consensus; a way for people who don't know or trust each other to securely collaborate and transact online without the need for a trusted intermediary.<br />\n<br />\nThe platform is lightning fast, provides the best level of security possible in a distributed consensus algorithm, is fair, and, unlike some blockchain-based platforms, doesn\u2019t require compute-heavy proof-of-work. Hedera enables and empowers developers to build an entirely new class of distributed applications never before possible.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hedera hashgraph platform uses a new kind of consensus mechanism, based on gossip about gossip and virtual voting. Previous generations of voting systems go back decades and achieve definitive consensus, but are very slow.<br />\n<br />\nHashgraph\u2019s innovation is in virtual voting, which gives you all the guarantees that voting has (which proof-of-work doesn't), but is incredibly efficient because we don\u2019t actually send any votes over the internet.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hedera hashgraph platform is based on a gossip protocol, in which the participants don\u2019t just gossip about transactions - they also gossip about gossip. By adding information about their previous gossip to every current gossip message, participants are able to jointly build a hashgraph reflecting the history of all of the gossip events.<br />\n<br />\nParticipants then analyze that shared history in order to determine a consensus timestamp for all transactions. The Byzantine agreement mechanism participants use is called virtual voting.<br />\n<br />\nThe hashgraph algorithm is highly decentralized - there are no leaders, CHOOTIYA MINERS , coordinators or block producers with special influence towards consensus. Separately, the Hedera governance model is also decentralized.<br />\n<br />\nAll Governing Members of the Hedera Hashgraph Council will have equal voting rights and all except Swirlds, Inc. will be limited to a three year term with a limit of two consecutive terms. Swirlds, Inc., the owners and licensor of the hashgraph technology, will retain a permanent seat on the council. The council membership will be decentralized across sector and region - with no one vertical or country having undue representation.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_165MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_165BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_165B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_166B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3227476173278233209\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_166M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1530695986642#c3227476173278233209\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 4, 2018 at 2:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_166MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nThe highly distributed network will eventually expand to millions of nodes voting on the order of transactions across at least five continents. This separation of governance from consensus is designed to ensure continued decentralization over time.<br />\n<br />\nHedera\u2019s governance terms ensure no single member will have control, and no small group of members will have undue influence over the body as a whole. When it comes to consensus, the network will expand to millions of nodes, all of which will vote on consensus.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hedera hashgraph codebase will be governed by the Hedera Hashgraph Council, The codebase will be open review, meaning that anyone will be able to read the source code, recompile it, and verify that it is correct. So the council cannot change the codebase without everyone seeing those changes. This ensures transparency.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodes that the Hedera hashgraph council members run will have no special role in consensus - their influence, like all others, will be weighted only by stake.<br />\n<br />\nIn addition, Hedera hashgraph is fair because there is no leader or miner given special permissions for determining the consensus timestamp assigned to a transaction. Instead, the consensus timestamps for transactions are calculated via a voting process in which the nodes collectively and democratically establish the consensus.<br />\n<br />\nHedera is fundamentally fair because no individual can stop a transaction from entering the system, or even delay it very much. If one (or a few) malicious nodes attempt to prevent a given transaction from being delivered to the rest of the community, and so be added into consensus, then the random nature of the gossip protocol will ensure that the transaction flows around that blockage.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a transaction is given a consensus timestamp, the community as a whole generates the timestamp. No single node is allowed to generate it by itself. The hashgraph shows the time at which each node first received the transaction.<br />\n<br />\nThe consensus timestamp is defined to be the median of those different times. Virtual voting is the Byzantine agreement mechanism that determines which nodes contribute a time to the median calculation.<br />\n<br />\nIf more than 2/3 of participating nodes are honest and have reliable clocks on their computers, then the timestamp itself will be honest and reliable, because it is generated by an honest and reliable node, or falls between two times that were generated by honest and reliable nodes.<br />\n<br />\nIn Hedera hashgraph's proxy staking system, the criteria is that there be nodes with more than 2/3 of the stake rather than more than 2/3 of the nodes.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedF0qD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8113345352257430006\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_62M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2018 at 7:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_62MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain Saab crypto currency is taking shape again<br />\nhttps://www.forbes.com/sites/sarahhansen/2018/09/12/new-report-finance-execs-believe-cryptocurrency-is-here-to-stay/amp/?__twitter_impression=true</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_62BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_61TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_62b+seed_8QD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_61TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_61TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_61TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_62b+seed_8QD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_61B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2539686274569195795\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_61M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_20.html?showComment=1545489638586#c98106994362551386\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 22, 2018 at 8:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME--<br /><br />HOW DO JEWS IN ISRAEL GRAB LAND \"IRREVERSIBLY \" USING BLOCKCHAIN..<br /><br />WELL THE KOSHER DEEP STATE AND THE ROTHSCHILDs AGENCY UN IS INVOLVED IN IT..<br /><br />THE MASSACRE OF THE 43,000 PEASANT ARMY ( FIRST CRUSADE ) WAS TO DRAW THE TRAINED NOBILITY KNIGHTS INTO THE EVIL DESIGNS OF THE CATHOLIC POPE --TO DRIVE AWAY GREEK EASTERN ORTHODOX CHRISTIANITY FROM JERUSALEM..<br /><br />The question of landownership strikes at the core of the Israeli-Palestinian tug of war over Jerusalem. Israel captured East Jerusalem, whose holy sites include the Church of the Holy Sepulcher, Al-Aqsa Mosque and Western Wall, in 1967. But the Palestinians demand that part of the city as the capital of a future independent state.<br /><br />The land dispute saga began a decade ago at Jaffa Gate, the most prominent entrance to the Old City of Jerusalem, where throngs of pilgrims pass on their way to the city's most revered religious sites. Just inside the gate are two hotels run by Palestinian families but owned by the Greek Orthodox Church.<br /><br />The Greek Orthodox Patriarchate \u2014 the church leadership \u2014 was bribed to sell the hotels to Ateret Cohanim, a Jewish settler group that aims to buy up Palestinian-owned properties in strategic locations in Jerusalem to increase Jewish control in the contested city.<br /><br />Ateret Cohanim Is an Israeli Jewish organization with a yeshiva located in the Muslim Quarter of the Old City of Jerusalem. It works for the creation of a Jewish majority in the Old City and Arab neighborhoods in East Jerusalem by grabbing non-Jewish ands and regularizing it by blockchain, destroying original land documents ..<br /><br />The net effect of the Israeli seizure of land in East Jerusalem, which includes recent approval for an additional 9,000 housing units, and the West Bank is to promulgate a form of administrative ethnic cleansing. Palestinian families are being pushed off land they have owned for generations and evicted from their homes by Israeli authorities.<br /><br />EVIL Ateret Cohanim, collects funds from KOSHER DEEP STATE abroad, purchases Palestinian properties and pursues legal strategies to evict families that have long resided in East Jerusalem. Israel's judicial system and police, in violation of international law, facilitate and enforce these evictions and land seizures.<br /><br />Heavily armed JEWISH settlers carry out frequent unprovoked attacks and ad hoc raids and house evictions to supplement the terror imposed by the police and military. They are the civilian arm of the occupation.<br /><br />On 6 February,2017 the Israeli Knesset passed a law that retroactively legalises the seizure of private Palestinian land on which settlements have already been established. The law prevents Palestinian land owners from laying claim to their land if Israeli settlers are living on it, despite the fact that the settlers\u2019 presence in occupied territory is illegal under international law..<br /><br />This provided a foul basis for further retroactive legalization of land grabs and then regularizing it by blockchain.<br /><br />Fifty years of indifference from the international community ( in the vice grip of kosher DEEP STATE ) has only served to spur the Israeli government on in its expropriation of Palestinian land and expansion of illegal settlements..<br /><br />Ateret Cohanim and another organization, the Ir David Foundation, began to acquire land in Arab neighborhoods of East Jerusalem outside the Old City. Most of the properties belonged to the Greek Orthodox Church, in the Christian Quarter..<br /><br />American Friends of Ateret Cohanim, also known as Jerusalem Chai, was founded in New York City in 1987 to sponsor the illegal land grab.. Jerusalem Chai is a US NGO, with the purpose of fundraising for Ateret Cohanim's illegal land acquisitions in Israel..<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c98106994362551386-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6926814096944994113\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 48 hours of\npregnant silence , the entire top scientists of this planet told NASA to fuck off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NASA apologized and\nsaid \u201cWe are going back to the drawing board\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:--an hour-long\nDecember 2, 2010 NASA news conference were publicized and led to \"wild\nspeculations on the Web about extraterrestrial life\".[17] Wolfe-Simon was\nthe only one of the paper's authors at that news conference.[18] The news\nconference was promptly met with criticism by scientists and journalists.[19]\nIn the following month, Wolfe-Simon (and her co-authors and NASA) responded to\ncriticisms through an online FAQ and an exclusive interview with a Science\nreporter, but also announced they would not respond further outside scientific\npeer-review.[20][21] Wolfe-Simon left USGS in May 2011.[22] Wolfe-Simon\nmaintains she did not leave voluntarily, but was \"effectively\nevicted\" from the USGS group.[23]UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
