text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gZleWw3VbFw/WsOKG7QEqtI/AAAAAAABaJM/Mh5_Q-ARNnwDQtxbVi7vnXmUEjVJomkWgCLcBGAs/s1600/gujar3ati-women-dancing-with-a-kalash-on-their-head-BY9G0M.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"580\" data-original-width=\"341\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gZleWw3VbFw/WsOKG7QEqtI/AAAAAAABaJM/Mh5_Q-ARNnwDQtxbVi7vnXmUEjVJomkWgCLcBGAs/s400/gujar3ati-women-dancing-with-a-kalash-on-their-head-BY9G0M.jpg\" width=\"235\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE BELOW IS BANNED IN SANATANA DHARMA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nDc2c64P3IY/WsOIoKRuIOI/AAAAAAABaI0/xuODA2LXVUk0dw-oKOP92Tv-5rid52xHQCLcBGAs/s1600/gudiW-padwa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"415\" data-original-width=\"700\" height=\"378\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nDc2c64P3IY/WsOIoKRuIOI/AAAAAAABaI0/xuODA2LXVUk0dw-oKOP92Tv-5rid52xHQCLcBGAs/s640/gudiW-padwa.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">STUPID NORTH INDIANS --&nbsp; KICKING PROSPERITY,&nbsp; &nbsp;WORSHIPING WHITE STATUES,&nbsp; MARRYING AT NIGHT</span>&nbsp;, <span style=\"color: blue;\">PIERCING IDA NOSTRIL</span>, <span style=\"color: blue;\">FASTING ON WRONG DATES&nbsp;</span> --<span style=\"color: red;\">THE LEAST I SAY THE BETTER</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mVJ9OwlQYFE/WsOI_lxf93I/AAAAAAABaI8/8x4pqcyPaE44n7Cu88SAi6JRycjtLTn5QCLcBGAs/s1600/444maxresdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"1280\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mVJ9OwlQYFE/WsOI_lxf93I/AAAAAAABaI8/8x4pqcyPaE44n7Cu88SAi6JRycjtLTn5QCLcBGAs/s640/444maxresdefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eggs and sperm\n(together known as germ cells, or gametes) are biologically unique,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">fundamentally different\nfrom other cells in the body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gametes contain only one half of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">the genetic material\nrelative to all other cells, since their role is to combine with a gamete&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">of the opposite sex\n(via fertilization) to re-assemble a full genetic complement for a new&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">human being.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gametes themselves are\ncreated via a process of cell division that results in a splitting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">of the genetic\nmaterial, called meiosis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike sperm cells, which are produced on an&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ongoing basis\nthroughout a man\u2019s life, eggs are formed during a process of meiosis that\u2019s&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">initiated before birth\nand is completed for each egg, one by one, at the time the eggs are&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ovulated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This happens\nthroughout the woman\u2019s reproductive life\u2014sometimes as many<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">as 50 years after the\neggs were first created!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sexual reproduction is\nable to generate genetic variation in offspring because the process of meiosis\nrandomly shuffles genes across chromosomes and then randomly separates half of\nthose chromosomes into each gamete.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two gametes then randomly fuse to form\na new organism. Genetic variation is one of the keys to evolutionary fitness. This\nis made possible because reproductive cells undergo meiosis, which is the\nprocess in which one cell divides twice to produce four sperm or four eggs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early on in meiosis,\nduring prophase I, homologous chromosomes pair up. Homologous chromosomes are\nones that have similar genes: one chromosome came from the mother and one came\nfrom the father.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During meiosis, they look for each other and stick together\nlength-wise. During this time, they exchange parts of their arms with each\nother, like combing two deck of cards, shuffling, and then equally separating\nthe two decks.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xOvnSxRs3Z8/WsPRaFb5XaI/AAAAAAABaJc/7ohtEDx6qWEYqUgZjLtJd0QZSMDK4XgowCLcBGAs/s1600/CQrossing-over%252BMeiosis_%252BIn%252Bhumans%252C%252Bcrossing-over%252Band%252Bindependent%252Bassortment%252Blead%252Bto%252Bover%252B1%252Btrillion%252Bpossible%252Bunique%252Bgametes..jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"768\" data-original-width=\"1024\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xOvnSxRs3Z8/WsPRaFb5XaI/AAAAAAABaJc/7ohtEDx6qWEYqUgZjLtJd0QZSMDK4XgowCLcBGAs/s640/CQrossing-over%252BMeiosis_%252BIn%252Bhumans%252C%252Bcrossing-over%252Band%252Bindependent%252Bassortment%252Blead%252Bto%252Bover%252B1%252Btrillion%252Bpossible%252Bunique%252Bgametes..jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The result is that the paired homologous chromosomes now have\nregions of DNA that were formerly on the other chromosome. The second way that\nmeiosis generates genetic diversity is that each individual chromosome goes\ninto one of four different gametes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A gamete is a sperm or an egg cell. Meiosis\nin a normal human cell that has 46 chromosomes produces four gametes that each\nhas 23 chromosomes. This is possible because each of the 46 chromosomes had\nbeen copied (46 x 2 = 92) before meiosis split that one cell into four ( 92/4 =\n23).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZO3Edj_eqpQ/WsPSqrCLg5I/AAAAAAABaJ4/5SvuhAPCPz8yv59ylNPsyetaSbPfCT3dACLcBGAs/s1600/scWWan_201702271.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"450\" data-original-width=\"584\" height=\"493\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZO3Edj_eqpQ/WsPSqrCLg5I/AAAAAAABaJ4/5SvuhAPCPz8yv59ylNPsyetaSbPfCT3dACLcBGAs/s640/scWWan_201702271.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only did meiosis shuffle the homologous chromosomes through the cross\nover event described above, it then split the two pairs (2 x 2 = 4) of\nhomologous chromosomes that did \u201ccrossing over\u201d into four separate chromosomes.\nEach of these chromosomes goes into a separate gamete cell.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third way that\nmeiosis generates genetic variation happens after meiosis is done. In sexually\nreproducing organisms, such as humans, a sperm from the male must fertilize the\negg from the female.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PiH_CXWue6M/WsPR310GJrI/AAAAAAABaJg/ekquO0XEe5k6wfd799Mk5YvJPniGMXh0wCLcBGAs/s1600/2DXgaX9HXcAAbl4C.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"436\" data-original-width=\"815\" height=\"342\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PiH_CXWue6M/WsPR310GJrI/AAAAAAABaJg/ekquO0XEe5k6wfd799Mk5YvJPniGMXh0wCLcBGAs/s640/2DXgaX9HXcAAbl4C.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human males produce many sperm, each with 23 chromosomes\nthat have been shuffled, that have a unique combination of genes compared to\nthe many other sperm. The egg also have this shuffled genetic diversity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So\nwhen one unique sperm fuses with one unique egg, a cell with 46 chromosome\nforms. This cell has a combination of genes that is unique compared to the\nmother and father that produced the sperm and egg.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tW8yDm5Fu20/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/tW8yDm5Fu20?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The process of meiosis\nis imprecise, and errors in the splitting and distribution of the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">genetic material occur\nwith an increasing frequency as the egg (or more simply put, the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">woman herself) gets\nolder.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These errors in the distribution of genetic material are called&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">aneuploidy\u2014having too\nmuch or too little genetic material.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-B0I6z-ZEmqc/WsPSJQV6ItI/AAAAAAABaJo/2Yg5O6-YwLot5j3LhprYR6LIqglipDAqQCLcBGAs/s1600/mainO-qimg-880bda3eb0bd356e0ebb882359bab452.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"455\" data-original-width=\"602\" height=\"482\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-B0I6z-ZEmqc/WsPSJQV6ItI/AAAAAAABaJo/2Yg5O6-YwLot5j3LhprYR6LIqglipDAqQCLcBGAs/s640/mainO-qimg-880bda3eb0bd356e0ebb882359bab452.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women are naturally\nhormonally programmed to allow just one egg to grow, mature, and be released (\u201covulated\u201d)\neach month. That one egg represents the one chance for pregnancy that exists in\nthat particular menstrual cycle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s important to note that this \u201cone egg per\nmonth\u201d rule is true regardless of whether a woman is younger and/or has a very\nrobust egg supply, or is older and/or has a low egg supply.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without the\ninfluence of fertility medications, women routinely get one egg to work with\nevery month\u2014no more, no less. (This system starts to fail when the ovarian\nreserve is almost completely depleted, at which point the system of regular\novulation falters, leading to irregular menses).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s equally important\nto re-emphasize that any individual egg\u2014regardless of the age of the woman\u2014is\neither normal or abnormal; and a normal egg from a 40-year-old woman is\nexpected to perform similarly to a normal egg from a 25-year-old woman.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The difference\nbetween the egg quality of the 25-year-old vs the 40-year-old is just a matterof\nthe statistical likelihood of any given egg being normal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/EA0qxhR2oOk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/EA0qxhR2oOk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It might seem obvious,\nbut it is worth stating explicitly, that an abnormal egg does not provide the\npotential for conceiving a healthy pregnancy. So what happens to all the unhealthy\neggs?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Absence of pregnancy:\nFailure of fertilization\u2014or fertilization with failed implantation (attachment\nto the womb)\u2014both lead to absence of pregnancy. This represents the vast majority\nof unhealthy eggs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Miscarriage: In a\nminority of cases there will be successful implantation\u2014and therefore\npregnancy\u2014but shortly thereafter, programmed cessation of fetal development\nwill occur, clinically manifesting as miscarriage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Genetically abnormal\npregnancy: In the least common scenario, successful implantation and continued\ndevelopment of an abnormal fetus will occur, clinically manifesting as a\ngenetically abnormal pregnancy. The most common outcome of this is Down\nsyndrome (formally known as trisomy 21), in which there are three copies of chromosome\n#21 as opposed to the normal two.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ze_6VWwLtOE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ze_6VWwLtOE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, the chance of\nachieving pregnancy in any given month is directly and inextricably tied to the\nlikelihood that the one egg which is ovulated\u2014selected biologically at random\u2014will\nbe genetically normal.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the egg is\nabnormal, the most likely outcome will be absence of pregnancy (either from\nfailure to fertilize or failure to implant). It should be clear then that older\nwomen\u2014who have a higher percentage of abnormal eggs\u2014will have a decreased\nchance of pregnancy per month relative to a younger woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Miscarriages and\ngenetically abnormal pregnancies increase with age. The increasing percentage\nof abnormal eggs as a woman gets older, translating into an increasing\nlikelihood that the randomly selected \u201cegg of the month\u201d will be abnormal,\nleads to a higher likelihood that in the event pregnancy does occur, the outcome\nwill be a miscarriage or genetically abnormal pregnancy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While fertility\ntreatments can dramatically improve the chances for an infertile woman or\ncouple to conceive a child, with IVF being the most powerful fertility\ntreatment available, even IVF is not an effective treatment for infertility due\nto \u201creproductive aging.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">National statistics on\nall IVF performed in the US are tracked by the Centers for Disease Control and\nPrevention (CDC) as well as the Society for Assisted Reproductive Technology\n(SART), and the results are published annually online.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BEWARE :&nbsp; This data is slanted in favour of the\npowerful IVF lobby<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.sartcorsonline.com/rptCSR_PublicMultYear.aspx\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.sartcorsonline.com/rptCSR_PublicMultYear.aspx</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_5OvgQW6FG4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/_5OvgQW6FG4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, regardless of a\nwoman\u2019s egg supply, she will naturally ovulate exactly one egg per month\u2014not\nmore, not less. This is the reason that the decline in natural fertility is\nactually driven primarily by egg quality (i.e. the chance that this month\u2019s egg\nis a healthy one), not egg quantity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multiple ovulation is another phenomenon\nthat can occur and is when two or more eggs are released in a single cycle. The\neggs are released during one 24 hour period and are responsible for the birth of\nfraternal twins<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You ovulate one egg per\nmonth, usually. This is the single egg that makes it through the whole\novulatory process: the egg follicle is activated, the egg grows and matures,\nand then\u2014once it reaches maturation\u2014it breaks free from the ovary and begins on\nits journey down the Fallopian tubes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;But the fact is that there are tons of\nother eggs that don\u2019t make it past that first stage. Each cycle, maybe 15\u201320\nfollicles are activated, but when they don\u2019t mature, they get \u201creabsorbed\u201d\n(AKA, they die).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This process is called \u201catresia.\u201d And then\u2014to make matters\neven worse\u2014doctors estimate that we lose up to a thousand additional follicles\neach month, thanks to natural cell death. If you\u2019re counting, that\u2019s up to\n1,021 eggs lost each month.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Even if you\u2019re pregnant, on birth control, or\notherwise not ovulating. And the number lost each month accelerates as you age.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The good news is that\negg freezing makes use of some of those otherwise \u201clost\u201d eggs. The egg freezing\nprocess uses hormone medication to step up the action in your ovaries,\nprompting them to produce multiple mature eggs instead of the usual one, so you\ncan freeze them for when\u2014or if\u2014you might need them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHAT IVF LOBBY DON\u2019T\nTELL YOU IS THE DANGERS OF DOWN SYNDROME RELATED TO SIDE EFFECTS OF FERTILITY\nDRUGS \u2014 WHICH IS NOT GODs NATURAL WAY.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">High\ndoses of drugs used to stimulate the ovaries of older women undergoing\nfertility treatment may be causing chromosomal abnormalities in their eggs,\nleading to failed pregnancies and even, potentially, babies with conditions\nsuch as Down's syndrome.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Drugs used in IVF for older women to boost their chances\nof becoming pregnant increase their risk of having a baby with Down\u2019s Syndrome..\n&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">Drugs used to kick-start ovaries for IVF\nin older women disturb the genetic material of the eggs, but Kosher evil pharma\ndon\u2019t tell you that . &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">The pattern of\ngenetic errors leading to Down\u2019s in the IVF eggs is different and complex and\nit is not easy to pin this on the IVF lobby who employs high paid lawyers trained\nto put the judiciary in fog.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">In aged\nwomen when the ovaries are naturally producing fewer eggs, larger doses of\nhormones have to be used<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">When a\nwoman gets severely sick due to IVF &nbsp;overstimulation, the doctor is trained to LIE\u2014Oh\nthis is the first time I am seeing such a thing.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">IVF &nbsp;treatment is responsible for the abnormalities\n\u2013 &nbsp;by allowing eggs to develop that GOD\nwould have excluded..&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">If such a IVF pregnancy went to term \u2013 the birth of a\nbaby with Down's syndrome, which is the result of a chromosomal abnormality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Chromosomes\ncan \"cheat,\" biasing the chance that they will make it into a sex\ncell..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Molecular signals that create an asymmetry in the machinery that drives\nmeiosis, the cell-division process that gives rise to gametes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Certain\nchromosomes, exploit asymmetry to move themselves\nover to the \"right\" side of a cell during division and wind up in the\negg.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Errors in how chromosomes segregate to gametes during meiosis are the root\ncause of some miscarriages and conditions such as Down's syndrome. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Genes are competing with each other to get\ninto the gamete..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">In the case of females, the final stage of meiosis leads to\nthe creation of one cell that becomes the viable egg and another cell called a\npolar body, which is typically degraded. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Meiotic spindle, the structure comprised of\nmicrotubules that attaches to chromosomes, pulling them to opposite sides of a cell\nbefore it divides.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\">Cheating is happening here at the foundation level .</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Mendel's\nFirst Law of Genetics states that a pair of alleles segregates randomly during\nmeiosis so that one copy of each is represented equally in gametes. Whereas\nmale meiosis produces four equal sperm, in female meiosis only one cell, the\negg, survives, and the others degenerate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Meiotic drive is a process in which a\nselfish DNA element exploits female meiotic asymmetry and segregates\npreferentially to the egg in violation of Mendel's First Law, thereby\nincreasing its transmission to the offspring and frequency in a population.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">In\nprinciple, the selfish element can consist either of a centromere that\nincreases its transmission via an altered kinetochore connection to the meiotic\nspindle or a centromere-like element that somehow bypasses the kinetochore\naltogether in doing so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Selfishness\n&nbsp;causes a twin brother ( whose origin is\nfrom a cheating chromosome ) to cannibalise his sibling in the womb.. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UvW97xVKASs/WsQVbzC8_zI/AAAAAAABaKI/x2QQ53qAglgSQuxc6IFWwHayeL-D7fHEQCLcBGAs/s1600/2download.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"207\" data-original-width=\"245\" height=\"336\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UvW97xVKASs/WsQVbzC8_zI/AAAAAAABaKI/x2QQ53qAglgSQuxc6IFWwHayeL-D7fHEQCLcBGAs/s400/2download.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>MEAN HOMOSEXUAL\nLEFT HANDERS WHO COME OUT OF IVF PREGNANCY ( WOMB CANNIBALISM ) &nbsp;ARE NOT GODS CHILDREN &nbsp;--&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Here Radha is the deity-- Krishna is just a side-kick<br />\n<br />\nShri Radhavallabhlal temple at Vrindavan was a Vishnu temple converted to Radha and Krishna idol - a 2 in 1 .<br />\n<br />\nIN SANKHYA JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS USED HIS AGENTS LIKE PRABHUPADA TO SUBSTITUTE SHIVA / SHAKTI -------WITH KRISHNA ( A MERE AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AND A FAKE MISTRESS RADHA .<br />\n<br />\nPOISON INJECTED VERSES BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nradha purna-sakti, krsna purna-saktiman<br />\ndui vastu bheda nai, sastra-paramana<br />\nmrgamada, tara gandha yaiche aviccheda<br />\nagni, jvalate yaiche kabhu nahi bheda<br />\nradha-krsna aiche sada eka-i svarupa<br />\nlila-rasa asvadite dhare dui-rupa<br />\n<br />\nSri Radha is the full energy, and Lord Krsna is the possessor of full power.<br />\n<br />\nThe two are not different, as evidenced by the revealed scriptures. They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. Adi 1.79,80)<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- All this bull about Radha being a mistress of Lord Krishna and all his thousands of Gopikas whom he flirted with , are all poisons injected into Hinduism by the white Christian invader. (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"I was cooing and moaning in lust like a koel and a pigeon, he, who has mastered every art of Love, was pondering... and then, my flowers in my hair crushed and braids tousled, the scratch-marks of his nails arose on my busty bosoms... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u091a\u0930\u0923 \u0930\u0923\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0923\u0940 \u0928\u0942\u092a\u0941\u0930\u092f\u093e, \u092a\u0930\u093f \u092a\u0942\u0930\u093f\u0924 \u0938\u0941\u0930\u0924 \u0935\u093f\u0924\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u092e\u0941\u0916\u0930 \u0935\u093f\u0936\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0916\u0932 \u092e\u0947\u0916\u0932\u092f\u093e \u0938\u0915\u091a \u0917\u094d\u0930\u0939 \u091a\u0941\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0928 \u0926\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d .. \u096c..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"My anklets that usually jingle in my feet started jingling more as he copulated with me in different conjoining sex postures, and while at it the golden chain in my girdle fell down, while he grasped my hair bun to give a dole of kiss, such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0930\u0924\u093f \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0938\u092e\u092f \u0930\u0938\u093e \u0905\u0932\u0938\u092f\u093e, \u0926\u0930 \u092e\u0941\u0915\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0928\u092f\u0928 \u0938\u0930\u094b\u091c\u092e\u094d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0928\u093f\u0903\u0938\u0939 \u0928\u093f\u092a\u0924\u093f\u0924 \u0924\u0928\u0941 \u0932\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0938\u0942\u0926\u0928 \u092e\u0941\u0926\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0928\u094b\u091c\u092e\u094d .. \u096d..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"I, with my vine-like curvacious and delicate body lay on bed of tender grasss, relaxing delightedly because of sexual union he too was weakened, and his lotus like eyes were half-closed, though while laying on lawn, there again arose passion in him for me... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT EVERY DESH DROHI LITERARY FEST THE WHITE MAN CAME AND RECITED SEXUALLY LOADED JAYADEVA VERSES OF GEETA GOVINDA&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY HEARD OF JAYADEVA ( BORN 1170 AD ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JAYADEVAs FAKE VERSES ARE INSERTED INTO GURU GRANTH SABIB--THE HOLY BOOK OF SIKHS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD USED JAYADEVAs FAKE VERSES TO INSTITUTIONALIZE DEVADASI WHORES IN ORISSA TEMPLES. EVERY TEMPLE HAD DANCE HALLS FOR MAHARI ODISSI DANCE ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHARIS DANCED TO THE EXPLICIT SEXUALLY LOADED GEETA GOVINDA VERSES OF THE FAKE JAYADEVA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: cyan; &nbsp;THE WRITTEN VEDAS WERE IN THE CUSTODY ON KERALA NAMBOODIRIS AT THE BANKS OF THE RIVER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nNOW LISTEN\u2014THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL PART OF THIS COMMENT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN 4000 BC ,RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP DUE TO A TECTONIC SHIFT AT THE GLACIAL MOUTH IN THE HIMALAYAS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE BROTHER OF KRISHNA BALARAMA TOOK HIS GIGANTIC PLOW ( FOR LEVERAGE ) AND SHIFTED THE SARSWATI WATERS TO GANGA AND YAMUNA \u2013LEAVING ONLY THE UNDERGROUND SARASWATI RIVER FLOWING..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA WOULD WITNESS THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARSWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE KURUKSHETRA WAS COULD START , VISHNU TOOK AN AVATAR AS PARASHURAMA TO KEEP THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS SAFE\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA LEAD THE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS BACK HOME FROM SARSWATI RIVER BANKS WITH THE VEDAS AND UPANISHADS .. THESE NAMBOODIRIS KNEW THE VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE TOO\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A STRICT LAW FOR SAFETY OF THESE VALUABLE NAMBOODIRIS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nEVEN THE THIYYA KERALA KING OF CALICUT PUNT/ MALABAR/ SHEBA/ OPHIR ) COULD NOT COME WITHIN 6 FEET ( ONE MAN LENGTH ) OF THE NAMBOODIRIS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE LOWEST CEREBRAL GRADE OF TRIBAL ADIVASIS COULD NOT COME WITHIN 72 FEET ( 12 MAN LENGTHS ) \u2026 THE IDEA WAS NOT TO SUPRRESS LESSER HUMANS BUT TO ENSURE THAT VEDAS ORAL ROUTE KNOWING NAMBOODIRIS REMAINED SAFE \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOSE DAYS THERE WERE NO BRAHMINS BY CASTE \u2026 NAMBOODIRIS BY VARNA WERE MERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WHO SPOKE MALAYALAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_100BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; LATER CHITPAVAN JEWS BECAME RULING CLASS. ..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A SYSTEM WHERE ONLY THE ELDEST NAMBOODIRI BROTHER COULD OWN FERTILE LAND IN KERALA \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND WHICH IS INDIAs BIGGEST PROBLEM TODAY AND REASON FOR FARMERS SUICIDES..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER ( SOCIAL STATUS, KNOWLEDGE , LAND AND WEALTH ) AND BECAME DECADENT IN THE PERIOD FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nDANAVAS OF KERALA HAS BEEN THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF KNOWLEDGE FOR THIS PLANET.. I AM A DANAVA ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A KERALA NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA , CUT THE STRENGTH FROM UNDER THE FEET OF HIS OWN CLAN AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA.. .. HE FELT NAMBOODIRIS WERE SEXUALLY DECADENT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE GOES THE FALSE THEORY THAT THERE WAS NO CONCEPT OF BHARAT IN THE ANCIENT DAYS..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONDITION SET BY PARASHURAMA \u2013THAT THESE 4 ORIGINAL HINDU MUTTS COULD BE HEADED ONLY BY A VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE ) KNOWING KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFF\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LONG TRADITION WAS BROKEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA\u2026 EVEN THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS HAS CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS WITH PALE EYES WHO TROUBLED DALITS.. margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1532341865885#c8091526193745317110\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 23, 2018 at 4:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/shigella-infection-kills-toddler-kozhikode-taking-death-toll-4-85241</span><br /><br />I HAVE SEND \" GROUND WATER CONTAMINATION FROM MUSLIM/ CHRISTIAN CEMETRIES\" INFORMATION TO PMO AND HEALTH MINISTRY DOZENS OF TIMES..<br /><br />IT WAS IGNORED..<br /><br />FACEBOOK CENSORED IT...<br /><br />NOW I SAY AGAIN..<br /><br />SHIGELLA BACTERIA IS NOTHING NEW IN KERALA..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Shigella infection (shigellosis) is an intestinal disease caused by a family of bacteria known as Shigella. The main sign of shigella infection is ACUTE diarrhea, which often is bloody..</span><br />DURING RAINY SEASON FLOOD ALL WELLS , LAKES AND RIVERS GET CONTAMINATED\u2026<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KERALA IS NOT A SUITABLE PLACE FOR BURIAL OF DEAD BODIES DUE TO HEAVY RAINFALL AND LEACHING THAT FOLLOWS... GRAVEYARDS AND CEMETERIES MUST BE CHOSEN BY GROUND WATER EXPERTS ..&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br />NO RELIGIOUS CONSIDERATION IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN HEALTH OF FUTURE HUMAN GENERATIONS..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies ( and feces in intestines ) cause bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae)..</span></div>\n<br />These leachates from cemeteries contain microorganisms that pollute substrates, surface water and groundwater. The microorganisms chiefly include bacteria, viruses, intestinal fungi and protozoa\u2026<br /><br />The corpses of healthy humans and animals release bacteria, for example, those which form the group classified as total coliform bacteria: Escherichia coli, Enterobacter, Klebsiella, Citrobacter, Streptococcus faecalis, Clostridium perfringens, Clostridium welchii and Salmonella typhi, and human-hosted viruses, e.g., enterovirus . In most cases, the contamination of the environment comes from pathogenic intestinal bacteria..<br /><br />Some microorganisms are long-living and, in appropriate environmental conditions, can survive in soil profile or in groundwater for some time, some microorganisms can survive even up to 5 years and, in this time, they can migrate and reach the groundwater..<br /><br />Decomposition of interred bodies causes an increase in microbial activity in the surrounding substrate, associated with the release of persistent organic compounds..<br /><br />These compounds can cause highly dangerous infectious disease such as liver inflammation (hepatitis C virus) and typhoid fever (S. typhi) . Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies can also cause other diseases such as tetanus (Clostridium tetani), gaseous gangrene (C. perfringens), toxic contamination of food (E. coli), tuberculosis (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), paratyphoid fever (Salmonella paratyphi), bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae) and cholera (V. cholerae)..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PRIONS IN WATER CAUSES DEMENTIA AND LOSS OF BRAIN POWER.</span></b>.<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BURIAL CAUSES SOULS TO GET TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER ON EARTH-- MISERABLE --FOR ENDLESS SUFFERING ..IN ANOTHER TEN YEARS 98% OF CHRISTIANS WILL BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<br /><br />MUSLIMS ARE STUCK DUE TO APOSTASY LAWS\u2026.&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHINA HAS DIPPED INTO THIS BLOGSITE AND HAS RECENTLY BANNED ALL BURIAL FOR ATHEIST COMMIES / MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS ...BECAUSE OF PRIONS IN GROUNDWATER..&nbsp; &nbsp; CREMATION CAUSES ZERO POLLUTION\u2026</span></b>.<br /><br />PRIONS FROM DEAD BURIED BODIES INVADE WATER AQUIFERS AND CAUSE PRION DISEASES LIKE SPONGIFORM ENCEPHALOPATHIES. (TSEs)\u2026.<br /><br />WE HAVE TO LEARN FROM TRUE HISTORY -- NOT FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILDs COMMIE HISTORIANS\u2026.<br /><br />Kuru is not caused by a bacteria, virus, or fungus. Infectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. \u2026. Prions are not living organisms and do not reproduce. \u2026They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that multiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes\u2026.<br /><br />Creutzfeldt-Jakob, Gerstmann-Str\u00e4ussler-Scheinker disease, and fatal familial insomnia are other degenerative diseases caused by prions. These spongiform diseases, as well as kuru, create sponge-like holes in your brain \u2026 Prions that cause kuru can\u2019t be easily destroyed\u2026 Brains contaminated with prions remain infectious even when preserved in formaldehyde for years\u2026<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6649907494320464324\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt.
