This is the only course left to enable the refugees from West Pakistan and other Indians to exercise citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and integrate it fully into India.<br />\n<br />\nIn October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"<br />\n<br />\nIt explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article.<br />\n<br />\nSince the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...<br />\n<br />\nPresident of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session.<br />\n<br />\n- This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. but Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThis effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThis also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended!..<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix\u2026How can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution ?<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via the back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament\u2026<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370. Article 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution. Article 35A spawned a set of laws that were discriminatory in nature. ..<br />\n<br />\nIt curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution. A Kashmiri woman marrying a non-permanent resident or outsider loses all succession rights, while a Kashmiri man does not.<br />\n<br />\nAs a result of the implementation of Article 35A,.lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201c JUSTICE, social, economic and political \u201d and \u201c EQUALITY of status and of opportunity \u201d...<br />\n<br />\nIn the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. This is a breach of trust\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_195MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_195BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_195B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_196B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6985590787369165189\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_196M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Not the President.<br />\n<br />\nThe marginal note of Article 368 states; \u201c Power of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore \u201d.. Which means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nSub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that: --<br />\n\u201c An amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...\"<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through the bypass of the entire Constitutional mechanism nor does Article 370 give power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nThe parliamentary route of lawmaking was bypassed when the President incorporated Article 35A into the Constitution. Article 368 (i) of the Constitution empowers only Parliament to amend the Constitution. The President acted outside his jurisdiction.. Article 35A is void because the Nehru government did not place it before Parliament for discussion..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 grants special status to Jammu and Kashmir, while Article 35A empowers the state legislature to define permanent citizens.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 and Article 35A of the Indian Constitution are an \"unnecessary baggage\" of the past and hence these laws be repealed..<br />\n<br />\nRestricting citizens from other States from getting employment or buying property within Jammu and Kashmir is a violation of fundamental rights under Articles 14, 19 and 21 of the Constitution\u2026<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 (along with Article 35A) is an anachronistic decree that has outlived its utility, militates against India\u2019s sovereignty, and discriminates against both Indians and Kashmiris by mutually excluding each other from syncretic growth. It is redundant, and constitutionally discarded into the dustbin of history.<br />\n<br />\nTHE TERM \" SUBJUDIDE \" DOES NOT APPLY TO INDIA.. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_27.html?showComment=1522173758823#c4734734436852664274\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 27, 2018 at 11:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU SAY THE DEEP STATE APPOINTS I&amp;B MINISTERS IN MOST NATIONS..<br />\n<br />\nOK CHECK THIS OUT ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">EVER HEARD OF PRISM ?</span><br />\n<br />\nPRISM is a tool used by the US National Security Agency (NSA) to collect private electronic data belonging to users of major internet services like Facebook<br />\n<br />\nNational Security Agency (NSA) is a national-level intelligence agency of the United States Department of Defense, under the authority of the US Director of National Intelligence. The NSA relies on a variety of measures to accomplish its mission, the majority of which are clandestine.<br />\n<br />\nPRISM began in 2007..<br />\n<br />\nIts existence was leaked six years later by NSA contractor Edward Snowden, who warned that the extent of mass data collection was far greater than the public knew and included what he characterized as \"dangerous\" and \"criminal\" activities\"<br />\n<br />\nNSA has \"direct access\" to the servers of Google, Facebook, and others<br />\n<br />\nPRISM\u2019s existence was leaked by Edward Snowden before he entered into ongoing asylum in Moscow. Microsoft was the first company to join the PRISM program.<br />\n<br />\nThe then Minister of External Affairs Salman Khurshid ( <span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">of a particular DNA same as ex-President Zakir Hussain </span>) defended the PRISM program saying, \"This is not scrutiny and access to actual messages\". It is only computer analysis of patterns of calls and emails that are being sent. It is not actually snooping specifically on content of anybody's message or conversation. Some of the information they got out of their scrutiny, they were able to use it to prevent serious terrorist attacks in several countries.\"<br />\n<br />\nKhurshid baby's comments contradicted his Foreign Ministry's characterization of violations of privacy as \"unacceptable.\"<br />\n<br />\nWe know why Modi chose some of his I&amp;B ministers- my lips are sealed as of now.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; THEY HAVE NO POWERS AS PER THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION......<br />\n<br />\nBCCI IS AN NGO-- PREVIOUSLY FOREIGN FUNED\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE TOP BCCI OFFICIALS WERE CRIMINALS-- ALL KNOW THIS\u2026.BCCI WAS RUN BY MAHARAJAS BEFORE -- MOST IN THE CONTROL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) was formed in 1928 by Jew Rothschild as a society, registered under the Tamil Nadu Societies Registration Act\u2026.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe BCCI logo is derived from the emblem of the Order of the Star of India, the British Raj emblem during the colonial period\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNOT ONE CRICKET PLAYER OR OFFICIAL ATTENDED SHREESHANTs MARRIAGE ... text-decoration-line: none;\">March 28, 2018 at 5:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt, how does the static electricity that you mentioned work on a cricket ball both when it is old and new? Players have surreptitiously used saliva sweetened by chewing gum, vaseline and hair gels to maintain the shine on one side of the ball and other abrasive objects like bottle caps, zippers, sandpaper on the other side to induce reverse swing on a softer, older ball. The australians got caught now but to be honest, every team probably does it to some extent which explains very often why the ball starts reversing around the 30th and 40th over in test matches itself where ptherwise it probably might not until much later. It is certain that the Australians have been doing things to the ball for some time now and it was only a commentator who told the cameraman to keep an eye on them that enabled them to be caught red-handed now. Would appreciate it if you shed more light on this.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_65B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4008207738538352961\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399892786#c214556610071273335\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi k,<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.smh.com.au/national/mathematician-reveals-hidden-5-7m-year-cycle-behind-the-date-of-easter-20180328-p4z6qd.html</span><br />\nTHE CUNT IS MAKING ROCKET SCIENCE OUT OF SIMPLE ASTROLOGY<br />\n<br />\nEaster, also called Resurrection Day is a Christian holiday celebrating Jesus Christ returning from the dead.<br />\n<br />\nEaster is not held on the same date every year. This is called a moveable feast. Western churches, like the Roman Catholic Church, use the Gregorian calendar, while Eastern churches, like the Eastern Orthodox Church, use the Julian calendar. In 2015 Easter was celebrated on April 5 for both the Gregorian calendar and Julian calendar.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Jesus Christ never existed\u2014but was cooked up by Roman Emperor Constntine the Great at the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD, which included an astronomer sage from Kerala&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE STUPID \u201cPOPE TO BE\u201dWANTED EASTER TO BE THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER THE FULL MOON AFTER THE VERNAL EQUINOX.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nVishu is the second biggest festival in Kerala and it ushers in the Malayalam new year<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian calendar was designed to keep the vernal equinox on or close to March 21, so that the date of Easter is celebrated on the Sunday after the full moon.. Read this line TWICE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EASTER IS CELEBRATED BY CHRISTIANS BETWEEN LAST WEEK MARCH TO LAST WEEK APRIL.</span></b><br />\nTHIS YEAR FOR WESTERN CHURCH IT IS APRIL 1ST AND FOR EASTERN CHURCH ARRIL 8TH<br />\nIn 1818 the Paschal Full Moon fell on Saturday March 21 (the equinox). Therefore, the following day, March 22, was Easter. It will not fall as early again until 2285, a span of 467 years. The next earliest Easter between 1818 and 2285 (March 23) occurred in 1845, 1856, 1913 and 2008, and will occur again in 2160--a 11, 57, 95 and 152-year gap, respectively.<br />\n<br />\nThe earliest dates for Easter in the Eastern Orthodox Church between 1875 and 2099 are, 22 March 1915 and 22 March 2010. Both dates are equivalent to April 4 in the Gregorian Calendar.<br />\n<br />\nDespite using calendars that are apart by 13 days, Easter 2014 fell on the same date. According to the Western (Gregorian) calendar, the first Paschal Full Moon after the Spring Equinox (March 20) fell on Monday, April 14, 2014. The following Sunday, April 20, was, therefore, Easter Day.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian Calendar was created so that annual astronomical events, specifically the vernal equinox (used to determine when Easter is), would on average keep their places in the calendar year over time.<br />\n<br />\nThere are two ways of finding how long it takes the sun to complete its apparent revolution in the heavens, or, in other words, how long it takes the earth to make a complete revolution around it.<br />\n<br />\nOne of these consists in observing the exact time at which the sun reaches the equinoxes. In ancient times astronomical observers were able to do this by noting the days when the sun rose exactly in the east or set exactly in the west. By observing the rising and setting from day to day, they could find not only the day, but almost the hour in which the sun was on the celestial equator<br />\n<br />\nThe period between two returns of the sun to the same equinox is called the solar year or equinoxial year. The other way of finding the length of the year consists in observing the interval of time between two passages of the sun past the same star in the heavens; for example, the period between two of its passages past one of the stars<br />\n<br />\nThe ancient Kerala astronomers got the same result by using the moon as an intermediate object to measure from. The moon could be seen before sunset and its distance from the sun determined. Then, when the star appeared after sunset, the distance from the star to the moon was measured.<br />\n<br />\nAllowing for the motion of the moon during the interval, the apparent distance between the sun and the star could thus be learned from day to day. In this way it could be found how many days it was between the times at which the sun was at the same distance from any given bright star.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_66B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_67B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1418662716273968311\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_67M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399955591#c1418662716273968311\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThis would be the period of apparent revolution of the sun in the celestial sphere, or, as we now know it to be, the period of one revolution of the earth in its orbit. This period is called the sidereal year, because it is fixed by the stars.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH HIPPARCHUS AND. PTOLEMY LEARNT IN THE KONDUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN )<br />\n<br />\nWith our exact modern observations we have found the lengths of the years to be:--<br />\n<br />\nSolar year/ 365 d. 5 h. 48 m. 46 s.<br />\nSidereal year/ 365 d 6 h 9 m 9 s<br />\nDifference/ 20 m. 23 s.<br />\n<br />\nThis difference shows that the position of the equinoxes among the stars is changing from year to year-- nearly one degree in 70 years.<br />\n<br />\nThe tropics of Cancer and Capricorn mark the extreme north and south latitudes where the Sun can appear directly overhead. Because the vernal equinox moves back along the ecliptic due to precession, a tropical year is shorter than a sidereal year (in 2000, the difference was 20 m 23 s<br />\n<br />\nThe number of mean solar days in a vernal equinox year has been oscillating between 365.2424 and 365.2423 for several millennia and will likely remain near 365.2424 for a few more. This long-term stability is pure chance, because in our era the slowdown of the rotation, the acceleration of the mean orbital motion, and the effect at the vernal equinox of rotation and shape changes in the Earth's orbit, happen to almost cancel out.<br />\n<br />\nEarth's pole aligns with different pole stars throughout its precessional period. Polaris is Earth's current north-pole star. Earth's 25675 -year precessional cycle is also referred to as \"Earth's Great Year.\"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEarth's axis is tilted 23\u00b0 27' with respect the plane created by Earth's orbit around the Sun (the ecliptic plane)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n#######################################################<br />\nCapt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The celestial equator is a great circle on the imaginary celestial sphere, in the same plane as the Earth's equator. In other words, it is a projection of the terrestrial equator out into space. As a result of the Earth's axial tilt, the celestial equator is inclined by 23.4\u00b0 with respect to the ecliptic plane.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ecliptic is an imaginary line on the sky that marks the annual path of the sun. It is the projection of Earth\u2019s orbit onto the celestial sphere.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FIRST POINT OF ARIES ( VERNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE SOUTH TO NORTH ON ECLIPTIC) CORRESPONDS WITH THE GREENWICH MERIDIAN ON PLANET EARTH AND SO LONGITUDE IS DERIVED FROM THIS AFTER A CELESTIAL SIGHT USING SEXTANT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">180 DEGREES OPPOSITE IS THE \"FIRST POINT OF LIBRA\" ( AUTUMNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE NORTH TO SOUTH ON ECLIPTIC ) WHICH CORRESPONDS TO THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE. Saudi airstrikes and ground operations have killed and injured more than 43,000 Yemeni people in the past three years.<br />\n<br />\nU.S. forces provide intelligence support for selecting airstrike targets. Riyadh\u2019s airstrike campaign frequently targets markets, homes, cars, media crews, farms, factories, prisons and even ambulance crews entering bomb sites.<br />\n<br />\nU.S. Navy ships enforce the siege and blockade throughout the Red Sea by prohibiting aid and cargo ships from docking in resistance-held territory, such as the Hodeidah port, where Saudi airstrikes destroyed the port\u2019s cranes.<br />\n<br />\nIn May 2017, Trump visited the kingdom, signing a record $350 billion arms deal, the largest in US history.<br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_136b+seed28AD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_136b+seed28AD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; SANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW MAN TO REMAIN SINGLE AND CALL HIMSELF A BRAHMACHARI.<br />\n<br />\nAS PER OUR VEDAS NO UNMARRIED MAN CAN CONDUCT A YAGNA.<br />\n<br />\nWhen faith is placed upon a wrong personality, ( a homosexual EVIL brahmachari rascal in saffron robes ) it can lead to disastrous consequences.<br />\n<br />\nBut when it is placed on the true Guru, it opens the pathway for eternal welfare.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED \"BRAHMACHARYA \" (CELIBACY ) AND WE HAVE HIS AGENT ROGUES LIKE VIVEKANANDA MAKING A VIRTUE OUT OF IT..<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya has nothing to do with withholding semen. The celibate transforms the energy of reproduction into spiritual energy (ojas), bringing in lustre.<br />\n<br />\nThe word \u2018virya\u2019 mentioned means power of knowledge or action, vigor in body\u2019s organs and the mind, spiritual power or the attainment of siddhis.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is about allocation: using your resources effectively to achieve your aspiration.Brahmacharya means not misusing sex. Brahmacharya means \u2018to respect the creative power of sex and not abuse it by manipulating others sexually.<br />\n<br />\nThe sex you have with your wife is LOVE. The sex you have with a whore is LUST.<br />\n<br />\nLike the other yamas, brahmacharya has to do with balance, and how we choose to use or \u201cinvest\u201d our resources. Each and every act and thought is an outflow of energy.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is about harnessing the energy or power of our senses and directing that instead to greater personal understanding- not withholding semen.<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE DONE WITH HOMOSEXUALITY SPREADING GURUS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED GANDHI TO SPEAD HIS BRAHMACHARI NONSENSE-- ALL THE WHILE GANDHI WAS SLEEPING NAKED WITH UNDERAGE GIRLS.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA alone.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married..<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior).<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A TRUTH EXHUMER CALLED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL IN TOWN.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedCQCWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedCQCWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7381990936301254115\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. &nbsp;THE WRITTEN VEDAS WERE IN THE CUSTODY ON KERALA NAMBOODIRIS AT THE BANKS OF THE RIVER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nNOW LISTEN\u2014THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL PART OF THIS COMMENT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN 4000 BC ,RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP DUE TO A TECTONIC SHIFT AT THE GLACIAL MOUTH IN THE HIMALAYAS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE BROTHER OF KRISHNA BALARAMA TOOK HIS GIGANTIC PLOW ( FOR LEVERAGE ) AND SHIFTED THE SARSWATI WATERS TO GANGA AND YAMUNA \u2013LEAVING ONLY THE UNDERGROUND SARASWATI RIVER FLOWING..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA WOULD WITNESS THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARSWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE KURUKSHETRA WAS COULD START , VISHNU TOOK AN AVATAR AS PARASHURAMA TO KEEP THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS SAFE\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA LEAD THE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS BACK HOME FROM SARSWATI RIVER BANKS WITH THE VEDAS AND UPANISHADS .. THESE NAMBOODIRIS KNEW THE VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE TOO\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A STRICT LAW FOR SAFETY OF THESE VALUABLE NAMBOODIRIS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nEVEN THE THIYYA KERALA KING OF CALICUT PUNT/ MALABAR/ SHEBA/ OPHIR ) COULD NOT COME WITHIN 6 FEET ( ONE MAN LENGTH ) OF THE NAMBOODIRIS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE LOWEST CEREBRAL GRADE OF TRIBAL ADIVASIS COULD NOT COME WITHIN 72 FEET ( 12 MAN LENGTHS ) \u2026 THE IDEA WAS NOT TO SUPRRESS LESSER HUMANS BUT TO ENSURE THAT VEDAS ORAL ROUTE KNOWING NAMBOODIRIS REMAINED SAFE \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOSE DAYS THERE WERE NO BRAHMINS BY CASTE \u2026 NAMBOODIRIS BY VARNA WERE MERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WHO SPOKE MALAYALAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_100MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_98TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px; text-align: left;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_98B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c533883434781593434\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_98M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522714517699#c533883434781593434\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 3, 2018 at 5:45 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_98MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nTHIYYAS WERE THE ORIGINAL ROYALS OF KERALA\u2014 LATER JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED A CRYPTO JEW VARMA CLAN WHO BECAME KERALA ROYALS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WERE NO VARMAS BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA\u2026 THIYYAS, WERE DEMOTED TO \u201c COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPERS\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nSAME WAY MAHARS ( BR AMBEDKARs CLAN ) WERE NOT DALITS\u2026 MAHARS WERE RULING CASTE OF MAHARASHTRA \u2026 MAHARASTRA IS THE RASHTRA OF MAHARS\u2026. LATER CHITPAVAN JEWS BECAME RULING CLASS. ..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A SYSTEM WHERE ONLY THE ELDEST NAMBOODIRI BROTHER COULD OWN FERTILE LAND IN KERALA \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND WHICH IS INDIAs BIGGEST PROBLEM TODAY AND REASON FOR FARMERS SUICIDES..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER ( SOCIAL STATUS, KNOWLEDGE , LAND AND WEALTH ) AND BECAME DECADENT IN THE PERIOD FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nDANAVAS OF KERALA HAS BEEN THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF KNOWLEDGE FOR THIS PLANET.. I AM A DANAVA ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A KERALA NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA , CUT THE STRENGTH FROM UNDER THE FEET OF HIS OWN CLAN AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA.. .. HE FELT NAMBOODIRIS WERE SEXUALLY DECADENT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE GOES THE FALSE THEORY THAT THERE WAS NO CONCEPT OF BHARAT IN THE ANCIENT DAYS..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONDITION SET BY PARASHURAMA \u2013THAT THESE 4 ORIGINAL HINDU MUTTS COULD BE HEADED ONLY BY A VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE ) KNOWING KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFF\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LONG TRADITION WAS BROKEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA\u2026 EVEN THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS HAS CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS WITH PALE EYES WHO TROUBLED DALITS.. ALONG WITH MORE THAN A THOUSAND FAKE MUTT PONTIFFS WHO WERE THE BRIBED AGENTS OF THE WHITE INVADER\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN ANOTHER 15 YEARS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW A BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM\u2026 ALL BR AMBEDKAR/ EVR PERIYAR STUDENTS UNION LEADERS ARE FUNDED AND CONTROLLED BY WHITE JEWS \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR PERIYAR WERE AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD AND DID NOT WANT THE WHITE INVADER TO LEAVE INDIA\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nYES THE COOK ON A SHIP CAN ASPIRE TO BE CAPTAIN.. BUT FIRST HE MUST PASS AN EXAM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE CANT HAVE QUOTA FOR DALITS IN ISRO OR A QUOTA FOR DONKEYS ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT TEACH A DONKEY TO SING \u2014 WISDOM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS THERE IS QUOTA SYSTEM , THERE WILL BE BRAIN DRAIN FROM INDIA \u2026. NO HORSE WILL AGREE TO BE LORDED OVER BY A DONKEY ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nBY ALL MEANS GIVE FREE EDUCATION TO DALITS\u2014BUT IT MUST STOP THERE \u2026 GIVING JOB RESERVATIONS AND EVEN PROMOTIONS WILL NOT HELP BHARATMATA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">OUR CONSTIITUTION DEMANDS THAT ALL CITIZENS BE TREATED THE SAME..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDALIT LEADERS LIKE KANCHA ILAIAH AND JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS MUST NOT LONGER LIE THAT DALITS WERE SUPRESSED FOR MILLIUNIUMS ..<br />\n<br />\nIT HAPPENED ONLY IN KERALA , NOT THE REST OF INDIA\u2026<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">UNTOUCHABILITY IN KERALA WAS TO PRESERVE , NOT SUPRESS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_98MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_98BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_98B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2889325542601838581\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_99M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , serif;\">Article 370 of the Indian constitution is an article that grants special autonomous status to the state of Jammu and Kashmir.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The article is drafted in Part XXI of the Constitution: Temporary, Transitional and Special Provisions.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The State's Constituent Assembly was empowered to recommend the articles of the Indian constitution to be applied to the state or to abrogate the Article 370 altogether.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After the state Constituent Assembly dissolved itself without recommending abrogation, the Article 370 was deemed to have become a permanent feature of the Indian Constitution.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ELECTIONS TO THE JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY IN 1951 WERE RIGGED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They exploited Article 370, and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PARAMOUNT CLAUSE: \" ETHNIC CLEANSING \" - OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Jawaharlal Nehru, the HALF BROTHER of Sheikh Abdullah (who married the wife of LAWRENCE OF ARABIA-- JEWESS BEGUM AKBAR JEHAN) subverted the basic structure of the Indian Constitution in May 1954 to deprive all Indian citizens, including refugees from West Pakistan settled in Jammu province. of their fundamental right to exercise all rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru and Sheikh Abdullah made sure that the Permanent Residents of Jammu &amp; Kashmir shall exercise all rights all over India\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, THOUGH Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Armed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Nehru enforced Article 35A in Jammu &amp; Kashmir UNCONSTITUTIONALLY - More important he criminally CONCEALED it.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">He hid the amendments from the public, by not mentioning the same in the main body of the Constitution\u2014read this line twice.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention in a CRIMINAL MANNER.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AN APPENDIX CAN NEVER HIJACK THE MAIN BODY OF ANY ARTICLE.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ANY IDIOT KNOWS THIS UNLESS HE IS SENILE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_198BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_198b+seedyIoD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_196T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru in cahoots with his HALF BROTHER Sheikh Abdullah conspired against the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan, and then further hatched a conspiracy against all Indian citizens, in order to pander to communalists in Kashmir, by subverting Articles 16 and 19 of the Indian Constitution which deal with the rights of Indian citizens, including fundamental rights.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 19, for example, says that \u201cAll citizens shall have the right (a) to freedom of speech and expression, (b) to assemble peacefully and without arms, (c) to form associations or unions, (d) to move freely throughout the territory of India, (e) to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India; (f) to acquire, hold and dispose of property; and (g) to practice any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It follows that what is needed is not just the abrogation of Article 370 but also the revocation of Article 35A. This is the only course left to enable the refugees from West Pakistan and other Indians to exercise citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and integrate it fully into India.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Since the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BALLS !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Article 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">- This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. but Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended!..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Article 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix\u2026How can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution ?</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via the back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament\u2026</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370.&nbsp; &nbsp;Article 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution.&nbsp; &nbsp; Article 35A spawned a set of laws that were discriminatory in nature. ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution. A Kashmiri woman marrying a non-permanent resident or outsider loses all succession rights, while a Kashmiri man does not.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As a result of the implementation of Article 35A,.lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201c JUSTICE, social, economic and political \u201d and \u201c EQUALITY of status and of opportunity \u201d...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. This is a breach of trust\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 4--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_196MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_196BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_196B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_197B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6985590787369165189\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_197M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_24.html?showComment=1522142909202#c6985590787369165189\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 27, 2018 at 2:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDemocratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 368 is the only way to amend the Constitution,.. Not the President.<br />\n<br />\nThe marginal note of Article 368 states; \u201c Power of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore \u201d.. Which means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nSub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that: --<br />\n\u201c An amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...\"<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through the bypass of the entire Constitutional mechanism nor does Article 370 give power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nThe parliamentary route of lawmaking was bypassed when the President incorporated Article 35A into the Constitution. Article 368 (i) of the Constitution empowers only Parliament to amend the Constitution. The President acted outside his jurisdiction.. Article 35A is void because the Nehru government did not place it before Parliament for discussion..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 grants special status to Jammu and Kashmir, while Article 35A empowers the state legislature to define permanent citizens.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 and Article 35A of the Indian Constitution are an \"unnecessary baggage\" of the past and hence these laws be repealed..<br />\n<br />\nRestricting citizens from other States from getting employment or buying property within Jammu and Kashmir is a violation of fundamental rights under Articles 14, 19 and 21 of the Constitution\u2026<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 (along with Article 35A) is an anachronistic decree that has outlived its utility, militates against India\u2019s sovereignty, and discriminates against both Indians and Kashmiris by mutually excluding each other from syncretic growth. It is redundant, and constitutionally discarded into the dustbin of history.<br />\n<br />\nTHE TERM \" SUBJUDIDE \" DOES NOT APPLY TO INDIA.. The NSA relies on a variety of measures to accomplish its mission, the majority of which are clandestine.<br />\n<br />\nPRISM began in 2007..<br />\n<br />\nIts existence was leaked six years later by NSA contractor Edward Snowden, who warned that the extent of mass data collection was far greater than the public knew and included what he characterized as \"dangerous\" and \"criminal\" activities\"<br />\n<br />\nNSA has \"direct access\" to the servers of Google, Facebook, and others<br />\n<br />\nPRISM\u2019s existence was leaked by Edward Snowden before he entered into ongoing asylum in Moscow. Microsoft was the first company to join the PRISM program.<br />\n<br />\nThe then Minister of External Affairs Salman Khurshid ( <span style=\"color: red;\">of a particular DNA same as ex-President Zakir Hussain</span> ) defended the PRISM program saying, \"This is not scrutiny and access to actual messages\". It is only computer analysis of patterns of calls and emails that are being sent. It is not actually snooping specifically on content of anybody's message or conversation. Some of the information they got out of their scrutiny, they were able to use it to prevent serious terrorist attacks in several countries.\"<br />\n<br />\nKhurshid baby's comments contradicted his Foreign Ministry's characterization of violations of privacy as \"unacceptable.\"<br />\n<br />\nWe know why Modi chose some of his I&amp;B ministers- my lips are sealed as of now.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"After reposing me on a bed of tender grass, he lay on my chest all the time, and on making embraces and kisses, he hugged me and swill my lower lip, graspingly... now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0905\u0932\u0938 \u0928\u093f\u092e\u0940\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0932\u094b\u091a\u0928\u092f\u093e \u092a\u0941\u0932\u0915 \u0906\u0935\u0932\u093f \u0932\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0915\u092a\u094b\u0932\u092e\u094d,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u092e\u091c\u0932 \u0938\u0915\u0932 \u0915\u0932\u0947\u0935\u0930\u092f\u093e, \u0935\u0930 \u092e\u0926\u0928 \u092e\u0926\u093e\u0926\u094d \u0905\u0924\u093f \u0932\u094b\u0932\u092e\u094d .. \u096a..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"My eyelids were slouching with pleasure and fatigue, his delicate cheeks too, experienced a series of tingles, and our bodies were drenched in sweat, while he was thrusting with passionate intemperance... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0915\u094b\u0915\u093f\u0932 \u0915\u0932\u0930\u0935 \u0915\u0942\u091c\u093f\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u091c\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0928\u0938\u093f\u091c \u0924\u0928\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0935\u093f\u091a\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0936\u094d\u0932\u0925 \u0915\u0941\u0938\u0941\u092e \u0906\u0915\u0941\u0932 \u0915\u0941\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0932\u092f\u093e, \u0928\u0916 \u0932\u093f\u0916\u093f\u0924 \u0918\u0928 \u0938\u094d\u0924\u0928\u092d\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d .. \u096b..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"I was cooing and moaning in lust like a koel and a pigeon, he, who has mastered every art of Love, was pondering... and then, my flowers in my hair crushed and braids tousled, the scratch-marks of his nails arose on my busty bosoms... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u091a\u0930\u0923 \u0930\u0923\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0923\u0940 \u0928\u0942\u092a\u0941\u0930\u092f\u093e, \u092a\u0930\u093f \u092a\u0942\u0930\u093f\u0924 \u0938\u0941\u0930\u0924 \u0935\u093f\u0924\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u092e\u0941\u0916\u0930 \u0935\u093f\u0936\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0916\u0932 \u092e\u0947\u0916\u0932\u092f\u093e \u0938\u0915\u091a \u0917\u094d\u0930\u0939 \u091a\u0941\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0928 \u0926\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d .. \u096c..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"My anklets that usually jingle in my feet started jingling more as he copulated with me in different conjoining sex postures, and while at it the golden chain in my girdle fell down, while he grasped my hair bun to give a dole of kiss, such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0930\u0924\u093f \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0938\u092e\u092f \u0930\u0938\u093e \u0905\u0932\u0938\u092f\u093e, \u0926\u0930 \u092e\u0941\u0915\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0928\u092f\u0928 \u0938\u0930\u094b\u091c\u092e\u094d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0928\u093f\u0903\u0938\u0939 \u0928\u093f\u092a\u0924\u093f\u0924 \u0924\u0928\u0941 \u0932\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0938\u0942\u0926\u0928 \u092e\u0941\u0926\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0928\u094b\u091c\u092e\u094d .. \u096d..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"I, with my vine-like curvacious and delicate body lay on bed of tender grasss, relaxing delightedly because of sexual union he too was weakened, and his lotus like eyes were half-closed, though while laying on lawn, there again arose passion in him for me... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT EVERY DESH DROHI LITERARY FEST THE WHITE MAN CAME AND RECITED SEXUALLY LOADED JAYADEVA VERSES OF GEETA GOVINDA&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY HEARD OF JAYADEVA ( BORN 1170 AD ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JAYADEVAs FAKE VERSES ARE INSERTED INTO GURU GRANTH SABIB--THE HOLY BOOK OF SIKHS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD USED JAYADEVAs FAKE VERSES TO INSTITUTIONALIZE DEVADASI WHORES IN ORISSA TEMPLES. &nbsp;THE WRITTEN VEDAS WERE IN THE CUSTODY ON KERALA NAMBOODIRIS AT THE BANKS OF THE RIVER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nNOW LISTEN\u2014THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL PART OF THIS COMMENT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN 4000 BC ,RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP DUE TO A TECTONIC SHIFT AT THE GLACIAL MOUTH IN THE HIMALAYAS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE BROTHER OF KRISHNA BALARAMA TOOK HIS GIGANTIC PLOW ( FOR LEVERAGE ) AND SHIFTED THE SARSWATI WATERS TO GANGA AND YAMUNA \u2013LEAVING ONLY THE UNDERGROUND SARASWATI RIVER FLOWING..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA WOULD WITNESS THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARSWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE KURUKSHETRA WAS COULD START , VISHNU TOOK AN AVATAR AS PARASHURAMA TO KEEP THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS SAFE\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA LEAD THE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS BACK HOME FROM SARSWATI RIVER BANKS WITH THE VEDAS AND UPANISHADS .. THESE NAMBOODIRIS KNEW THE VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE TOO\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A STRICT LAW FOR SAFETY OF THESE VALUABLE NAMBOODIRIS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nEVEN THE THIYYA KERALA KING OF CALICUT PUNT/ MALABAR/ SHEBA/ OPHIR ) COULD NOT COME WITHIN 6 FEET ( ONE MAN LENGTH ) OF THE NAMBOODIRIS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE LOWEST CEREBRAL GRADE OF TRIBAL ADIVASIS COULD NOT COME WITHIN 72 FEET ( 12 MAN LENGTHS ) \u2026 THE IDEA WAS NOT TO SUPRRESS LESSER HUMANS BUT TO ENSURE THAT VEDAS ORAL ROUTE KNOWING NAMBOODIRIS REMAINED SAFE \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOSE DAYS THERE WERE NO BRAHMINS BY CASTE \u2026 NAMBOODIRIS BY VARNA WERE MERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WHO SPOKE MALAYALAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_100MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_98TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px; text-align: left;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_98B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c533883434781593434\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_98M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. LATER CHITPAVAN JEWS BECAME RULING CLASS. ..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A SYSTEM WHERE ONLY THE ELDEST NAMBOODIRI BROTHER COULD OWN FERTILE LAND IN KERALA \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND WHICH IS INDIAs BIGGEST PROBLEM TODAY AND REASON FOR FARMERS SUICIDES..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER ( SOCIAL STATUS, KNOWLEDGE , LAND AND WEALTH ) AND BECAME DECADENT IN THE PERIOD FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nDANAVAS OF KERALA HAS BEEN THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF KNOWLEDGE FOR THIS PLANET.. I AM A DANAVA ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A KERALA NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA , CUT THE STRENGTH FROM UNDER THE FEET OF HIS OWN CLAN AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA.. .. HE FELT NAMBOODIRIS WERE SEXUALLY DECADENT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE GOES THE FALSE THEORY THAT THERE WAS NO CONCEPT OF BHARAT IN THE ANCIENT DAYS..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONDITION SET BY PARASHURAMA \u2013THAT THESE 4 ORIGINAL HINDU MUTTS COULD BE HEADED ONLY BY A VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE ) KNOWING KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFF\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LONG TRADITION WAS BROKEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA\u2026 EVEN THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS HAS CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS WITH PALE EYES WHO TROUBLED DALITS.. ALONG WITH MORE THAN A THOUSAND FAKE MUTT PONTIFFS WHO WERE THE BRIBED AGENTS OF THE WHITE INVADER\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN ANOTHER 15 YEARS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW A BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM\u2026 ALL BR AMBEDKAR/ EVR PERIYAR STUDENTS UNION LEADERS ARE FUNDED AND CONTROLLED BY WHITE JEWS \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR PERIYAR WERE AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD AND DID NOT WANT THE WHITE INVADER TO LEAVE INDIA\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nYES THE COOK ON A SHIP CAN ASPIRE TO BE CAPTAIN.. BUT FIRST HE MUST PASS AN EXAM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE CANT HAVE QUOTA FOR DALITS IN ISRO OR A QUOTA FOR DONKEYS ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT TEACH A DONKEY TO SING \u2014 WISDOM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS THERE IS QUOTA SYSTEM , THERE WILL BE BRAIN DRAIN FROM INDIA \u2026. NO HORSE WILL AGREE TO BE LORDED OVER BY A DONKEY ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nBY ALL MEANS GIVE FREE EDUCATION TO DALITS\u2014BUT IT MUST STOP THERE \u2026 GIVING JOB RESERVATIONS AND EVEN PROMOTIONS WILL NOT HELP BHARATMATA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">OUR CONSTIITUTION DEMANDS THAT ALL CITIZENS BE TREATED THE SAME..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDALIT LEADERS LIKE KANCHA ILAIAH AND JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS MUST NOT LONGER LIE THAT DALITS WERE SUPRESSED FOR MILLIUNIUMS ..<br />\n<br />\nIT HAPPENED ONLY IN KERALA , NOT THE REST OF INDIA\u2026<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">UNTOUCHABILITY IN KERALA WAS TO PRESERVE , NOT SUPRESS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_98MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_98BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_98B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2889325542601838581\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_99M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
