If this has to be explicit, it must be done by the ELECTED LAW MAKERS and not the UNCONSTITUTIONAL COLLEGIUM LAW INTERPRETERS.. .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe inclusion or exclusion of fundamental rights is only the proviso of Parliament\u2026 Here, the judiciary is taking over the functions of Parliament. Hey, let them do it - but WE THE PEOPLE declare it NULL AND VOID..\u2026.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn this internet age we all can read and interpret the constitution\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBY ASKING THAT TRUTH BE HIDDEN, ARE THESE MELORDS PROTECTING BHARATMATA ?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION DOES NOT PROTECT ANY DESH DROHI \u2013ESPECIALLY THOSE WHO POINT A FOREIGN GUN AT BHARATMATA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWe will not allow , the right to privacy to hide the naked truth. .. Good people who have nothing to hide do not need a veil of privacy..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">JUDGES CAN ONLY JUDGE FOR A SPECIFIC CASE\u2026 WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW JUDGES TO CREATE PATHETIC RULINGS WHICH WILL BE USED AS A LIFE LONG GOSPEL- WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING THE CONTEXT..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJUDGES DID NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG WHEN 5.1 LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS WERE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED AND SUBJECTED TO GENOCIDE\u2026 THOUSANDS OF HINDU TEMPLES WERE RAZED DOWN IN KASHMIR. ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBUT HEY, THESE MELORDS JUMPED LIKE DEMENTED ORANGUTANS WHEN A BABRI MAJID ( MECCA OF HINDUS ) WAS RAZED DOWN..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">HULLO PM MODI, THE CONSTITUTION IS A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT. .. IT IS NOT ETCHED ON ROCK ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_126MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_126BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_126B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_127B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c228281002672827782\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_127M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_17.html?showComment=1524058872510#c228281002672827782\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 18, 2018 at 7:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_127MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">The Constitution''s provisions have consciously been worded in generalities, though not in vague terms, instead of making them rigid and static with a fixed meaning or content as in an ordinary statute, so that they may be interpreted by coming generations of citizens with the ONWARD MARCH OF TIME, to apply to NEW AND EVER CHANGING AND DEMANDING SITUATIONS, making the Constitution a living and an organic document\u2026</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nRigidity tends to check progressive legislation or gradual innovation\u2026 ONLY A FLEXIBLE DYNAMIC CONSTITUTION CAN SURVIVE THE TEST OF TIME.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN 1947 WHO WOULD EVEN IMAGINE OF DIGITIZATION OF INDIAN ECONOMY AND OF SOMETHING CALLED GST \u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nRIGHT TO LIFE as guaranteed under Article 21, has by interpretation been expanded to progressively mean a whole lot of human rights..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">A constitution is not a parchment of paper, it is a way of life and has to be lived up to\u2026 Eternal vigilance is the price of liberty and in the final analysis, its only keepers are WE THE PEOPLE\u2026.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND VOID IF IT ACTS AGAINST THE WATAN.. THE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND VOID IF IT GOES AGAINST THE PRINCIPLE OF DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ).... ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe framers of our Constitution and WE THE PEOPLE did not intend the judiciary to be \u201csuperior\u201d to elected Parliament and the elected executive, but intended it to be the sentinel on the qui vive should the other two wings overstep the boundaries of their jurisdiction or omit to discharge their duty as public trustees\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY DO NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO APPLY BODMAS AND TO PRIORITISE SECTIONS OF THE CONSTITUTION....</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCollegium Judiciary CANNOT exercise adjudicatory power, without any CHECKS AND BALANCES \u2026 This would be destructive of the basic feature of democracy, and if not forthwith remedied, would dilute the very essence of a democratic form of governance\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY has never ever been accountable in the manner that the elected executive is accountable.. These Melords keep pointing fingers without any sense of accountability.. It is a constitutional imperative that an authority must be accountable if it wields power..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Collegium judiciary has developed the mindset that it is above the law...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>WITH JEW ROTHSCHILD GETTING SO MUCH OF PRIVACY ---THAT IT TOOK A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO REVEAL THAT ROTHSCHILD RULED INDIA, NOT THE KING, QUEEN OR THE BRITISH PARLIAMENT....</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CONSTITUTION IS NOT SUPREME ... ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION LIES .. 1) WE THE PEOPLE..\u2026 2) WATAN ( BHARATMATA )..\u2026 3) DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE )\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCOLLEGIUM ( ROGUE BODY NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION ) SUPREME COURT WHICH IS UNACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE CAN ONLY REACH UPTO THE CONSTITUTION-- ..THESE JUDGES CANNOT REACH HIGHER THAN THIS LEVEL, COME WHAT MAY\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nELECTED EXECUTIVE HAS THE POWERS / RESPONSIBILITY TO LISTEN TO THE VOICE OF THE PEOPLE ( JUDGES CANNOT ) IN A DEMOCRACY..&nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/avram-noam-chomsky-karl-marx-of-new.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/08/right-to-privacy-in-india-is-not.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_128b+seedbvlD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">April 4, 2016 at 1:52 AM</span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_120MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/NIA-team-in-US-to-look-into-LeT-role-in-Samjhauta-blast/articleshow/51675269.cms<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE OF INDIA KNOWS WHY THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE SUSHIL KUMAR SHINDE THE HOME MINISTER.<br />\n<br />\nDuring a speech made in Congress's Chintan Shivir in Jaipur,( 20th Jan 2013 ) Shinde had claimed that the Home Ministry had received a report that the RSS and BJP were promoting Hindu terrorism through their training camps.<br />\n<br />\nHe also accused the RSS and BJP of being behind the Samjhauta Express bombings, Mecca Masjid and Malegaon blasts.<br />\n<br />\nA day after Shinde\u2019s declaration, Hafiz Saeed, leader of the LeT, the Pakistan-based Islamist terrorist outfit, called for a ban on the RSS.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY BODY KNOWS THESE ARE FALSE FLAG ATTACKS.<br />\n<br />\nOn July 1, 2009, the United States Treasury Department said in its press release: \u201cArif Qasmani has worked with the LeT to facilitate terrorist attacks, including...Samjota Express bombing.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSix months after the UN and US announced sanctions against the LeT and Qasmani, Pakistan Interior Minister Rehman Mallik himself admitted that Pakistani terrorists were involved in the Samjhauta blast.<br />\n<br />\nFaiza Outalha, the third wife of David Coleman Headley had confessed,that David Headley was involved in the Samjhauta blast.<br />\n<br />\nNarco truth serum tests carried out on general secretary of SIMI, Safdar Nagori; his brother Kamruddin Nagori and Amil Parvez in Bangalore in April 2007, three months after the Samjhauta blast revealed that SIMI activists had executed the Samjhauta blast, with the help of the Pakistani nationals from across the border.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ITALIAN WAITRESS PUT THE BLAME ON HINDUS TO GARNER MUSLIM VOTES.<br />\n<br />\nThe Maharashtra Anti-Terror Squad [ATS] told the Special Court through the public prosecutor that Col Purohit allegedly involved in the Malegaon blast in which RDX was used.<br />\n<br />\nCOL PUROHIT IS A HERO-- WHO WAS PLANTED AS AN AGENT BY THE INDIAN ARMY.<br />\n<br />\nWE DEMAND THAT EX HOME MINISTER SHINDE TAKE A LIE DETECTOR TEST. HE MUST NOT BE GIVEN A CHOICE .<br />\n<br />\nIF SHINDE FAILS THE LIE DETECTOR TEST PUT HIM THROUGH A NARCO TEST\u2014PARAMOUNT FOR BHARATMATAs SECURITY..<br />\n<br />\nA year ago, the supreme court ruled that there is NIL evidence to charge Lt Col Prasad Shrikant Purohit, Sadhvi Pragya Singh Thakur and others in the 2008 Malegaon blast case under MCOCA.<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAS MODI NOT ARRESTED THE COMMIE PROFESSORS OF JNU SO FAR ?<br />\n<br />\nwe want ATS officers to be trained in FALSE FLAG ATTACKS and HEGELIAN DIALECTIC.<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT THE ATS OFFICERS WHO TORTURED AN INDIAN SECRET AGENT COL PUROHIT O BE ARRESTED AND PUNISHED.<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT COL PUROHITS ARMY BOSSES WHO DID NOT COME TO HIS SUPPORT ( HE HAS INFILTRATED ISLAMIC ORGS ) TO BE INVESTIGATED AND PUNISHED . IMPORTANT....&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">WARNING....&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">KHABARDAARRR.....</span><br />\n<br />\n############################################<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AT SEA WHEN I HAD TO GLEAN A CRITICAL LAW -- I ASKED MY WIFE TO EXPLAIN IT IN PLAIN ENGLISH .. GO OR NO GO ?...<br /><br />BECAUSE SHE HAS NO PRECONCEIVED NOTIONS -- WHILE I HAVE DUE TO MY PAST EXPERIENCE ... THE WRITTEN LAW IS AN IDIOT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS COMMENT IS PACKED WITH WISDOM<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE DONE IT EVERYTIME AND WON-- SHOT DOWN PAST PRACTICES CONVERTED TO GOSPE OVER TIME...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">THE WRITTEN LAW IS AN ASS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY WHEN INDIA GOES TO WTO NAIROBI--I HAD TOLD NIRMALA SITARAMAN -- GLEAN WELL BEFORE YOU SIGN..<br />\n<br />\nA SIMPLE CHANGE OF WORD FROM&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>SHALL</b></span>&nbsp;TO&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>SHOULD</b></span>&nbsp;IN THE TEXT ( CHICANERY ) CAN KILL BHARATMATA...</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THIS IS WHY NO AGREEMENT MUST BE SIGNED WITHOUT A \"</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PARAMOUNT CLAUSE</span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\">-- IF THIS SIGNED AGREEMENT IMPINGES ON INDIAs SOVEREIGNTY -IT SHALL BE NULL AND VOID \"</span></span></div>\n<br />\nEXAMPLE --MOST CRITICAL--<br />\n<br />\n\u201cDeveloped country Parties SHALL continue taking the lead by undertaking economy-wide absolute emission reduction targets. Developing country Parties SHOULD continue enhancing their mitigation efforts\u2026\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn earlier versions of the agreement, the word SHALL in the first sentence had been SHOULD.<br />\n<br />\nThe change from should to shall introduced new but HUMONGOUS legal and financial requirements.<br />\n<br />\nParis climate deal. Article 4.4 stated: \"Developing country Parties SHOULD continue enhancing their mitigation efforts\u2026\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, the goal of developing countries is to continue improving their efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.<br />\n<br />\nThe word should does not express a legal requirement. But shall, in the case of the climate agreement, does.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 4.4 of the Paris climate deal stated that developed countries \u201cshall continue taking the lead by undertaking economy-wide absolute emission reduction targets.\u201d<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">JOHN KERRY HELD UP THE AGREEMENT TILL THE CHANGE WAS DONE \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHALL</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" TO \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHOULD</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\nFrench leaders told John Kerry that someone must have made a typing mistake.<br />\n<br />\nHours later, delegates from 195 countries were ARM TWISTED into signing the climate deal.<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS IS ONE OF THE MOST POTENT SENTENCES I HAVE WRITTEN IN MY BLOG TILL TODAY</span><br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF 0F--<br />\nPRAKASH JAVEDEKAR<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nCOMMERCE MINISTER<br />\nENVIRNMONENT MINISTRY<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nVENKAIH NAIDU<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL.<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\n<br />\nDO IT NOW !</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; HE WAS THE FIRST VC OF AMU..<br />\n<br />\nJEW SIR AGA KHAN WAS MADE THE PRO-CHANCELLOR OR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;KAIKHUSRAU JAHAN</span></b>&nbsp;, BEGUM OF BHOPAL WAS THE CHANCELLOR OF AMU. .. IMAGINE A WOMAN CHANCELLOR OF A MUSLIM UNIVERSITY--ONLY ROTHSCHILD COULD HAVE PULLED THAT OFF.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN BEFORE WORLD WAR 1 STARTED ROTHSCHILD MADE HER THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE LADIES ASSOCIATION.. SHE WAS MADE DAME GRAND CROSS OF THE BRITISH EMPIRE.. BAAP REH !<br />\n<br />\nHER SON JEW&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HAMIDULLAH KHAN&nbsp;</span></b>WAS AN AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD..HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF THE CHAMBER OF PRINCES.&nbsp; &nbsp;SIR FATHER-IN-LAW</span></b>&nbsp;)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;SIR MUHAMMED IQBAL&nbsp;</span></b>( POET ) IS PAKISTANs NO 1 CITIZEN..<br />\n<br />\nAt Heidelberg Germany, one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, TILL TODAY NOBODY KNEWS HOW GOLDEN CAR CITY OF FORD BECAME A GRAVEYARD..&nbsp; &nbsp;IT TAKES AN INDIAN BLOGGER TO REVEAL THIS.</span></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Detroit produced more than 5.4 million vehicles in 1929.. The Detroit car workers were the highest paid not only in USA but the whole world.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ford paid 5.30 USD a day per day \u2014 more than twice what Chrysler and Chevrolet were paying. Ford could afford to. 57% of the cars in the whole world were Fords. 255 Ford cars were produced every hour; more than 6,100 per day.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The country was paving roads and building bridges. More cars were creating more jobs making steel, glass and rubber. Detroit was booming. People were coming from across the continent, and even as far away as Europe.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Ford was the most important man in the most important industry in the most important economy in the world. Till he got on the wrong side of Jew Rothschild..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">On Tuesday, Oct. 29, 1929 the stock market crashed. It was engineered by Jew Rothschild\u2019s agents .. By 1930, the greatest economy in the history of the world had collapsed.</span></span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Unemployed workers don\u2019t buy a new car; unemployed auto workers don\u2019t buy a new refrigerator; unemployed refrigerator workers don\u2019t buy new anything. Pretty soon you have a full-scale depression.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In Detroit, Prohibition had been in effect for 10 years, but KOSHER nightclubs thrived and KOSHER funded gangs controlled the liquor trade. Auto production in Detroit plummeted.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A wave of bank closures wiped out the life savings of many unemployed workers and retirees, as every neighborhood bank ( Rothschild controlled ) in Detroit went out of business. There was no Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation insurance on bank deposits then.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On March 7, 1932 , 5900 unemployed Ford car workers marched in the Ford Hunger March from Detroit to Ford's River Rouge plant in Dearborn ( the main Ford factory that housed the company's employment office)-- organized by Rothschild\u2019s agent commie JEW John Schmies, communist candidate for mayor of Detroit, and led by German Jew Albert Goetz.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On March 6, William Z. Foster, secretary of the Communist labor federation known as the Trade Union Unity League, gave a speech in Detroit in preparation for the march. There were 14 demands that the marchers intended to present to Henry Ford who had insulted JEWS.. The workers' fourteen-point list of demands included jobs for laid-off employees, the right to organize unions, and highly increased wages.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By 1932, foreclosures, evictions, repossessions and bankruptcies were commonplace, and the unemployed felt despair. Rotshchild\u2019s commie agent JEW William Z. Foster was the General Secretary of the party in 1929 with the support of the Comintern ( Communist International) of JEW Lenin..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">William Z. Foster ran for President of the United States on the Communist Party ticket.. This commie party was led by NEOCONS ( Jewish commies ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On March 12, 1932, more than 67000 people participated in a funeral procession for the four dead marchers, who were buried side by side in Woodmere Cemetery in Detroit. The slogan of the funeral march was \"Smash the Ford Terror\".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Detroit Mayor Frank Murphy in the payroll of Jew Rothschild called Henry Ford a \"terrible man\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nine years later, on April 11, 1941, after a ten-day sit down strike by 42,000 Ford workers, Henry Ford was armtwisted into signing a collective bargaining agreement with the United Auto Workers union ( UAW ) which gave full control of Ford industry to Jew Rothschild.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The Ford Motor Company, one of the richest employers, had laid off 74% of its employees as they company ran into huge losses .<br />\n<br />\nOn Nov. 17, 1933, the United States recognized the Soviet government of JEW Stalin\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1935 JEW Franklin Roosevelt\u2019s signing of the Wagner Act helped the cause for unionization, guaranteeing workers the right to collective bargaining.<br />\n<br />\nOn 1 April 1941, Ford workers conducted a walkout in order to protest the firing of eight union members. Because of the strike, the River Rouge plant was forced to close down. On 11 April, 1941 Henry Ford agreed to sign a contract with the United Auto Workers union ( UAW ) , enabling all Ford workers to be protected under the union.</div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; Was it due to him publishing 'The protocols of the elders of Zion' through the newspaper in 1920?<br />\nWho wrote it in Russia originally?</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8552130792182231445\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1525364282041#c8552130792182231445\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">May 3, 2018 at 9:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1918, Henry Ford purchased his hometown newspaper, The Dearborn Independent\u2014breaking Rothschild\u2019s monopoly over US media.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A year and a half later, he began publishing a series of articles that claimed a vast Jewish conspiracy ( led by a German Jew named Rothschild ) was infecting America. The series ran in the following 91 issues.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ford bound the articles into four volumes titled \"The International Jew,\" and distributed half a million copies to his vast network of dealerships and subscribers</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Ford was rich and powerful, but he did NOT know the extent of Rothschild\u2019s power, and his control over judges, police , mafia and White House. .</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Throughout The Dearborn Independent, Ford published articles that would refer to Jews in every possible context as at the root of America and the world's ills. Strikes: It was the Jews. Any kind of financial scandal? The Jews. Agricultural depression? The Jews. So \"the Jew,\" in a way, became the symbol of a world that was being manipulated and controlled.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FORD TOLD THE NAKED TRUTH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">What Henry Ford says, people stop and listen. There are people who talked about him as a potential presidential candidate in the 1920s. Henry Ford's ability to gain a national audience with his words made him a very dangerous person for Rothschild and his Jewish cabal.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild whipped up passions and wrote things that Ford never said-- that the Jew as a particular social type who had defective mental and moral abilities\u2014that the Jews killed Christ ( who never existed ) \u2013 that the Jews made money off the war, the Jews are profiteers, that the the Jews cheat you in business\u2014that the Jews have a certain phenotype: the Jew has a hook nose, the Jew is loud, the Jew talks with his hands BLAH BLAH.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Protocols of the Elders of Zion originally came from Russia, and was translated into English. The Protocols, was the record of secret meetings of Jewish leaders, describes a sinister Jewish conspiracy to dominate the world.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The term \u201cProtocols of The Wise Elders of Zion\u201d, was coined by German Jewish Jesuit Adam Weishaupt and his master, Mayer Amschel Rothschild (1776). Adam Wesihaupt would later murder George Washington and take the chair of the US President , without anybody knowing .. The details of the French revolution was chalked out by Adam Weishaupt.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Every iconic building in Washington DC had a cornerstone laid down under a Masonic ritual (i.e. Capitol building -laid by George Washington ( actually German Jew Adam Weishaupt ) , the Washington Monument, the Smithsonian, the White House, the Independence Hall in Philadelphia -laid by Benjamin Franklin etc</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Model T Ford, launched in Detroit in 1908.. Ford's Model T was successful not only because it provided inexpensive transportation on a massive scale, but also because the car signified innovation for the rising middle class and became a powerful symbol of America's age of modernization.. The Model T was Ford's first automobile mass-produced on moving assembly lines with completely interchangeable parts, marketed to the middle class. Model T became so famous, people considered it a norm. More than 15 million Model Ts were manufactured in all, reaching a rate of more than 10,000 cars a day in 1925, or 2 million annually..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">The Model T and Volkswagen are similar cars because the Germans Jew workers stole the Ford design and sent it to Germany. .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Volkswagen was automaker founded on 28 May 1937 by the German Labour Front under JEW Adolf Hitler and headquartered in Wolfsburg. Rothschild was a sleeping partner with major stake in the car factory.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">To sell his Volkswagen cars Rothschild needed to STOP the export of Ford cars to Europe. Pretty soon Volkswagen knocked of Ford\u2019s Model T as the No 1 selling car.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY REVELATIOS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>58.09 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM REVEALING ONLY 2%</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2514935488816632213\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_190M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1525367274643#c2514935488816632213\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 3, 2018 at 10:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_190MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe International Jew is a four-volume set of books which exposed Rothschild and his Jews.. It was distributed in the early 1920s by Henry Ford.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_International_Jew</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Dearborn Independent, also known as The Ford International Weekly, was a weekly newspaper established in 1901, and published by Henry Ford from 1919 through 1927. The paper reached a circulation of 900,000 by 1925, second only to the New York Daily News run from the shadows by Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nHenry Ford knew that Jew Rothschild would start world wars to carve out the state of Israel and to make money out of war. Ford wrote that parasite Jews, in their role as financiers, contributed nothing of value to society.<br />\n<br />\nFord once bit into a candy bar and, finding it not as good as it once had been, said \"The Jews have taken hold of it. They've cheapened it to make more money\".<br />\n<br />\nIn 1915 Ford blamed Jews for instigating World War I, saying \"I know who caused the war: German-Jewish bankers.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn 1925, Ford said \"What I oppose most is the international Jewish money power that is met in every war. That is what I oppose \u2013 a power that has no country and that can order the young men of all countries out to death.\"<br />\n<br />\nOne of the articles, \"Jewish Power and America's Money Famine\", asserted that the power exercised by Jews over the nation's supply of money was insidious, depriving farmers and others outside the banking coterie of money when they needed it most. The article asked the question: \"Where is the American gold supply? ... It may be in the United States but it does not belong to the United States.\" It concluded that Jews controlled the gold supply and, hence, American money<br />\nAnother article, \"Jewish Idea Molded Federal Reserve System\", was a reflection of Ford's distrust of the Federal Reserve System and its proponent, Paul Warburg. Ford believed the Federal Reserve system was secretive and insidious<br />\n<br />\nMany issues of the Independent comment extensively upon The Protocols of the Elders of Zion. The first mention of the Protocols appears in the issue of July 10, 1920, the seventh installment of its \"International Jew\" series.<br />\n<br />\nAlso, in 1920\u201321 the Independent carried a series of articles expanding on the themes of financial control by Jews, entitled:-----<br />\n<br />\nJewish Idea in American Monetary Affairs: The remarkable story of Paul Warburg, who began work on the United States monetary system after three weeks residence in this country<br />\nJewish Idea Molded Federal Reserve System: What Baruch was in War Material, Paul Warburg was in War Finances; Some Curious revelations of money and politics.<br />\nJewish Idea of a Central Bank for America: The evolution of Paul M. Warburg's idea of Federal Reserve System without government management.<br />\nHow Jewish International Finance Functions: The Warburg family and firm divided the world between them and did amazing things which non-Jews could not do<br />\nJewish Power and America's Money Famine: The Warburg Federal Reserve sucks money to New York, leaving productive sections of the country in disastrous need.<br />\nThe Economic Plan of International Jews: An outline of the Protocolists' monetary policy, with notes on the parallel found in Jewish financial practice.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/worth-more-than-sum-total-of-entire.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe ADL mobilized prominent Jews to publicly oppose Ford's message. They formed a coalition of Jewish groups for the same purpose and raised constant objections in the Detroit press. Before leaving his presidency early in 1921, Rothschild\u2019s agent Woodrow Wilson joined other leading Americans in a statement that rebuked Ford and others for their antisemitic campaign<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8128712108147960061\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_63M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/17185209942630993187\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">S Singh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/henry-ford-victim-of-jewish-retribution_6.html?showComment=1525669897989#c8128712108147960061\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">May 7, 2018 at 10:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_63MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain, I am attached to the PMO. We are regularly reading your blog for inputs in policy. Our officials are publicly rejecting suggestions so that deshdrohis do not suspect anything. Marx clung so dearly to Hegel that he ended up espousing a sort of \u201cCalvinism without God,\u201d turning Marxism into a quasi-religious ideology..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nHis Hegelian ideology led him to espouse a most unscientific socialism. Marx called his theory \u201cscientific socialism,\u201d not because he followed the scientific method, but merely because it was dialectical and materialist.&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nDialectics is not scientific as much as practical. Materialism is a metaphysical creed, not science.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nMarx baby lifted from the works of Carl Menger and Murray Rothbard.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nMarx does not condemn the capitalist. Instead, he dissects the structural constraints inherent in the dominance of capital.</div>\n<span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: xx-small;\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: small;\">Marx gets overly caught up in economistic drivel and pedantic UNREADABLE nonsense, so as to sound like the intelligensia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: small;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: xx-small;\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">To an intelligent man Marx sounds like a CUNT.</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: xx-small;\"></span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DARES ROMILA THAPAR, SUNEET VARMA, DANIEL RAJA , SITARAM YECURY, BRINDA KARAT , PRAKASH KARAT ETC TO DEBATE ON DAS CAPITAL LIVE ON TV... Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771090590#c7174753694009767256\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCommunism collapsed 3 decades ago\u2014but our JNU commie and pathetic commie leaders keep the ideology alive..<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s cousin JEW Karl Marx did not invent communism. Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br />\n<br />\nWhat, then, was his contribution?<br />\n<br />\nMuch of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... Marx saw free trade as positive because it undermines established nations and cultures.<br />\n<br />\nMillions of people are still under the misapprehension that Marxism / Communism is against profiteering dishonest banks and multi national companies.. The Rothschild banking family - the richest and most powerful banksters, for the past 200 years - financed Karl Marx's pretense of an attack on the profiteering dishonest.banksters, in order to fool the masses, and it worked. ..<br />\n<br />\nMarx's hidden message was: \u201cForget your individual rights and privileges and trust in the State and the Trade Unions, and they'll do your thinking for you.\u201d ..Millions of people believed that nonsense, and subsequently allowed 'others' to do their thinking for them.<br />\n<br />\nThe trade unions and the governments are ALL working for the Rothschild's - who own the banks, including Bank of England, US Federal Reserve,and all the big multi national companies, dangle politicians like rag dolls and hold all of the people as tax-debt slaves, through their corrupt central banks and their funny money.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's writing style was a calamity: full of sometimes puerile vehemence, Marx heaped scorn on his opponents, inaugurating the long Marxist tradition of mercilessly deriding anyone with incorrect opinions. In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. Some Marxist \"laws\" are vague and can be interpreted differently, but these interpretations generally fall into one of the aforementioned categories of flaws as well.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771153288#c6777305185001996910\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGerman Jew Karl Marx had planned to write Das Kapital in multiple volumes. He finished the first. But when it came to writing the second, on realizing that he would face insurmountable intellectual hurdles ( including being charged of mindless plagiarism ) , he pleaded illness.. when in reality he was fit as a fiddle and going around doing everything else.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhat Marx accomplished was to produce such a comprehensive, dramatic, and fascinating vision that it could withstand innumerable empirical contradictions, logical refutations, and moral revulsions at its effects.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Marxian vision took the overwhelming complexity of the real world and made the parts fall into place, in a way that was intellectually exhilarating and conferred such a sense of moral superiority that opponents could be simply labelled and dismissed as moral lepers or blind reactionaries.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarxism was \u2013 and remains \u2013 a mighty instrument for the acquisition and maintenance of political power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKarl Marx's value theory and law of the tendency of the rate of profit to fall are a crock of shit.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx does not even understand socialism. Socialism cannot be accomplished only through class conflict and a proletarian revolution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES DAS KAPITAL IS THE BIGGEST TUB OF BULLSHIT.. EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production. Interestingly, Karl Marx also had his own drastic, political ideas that were far away from those of Adam Smith\u2019s.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">Adam Smith? Who the hell is Adam Smith?</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">Pray ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">Prithee?</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEconomic students need NO introduction. He is the father of Economics.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWe Indians need to know more about Adam Smith.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe British soldier in India thought that he was fighting for queen and country. Actually simple John Bull shed his blood for a German Jew. Rothschild had their own Hessian merceneray army, highly paid, who spoke no English. Whenever secrecy ,deceit and covert operations were involved , without even the British Parliament and Queen knowing about it , R0thschild used his hessian Regiment . The spoils went into his underground cellar.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOpium traders Rothschild took over India officially vide the Battle of Plassey in 1757 , and stopped all pretense of being traders, by amazing deceit which sprung from the warped brains of Adam Smith</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_1MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_1BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_1B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_2B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c946770418235861946\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771274067#c946770418235861946\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith used his deception model to end the Mughal Empire in India. There was supposed to be a great heroic Battle of Plassey in 1757, for the British East India Company under Robert Clive to take over India. The excuse was the incident called the Black hole of Calcutta.<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith ( born 5 June 1723 \u2013 died 17 July 1790) took ten years to write his economics gospel by way of a book \u201cThe Wealth of Nations \u201c , publishing it in 1776. . He never married, and he used to walk like a CHAKKA\u2014as he was an anal sex receiving gay . He was delusional too, sometimes in a morbid manner.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHe is also said to have put bread and butter into a teapot, drunk the concoction, upped his ante and made a hue and cry over the quality of tea . Another time our man Adam Smith without as much as a \u201cby your leave\u201d went out sleep walking in his nightgown in broad daylight and ended up 24 km outside of town, before nearby church bells brought him back to reality.<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith had OCD or obsessive compulsive disorder-just like Karl Marx..<br />\n<br />\nHis house used to look like a garbage dump as he hoarded everything.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMuch later in 1799, R0thschild would murder Tipu Sultan , and then make a huge pretense of a great war. By now Adam Smith was dead and gone. But the blue print was his alone.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWhen such MAD people write the gospel of economics, \" The Weath Of Nations\" you know what you will get. Much later Milton Friedman effectively took many of the basic principles set forth by Adam Smith and the classical economists and modernized them. This is the reason why economists fall into the same hole again and again and again.<br />\n<br />\nI am a perceptive ship Captain. I really don't care for mother hen's opinion as to how good the omelette on my breakfast plate is.<br />\n<br />\nNow let me digress and give you an brief introduction to the great American Depression of 1924. This is one of the holes I talked about before when all economists fell face down .<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith (1776) defined what was then called political economy as \"an inquiry into the nature and causes of the wealth of nations\".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe international bankers mentored by Rothschild installed a Central Bank in 1913\u2026The Federal Reserve. And as long as this institution exists, perpetual debt is guaranteed.<br />\n<br />\nUnfortunately, economics is often viewed with confusion and boredom. Endless streams of financial jargon coupled with intimidating empirical mathematics quickly baffle and deter people from attempts at understanding it.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, the fact is, the complexity associated with the financial system is a mere mask, designed to conceal one of the most socially paralyzing structures humanity has ever endured.<br />\n<br />\nEvery single dollar in your wallet is owed to somebody by somebody; for remember, the only way the money can come into existence is from loans. Therefore, if everyone in the country were able to pay off all debts, including the government, there would not be one dollar in circulation. If there were no debts in Adam Smith modeled US money system, there wouldn`t be any money.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cFamine has never risen from any other cause but the violence of government attempting by improper means, to remedy the inconvenience of dearth.\u201d \u2013 Adam Smith<br />\n<br />\nAdam Smith talks above, about the Bengal famine, he initiated which killed 10.2 million Bengalis ( 102 lakh )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TOO 4-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_2MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_2B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6316195402887733477\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The socialist revolution would occur first in the most advanced capitalist nations and once collective ownership had been established then all sources of class conflict would disappear.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of Marx's predictions, communist revolutions took place in undeveloped regions in Latin America and Asia instead of industrialized countries like the United States or the United Kingdom\u2014all orchestrated by immoral white JEWS .<br />\n<br />\nMarxists used dialectic as a method of side-stepping and evading criticisms, rather than actually answering or addressing them..<br />\n<br />\nMarxism has established itself as a dogmatism which is elastic enough, by using its dialectic method, to evade any further attack\u2014 a MAD form of reinforced dogmatism<br />\n<br />\nFORGET ABOUT RULE OF THE PEOPLE \u2013 MARXIST COMMUNISM CREATED THE WORST DESPOTS WHO RULED WITH THE LOADED GUN . ALL THIS SHOULD HAVE BEEN FIGURED OUT BY INTELLECTUALS WHO FIRST READ THE SHIT BOOK \u201cDAS KAPITAL\u201d<br />\n<br />\nREDISTRIBUTION OF PROPERTY TRANSLATED TO GRABBING LAND IN INDIA AND ELSEWHERE<br />\n<br />\nRead all 8 parts of the post below\u2014<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\nRead all 11 parts of the post below-<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe only creations published after passing the COMMIE PARTY censorship committee were those that hailed the accomplishments of the Communist Party or those that encouraged others to believe in ideological utopias such as the class struggle or the supremacy of communism over capitalism.<br />\nCollectivization was just a ploy of denying the right to private property. Despot commie leaders and their communist regime eliminated all those who opposed forced collectivization.<br />\n<br />\nIn communism, individualism makes room for the collective. Ideals like freedom of speech were considered dangerous to the Communist party. Whither freedom ?<br />\n<br />\nCommunist ideology ceased to exist is because it was not able to adapt to outside conditions. Certain forms of communism, like the one practiced in China, managed to survive this long because it was able to react to outside stimuli such as the global economy and social changes.( sic ).. President Xi has been made leader for life to shove grave economic crimes under the carpet\u2014like fake growth , fake GDP etc<br />\n<br />\nInnovation is one of the most important aspects that offers cohesion to society. Without change, society will fall prey to archaic practices. Commie leaders did not have the cerebral wherewithal to create change for the better \u2013 if any citizen tried to point faults at the leadership\u2014he was shot dead for being a DAMN DISSIDENT<br />\n<br />\nEconomy dictates that the price of a product is formed when the offer meets demand. Also, there are other financial mechanisms used to determine prices and to regulate competitiveness on the global market. On the other hand, the communist doctrine thought that the only way of distributing wealth was to form a so-called command economy, an organism that would determine how the resources should be spent. Naturally, this type of economy will substantially increase the disparity between those who were in charge and the layman.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of communism is riddled with tales of atrocities committed against those who did not embrace the communist doctrine.<br />\n<br />\nFamine, mass executions, overwork, are tools of the trade which shaped the communism blood-thirsty demeanor.<br />\n<br />\nThe society envisioned by Rothschild agents JEWS--Marx, Engels, Lenin, Stalin and others is just a utopia, making communism the grandest and most CHOOTIYA social experiment ever performed by humankind. From the lack of rights to obsessive control, communism was like a time bomb ready to explode at any moment.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_15MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_15B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_16B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px; text-indent: 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9115314016125049640\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_16M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. I asked the interpreter why is he not talking\u2014is he dumb? Well he was the Chauffeur of the Chairman\u2014getting same wages ..<br />\n<br />\nA nuclear scientist gets same wages as his shit house cleaner. THERE IS NO NEED FOR THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE TO GIVE REASON--ESPECIALLY IF IT IS TO BE PUBLISHED IN THE MEDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIF UNACCOUNTABLE ( TO WE THE PEOPLE ) SUPREME COURT COLLEGIUM SENDS BACK THE SAME NAME AGAIN -- IT IS INDISCIPLINE ..<br />\n<br />\nAND NOW IT IS THE PLEASURE OF THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE TO PUNISH ( LOSS OF PROMOTION - LOSS OF SALARY RISE ) THE RECALCITRANT JUDGES...<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT REDUCE THE SANCTITY OF THE JUDICIAL SYSTEM...<br />\n<br />\nIN THE FIRST PLACE-- OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM..INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THIS PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO ARE THESE JUDGES ?<br />\n<br />\nARE THEY SOME GOLDEN KNIGHTS ?<br />\n<br />\nSORRY--THESE ARE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS .. OUT OF THE POOL OF LAWYERS THE LOSER FOOT SLOGGING LAWYERS BECAME JUDGES TO COCK A NOOK AT THEIR SUCCESSFUL RICH LAWYER COLLEAGUES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE EX-CJI KG BALAKRISHNAN WAS NOT EVEN QUALIFIED TO BE SUPREME COURT JUDGE--LEAVE ALONE CJI... HE WAS A CHRISTIAN MASQUERADING AS A DALIT HINDU...HIS FATHER WAS A CHRISTIAN.<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution confers the power of appointment of judges on the President of India i.e. the Government of India to be made in consultation with the Chief Justice of India and other judges of the Supreme Court. How then did a collegium of judges of the Supreme Court come to exist and come to possess this UNIQUE power?<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court rewrote the provisions of the Constitution for appointment of judges and appropriated the power to appoint judges by the judges-- when this is amazing Judicial over reach .<br />\n<br />\nThe collegium method was created as a result of two judgments of the Supreme Court, first in 1993 (Supreme Court Advocate-on-Record Association case) and by a follow-up President\u2019s Reference to the Court in 1998<br />\n<br />\nBy the first case the power was vested in the Chief Justice of India in whom it was held the primacy lay in appointments assisted by two judges of the Supreme Court. In the second case the court took away the primacy of the Chief Justice of India and vested the power in a collegium of the Chief Justice of India and four senior-most judges of the Supreme Court.<br />\n<br />\nThe clear intention of the Constitution makers in the Constituent Assembly debates of not making the Chief Justice of India the final authority was disregarded.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Inversing the constitutional provisions, the Chief Justice of India and the collegium became the initiator and appointer of judges, and the President of India was illegally and unconstiutionally REDUCED to be a NAPUNSAK formal approver in the process. Foreign forces were involved in this humongous subversion..</span></div>\n<br />\n.Indeed, in the second judgment of 1998 the Court went to the extent of extracting a statement from the government that it was not seeking a reconsideration of its earlier judgment of 1993, and DEEP STATE controlled government would also accept and binding the judgment it was delivering.<br />\n<br />\nThe essential features of this judicially created system of appointments is that the collegium selects judges on their own assessment of the merits of a person and the government is bound to appoint the selected person except in a rare case of the collegium having overlooked some aspect of the incumbent not being a suitable judge.<br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY-- LO AND BEHOLD - THE ELECTED EXECUTIVEs VIEW CAN BE KICKED INTO THE DUSTBIN BY THE COLLEGIUM MELORDS AND THEY COULD RESSERT THEIR CHOICE ( AS IS HAPPENING WITH KM JOSEPH NOW )<br />\n<br />\nThe executive has thus ZILCH role in the appointment of judges as a result.<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO PLAY GOD.<br />\n<br />\nIt is EASY to comprehend that there is FOREIGN HAND in the new hijacked system of kicking the Constitution\u2019s prescription.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_181BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; JUDICIARY CAN ONLY INTERPET LAWS--AND THAT TOO WHEN ASKED FOR IT ( NOT BY VESTED PIL )..</span></div>\n<br />\nIn prescribing the appointment to judges of the Supreme Court and the High Courts by the collegium, the Supreme Court did not realise the burden it was imposing on the collegium of selecting judges for the Supreme Court and High Courts and transferring them from one High Court to another.<br />\n<br />\nAt any given time there are two to three vacancies in the Supreme Court, and 200 in the 22 High Courts and the transfer of a number of judges to be made. An administrative task of this magnitude must necessarily detract the judges of the collegium from their principal judicial work of hearing and deciding cases.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The collegium neither has a secretariat to shoulder this burden nor an INTELLIGENCE BUREAU to make appropriate inquiries of the competence, character,&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">loyalty to the watan</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, and integrity of a proposed appointee.</span></span></div>\n<br />\nBEFORE 1947 ALMOST ALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES WERE IN THE PAYROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nLacking this infrastructural backup the collegium resorts to ad hoc informal consultations with other judges in the Supreme Court who are expected to know the merits of a proposed appointee from a High Court or occasionally by sounding a member of the Bar.<br />\n<br />\nThese methods are poor substitutes for a full time intensive collection of data about an incumbent, his loyalty to the watan, his work, standing, merit, integrity and potential which requires to be made considerably in advance for filing in the vacancy.<br />\n<br />\nBesides, the collegium\u2019s deliberations are secret, the system is opaque and the choice of a judge is only known when his name is forwarded to the Government for formal appointment.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE RECENT PAST COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SAVED SEVERAL TRAITORS WHO HAVE TRIED TO KILL BHARATMATA .<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">INDIA MUST DESTROY THE COLLEGIUM SYSTEM AND GO FOR NJAC..&nbsp; When Zeifman was asked why Rodham was fired, he explained: \u201cBecause she was a liar. He defined a deep political system or process as one in which institutional and non-institutional bodies, criminal syndicates, politicians, JUDGES, media, corporations and leading government employees, resort to \u201cdecision-making and enforcement procedures outside as well as inside those sanctioned by law and society. What makes these supplementary procedures \u2018deep\u2019 is the fact that they are covert or suppressed, outside public awareness as well as outside sanctioned political processes.\u201d<br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">WE KNOW THESE JUDAS INDIAN JUDGES --WHISTLE BLOWERS HAVE SPOKEN..</span></div>\n<br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 3--BELOW</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0oujIa2_H6w/WraMI2YGB4I/AAAAAAABZ0I/iu-4Y6qa69YqKgi5MNd3vHiGegOUUKhQACLcBGAs/s1600/Photo0141.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1375\" data-original-width=\"900\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0oujIa2_H6w/WraMI2YGB4I/AAAAAAABZ0I/iu-4Y6qa69YqKgi5MNd3vHiGegOUUKhQACLcBGAs/s320/Photo0141.jpg\" width=\"209\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The term \"deep state\", describes a\nform of cabal that coordinates efforts by government employees to influence\nstate policy without regard for democratically elected leadership.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A state within a state or a deep state is a\npolitical situation in a country when an internal organ (&nbsp; deep state ), such as the armed forces or\npublic authorities (intelligence agencies, police, secret police,\nadministrative agencies, and branches of government bureaucracy), &nbsp;does not respond to the civilian political\nleadership.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Qhej29hBLww/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qhej29hBLww?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
