font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The deep state can also take the form of\nentrenched unelected career civil servants acting in a non-conspiratorial\nmanner, to further their own interests (e.g. continuity of the state as\ndistinct from the administration, job security, enhanced power and authority,\npursuit of ideological goals and objectives, and the general growth of their\nagency) and in opposition to the policies of elected officials, by obstructing,\nresisting, and subverting the policies and directives of elected officials.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was pleasing to see\nDonald Trump and Vladimir Putin greet each other cordially at the last G20\nsummit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a later press\nconference in Hamburg, where the G20 summit was held, Russian President\nVladimir Putin said he believed there was a chance for restoring the badly\nfrayed US-Russia relations. He praised Trump for being thoughtful and rational.\n\u201cThe TV Trump is quite different from the real life one,\u201d quipped Putin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cIt\u2019s an honor to meet you,\u201d said the American\npresident as he extended a handshake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The much-anticipated\nencounter came nearly seven months after Trump was inaugurated in the White\nHouse. Over that period, large sections of the US media have run an unrelenting\ncampaign accusing Trump of being a Russian stooge and alleging that Putin\nordered an interference operation in&nbsp; US\nelection to benefit Trump.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two men were due to\ntalk face-to-face for 30 minutes. As it turned out, their discussions went on\nfor two hours. They reportedly exchanged views on pressing matters of Syria,\nUkraine and North Korea among other things. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only days before the\nbig meeting, US media editorialists and pundits were warning Trump to confront\nPutin in an aggressive manner.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Washington Post, one of the leading\nanti-Russia voices, exhorted Trump to rap Putin on \u201cUS election meddling\u201d as if\nthe claim was a proven fact. It also urged the president to give notice to\nPutin that Russia had to accede to regime change in Syria. It was a get-tough\norder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To his credit, Trump\ndid not allow the Russophobia in the US media to influence his manner with\nPutin. He was cordial, respectful and open to listening to the Russian\nviewpoint on a range of issues. So much so that it appeared both leaders have\nagreed to work together going forward.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The US Deep State\ncomprising the military-intelligence nexus and their political, media machine\nin Washington does not want to normalize relations with Russia. Russian\nindependence as a powerful foreign state under President Putin is a problem\nthat rankles US global ambitions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\u2019s why the Deep State wanted anti-Russia\nhawk and Rothschild\u2019s agent Hillary Clinton to win the election. Trump\u2019s\nvictory upset their calculations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immediately following\nthe constructive meeting between the leaders, the US media started cranking up\nthe Russophobia again. The US media are vents for Deep State hostility towards\nTrump and his agenda for normalizing relations with Moscow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New York Times\nreported another breathless story about Trump\u2019s election campaign having\ncontact with \u201cKremlin-connected\u201d people. CNN ran opinion pieces on how the\npresident had fallen into a trap laid by Putin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is hard to stomach\nthis outlandish confabulation that passes for journalism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But it shows that Trump\nhis up against very powerful deep forces within the US establishment who do not\nwant a normalization with Russia. The US Deep State depends on confrontation,\nwar and endless militarism for its existence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>If NATO has to\nexist\u2014Russia has to be the enemy of USA.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;NATO is Jew Rothschild\u2019 private army<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State wants a\nworld populated by vassals over which US corporations have suzerainty. An\nindependent Russia or China or any other foreign power cannot be tolerated\nbecause that upends American ambitions for unipolar hegemony. Money is made by\nthe inner club Jews of Bilderberg Club<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trump\u2019s encounter with\nPutin was commendable because he did not succumb to toxic Russophobia and adopt\na stupid, mindless tough-guy posture. Instead, Trump reached out to Putin in a\ngenuine way, as two human beings should do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The US Deep State is\nnot about humanity or understanding. It is about maintaining perceived\ndominance over other humans, where anyone seen to be an obstacle is disposed of\nin the most ruthless way. The UN is an arm of the US deep state<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President John F\nKennedy was assassinated in broad daylight by the US Deep State because he\ndared to seek a normalization and peaceful coexistence with Moscow. The Deep\nState does not want normalization or peace with Russia or anyone else for that\nmatter because there are too many lucrative vested interests in maintaining the\nwar machine that is American capitalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What needs to change is\nthe US power structure through a democratic revolt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1521804839085#c7870091477529087765\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 23, 2018 at 5:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_76MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin mining is designed to solve hashes in the SHA-256 algorithm. SHA-256 is a 256-bit version of an algorithm that is used to encrypt messages sent over the internet. The NSA invented SHA-256.<br />\n<br />\nSHA-2 (Secure Hash Algorithm 2) is a set of cryptographic hash functions designed by the United States National Security Agency (NSA).<br />\n<br />\nCryptographic hash functions are mathematical operations run on digital data; by comparing the computed \"hash\" (the output from execution of the algorithm) to a known and expected hash value, a person can determine the data's integrity. ( but with the BACKSIDE OPEN to make ANHONI OUT OF HONI and viceversa )<br />\n<br />\nAs people's computers mine bitcoins, they are discovering solutions to SHA-256 hashes, which then get stored in to the blockchain, which is a digital record and repository of all activity within bitcoin to date.<br />\n<br />\nEach block is like one SHA-256 puzzle, that the computers try to solve.<br />\n<br />\nWhen computers mine for bitcoins, they are guessing solutions to that particular block's SHA-256 puzzle. When a solution is found, 12.50 bitcoins are rewarded to the miner who found the solution. So it's a lottery of sorts<br />\n<br />\nBUT LOTTERIES ARE RIGGED BY INSIDERS WHO KNOW HOW THIS WORKS --this is why everything is kept deliberately complicated.<br />\n<br />\nMiners pool together to form mining pools, where the winnings are shared proportionally among everyone, weighted by their total number of attempted solutions. That helps take the luck out of it so everyone can get more reliable income.<br />\n<br />\nIf you have a list of all the prime numbers and their solutions then that is a speedup to cracking a particular system using SHA-256, because you don't have to run all those calculations, you can simply look them up<br />\n<br />\nThe blockchain is an open distributed-computing SHA-256 solution repository, which enables hackers who know how to use it (like the NSA).</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">NSA has a backdoor to the SHA-256 algorithm</span></span></div>\n<br />\nNSA HAS A BAD TRACK RECORD<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin is not the \u2018one world currency\u2019 per se, but laying the framework for larger cryptocurrency projects. In the case of central banks, who control the global monetary system, that would manifest in \u2018Settlement Coin\u2019<br />\n<br />\nNSA/CIA works for KOSHER BIG BROTHER .. it was kept under wraps till Trump told he will DRAIN THE SWAMP and take on ROTHSCHILDs SHADOW GOVT running USA and CONTROLLING everything--like Mannargudi Mafia in Tamil Nadu<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 16px;\">BITCOIN IS THE BRAINCHILD OF BILDERBERG INNER KOSHER CLUB</span><br />\n<br />\nEURO WAS CREATED BY THE SAME KOSHER CLUB<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW WHY ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI IS QUIET ABOUT BITCOIN --HE SPOKE ABOUT IT A COUPE OF TIMES --PRAISING IT--IT IS ON YOUTUBE<br />\n<br />\nThe NSA ( controlled by KOSHER FED ) has the capability, the motive, and the operational capacity \u2013 they have teams of cryptographers, the biggest fastest supercomputers in the world<br />\n<br />\nNSA employs the best mathematicians and cryptographers in the world-on a NEED TO KNOW basis -making whistle blowing by NON-KOSHER and non-white difficult.<br />\n<br />\nNSA was one of the first organizations to describe a Bitcoin-like system--12 years before Satoshii Nakamoto did.<br />\n<br />\nONLY NSA HAS THE MOTIVATION TO DELARE THAT BLOCKCHAIN DATA IS ENGRAVEd ON ROCK WHEN IT IS ONLY ENGRAVED ON BUTTER TO BE MELTED AND ENGRAVED WITH FAKE DATA<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK MODI , JAITEY, RBI GOVERNOR-- ARE YOU REALLY BABES IN THE WOODS AS YOU PRETEND ? In fact, there has never been a more easily traceable method of payment. Every single transaction is recorded and retained permanently in the public \u201cblockchain\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nThe idea that the NSA would create an anarchic, peer-to-peer crypto-currency in the hope that it would be adopted for nefarious industries and become easy to track would have been a lot more difficult to believe before the recent leaks by Edward Snowden and the revelation that billions of phone calls had been intercepted by the US security services.<br />\n<br />\nASK PUTIN --THE KGB MAN--HE KNOWS WHAT NSA IS UPTO WITH BITCOIN AND BLOCKCHAIN<br />\n<br />\nMP Andrei Svintsov, demanded that bitcoin and digital currencies should be banned as part of a broader effort to stop capital flight. Bitcoin is the same strategy on a financial level \u2013 by using Bitcoin you\u2019re giving up your private transactional information.<br />\n<br />\nBy itself, it would not identify you per se (as the blockchain is \u2018anonymous\u2019 but the transactions are there in the public register, so combined with other information, which the NSA has a LOT OF \u2013 they can triangulate their information more precisely.<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin allowed NSA to collect a host of criminals on a network called \u201cSilk Road\u201d and who knows what other operations that happened behind the scenes.<br />\n<br />\nSilk Road was an online black market and the first modern darknet market, best known as a platform for selling illegal drugs. As part of the dark web, it was operated as a Tor hidden service, such that online users were able to browse it anonymously and securely without potential traffic monitoring. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: During the coup,\nover 300 people were killed[38] and more than 2,100 were injured. Many government\nbuildings, including the Turkish Parliament and the Presidential Palace, were\nbombed from the air.[59] Mass arrests followed, with at least 40,000\ndetained,[38][60] including at least 10,000 soldiers and, for reasons that\nremain unclear, 2,745 judges.[61][62] 15,000 education staff were also\nsuspended and the licenses of 21,000 teachers working at private institutions\nwere revoked as well after the government alleged they were loyal to G\u00fclen.[63]\nMore than 100,000 people have been arrested or fired from their jobs, on\naccusations of connections to G\u00fclen.[64][65] UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Sunny Leone's father is a Vohra</span><span style=\"color: #222222; font-family: sans-serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6yVjyJj7VQg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6yVjyJj7VQg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_89TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_88B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5909449378659751616\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_88M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1527542629977#c5909449378659751616\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2018 at 2:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_88MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHEN I DISCARDED GERMAN JEW MAX WEBER INTO THE VADAKAYIL GARBAGE BIN, SOMEONE HAD ASKED ME FOR REASONS.<br />\n<br />\nWELL I SHALL GIVE THE REASONS NOW.</div>\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">GERMAN JEW MAX WEBER IS THE FOUNDER OF THE MODERN DEEP STATE</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD CREATED BUREAUCRACY , SO THAT CLERKS IN HIS PAYROLL CAN SUBVERT THE SYSTEM, THE WAY THE LUTYENS BABUS DO TODAY..<br />\n<br />\nLUTYENS BABUS ARE MOSTY JNU COMMIES WHO HAVE NO LOVE FOR THE WATAN\u2014THEY HAVE BEEN BOUGHT WITH A PIECE OF SILVER.<br />\n<br />\nTODAY THESE DESH DROHIS ARE ALL SHITTING IN THEIR PANTS OR SARIS AS THE CASE MAY BE.<br />\n<br />\nBUREAUCRACY WAS FIRST CREATED IN GERMANY , BRITAIN AND FRANCE BY JEW ROTHSCHILD SO THAT HE COULD HIJACK THE GOVERNMENT AT WILL.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILDs AGENT JEW MAX WEBER PERFECTED THE BUREAUCRATIC DEEP STATE. HE IS KNOWN TODAY AS THE FATHER OF SOCIOLOGY<br />\n<br />\nAccording to Max Weber , bureaucratic administration means fundamentally domination through knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nWEBER WAS NOT INTELLIGENT ENOUGH TO UNDERSTAND DAMAGE DONE BY \u201cPRE-CONVEIVED NOTIONS\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MAX WEBER BASTARD CORRUPTED THE VARNA SYSTEM OF INDIA AND CEMENTED THE CASTE SYSTEM ., WHICH NEVER EXISTED BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nIn Weber's view, Hinduism in India, , was a barrier for capitalism. The Indian caste system made it very difficult for individuals to advance in the society beyond their caste.Activity, including economic activity, was seen as unimportant in the context of the advancement of the soul.<br />\n<br />\nIn Weber\u2019s view , the Indian social system was influenced by the concept of varna. Varna is not caste and caste is not Varna. This is a critical difference not understood by many. It directly linked religious belief and the segregation of society into status groups.<br />\n<br />\nWeber goes on to describe the Varna system (the Brahmins - priests, the Kshatriyas - warriors, the Vaishyas - merchants, the Shudras - laborers and the untouchables). He notes that the varna system prevented the development of urban status groups.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to Weber - the \"spirit\" of the varna system worked against the development of capitalism<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA HINDUS WERE DIVIDED INTO VARIOUS CASTES ALONG \u201cJOB LINES\u201d BY JEW ROTHSCHILD \u2014COBBLER, CARPENTER, GOLDSMITH, BLACK SMITH, FISHERMAN, STONE CUTTER, ETC<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nFrom the outside to ordinary citizens the bureaucracy was based on-recruitment by examination, training, promotion on merit, regular salaries and pensions, and standardized procedures.<br />\n<br />\nBureaucracy refers to both a body of non-elective government officials and an administrative policy-making group. Historically, a bureaucracy was a government administration managed by departments staffed with non-elected officials.<br />\n<br />\nToday, bureaucracy is the administrative system governing any large institution, whether publicly owned or privately owned. The public administration in many countries is an example of a bureaucracy, but so is the centralized hierarchical structure of a business firm. Since being coined, the word bureaucracy has developed negative connotations..<br />\n<br />\nThe German sociologist JEW Max Weber argued that bureaucracy constitutes the most efficient and rational way in which one can organize the human activity and that systematic processes and organized hierarchies are necessary to maintain order, maximize efficiency, and eliminate favoritism<br />\n<br />\nWeber wrote that the modern bureaucracy in both the public and private sector relies on the following principles:--<br />\n<br />\nFirst, it is based on the general principle of precisely defined and organized across-the-board competencies of the various offices. These competencies are underpinned by rules, laws, or administrative regulations.\"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_88BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedBTnAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_85T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedBTnAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_85TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_85TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_85TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedBTnAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_85TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_85TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedBTnAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_85TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_85TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_85TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedBTnAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_85B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4080938327343719308\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_85M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1527542728542#c4080938327343719308\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2018 at 2:55 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_85MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nFor Weber, this means--<br />\n--A rigid division of labor is established that clearly identifies regular tasks and duties of the particular bureaucratic system.<br />\n--Regulations describe firmly established chains of command and the duties and capacity to coerce others to comply.<br />\n--Hiring people with particular, certified qualifications supports regular and continuous execution of the assigned duties.<br />\n<br />\nWeber notes that these three aspects \"...constitute the essence of bureaucratic administration...in the public sector. In the private sector, these three aspects constitute the essence of a bureaucratic management of a private company.\"<br />\n<br />\nMain principles (characteristics):<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">##### UNWRITTEN RULE- LOYALTY TO JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO WILL REMAIN IN THE SHADOWS #########</span></b><br />\n--Specialized roles<br />\n--Recruitment based on merit (e.g., tested through open competition)<br />\n--Uniform principles of placement, promotion, and transfer in an administrative system<br />\n--Careerism with systematic salary structure<br />\n--Hierarchy, responsibility and accountability<br />\n--Subjection of official conduct to strict rules of discipline and control<br />\n--Supremacy of abstract rules<br />\n--Impersonal authority (e.g., office bearer does not bring the office with him)<br />\n--Political neutrality<br />\n<br />\nIn his 1922 essay Bureaucracy,published in his magnum opus Economy and Society, Weber described many ideal-typical forms of public administration, government, and business. His ideal-typical bureaucracy, whether public or private, is characterized by:--<br />\n<br />\n--hierarchical organization<br />\n--formal lines of authority (chain of command)<br />\n--a fixed area of activity<br />\n--rigid division of labor<br />\n--regular and continuous execution of assigned tasks<br />\n--all decisions and powers specified and restricted by regulations<br />\n--officials with expert training in their fields<br />\n--career advancement dependent on technical qualifications<br />\n--qualifications evaluated by organizational rules, not individuals<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">As democracies become more complex, they inevitably become bureaucratic.</span><br />\n<br />\nThere are good reasons for this. Bureaucracies are often the most efficient way of accomplishing complex tasks. They develop rules and procedures to handle the kinds of cases arising repeatedly, eliminating the need to think through the same problems again and again. People within bureacracies become experts.<br />\n<br />\nAND OF COURSE PRE-CONCIEVED NOTIONS ENGAVED IN STONE.. THIS IS THE PAST PRACTICE\u2014THIS IS THE WAY IT MUST BE DONE ( THE WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD WANTS IT )<br />\n<br />\nThe procedures and rules they devise render outcomes calculable \u2014 and thus predictable. This makes society as a whole more rational, letting people form reasonable expectations about the effects of their actions.<br />\n<br />\nDemocracy promotes bureaucracy for moral reasons too. Citizens of a democracy demand equal treatment before the law, which requires that the same rules are applied to all.<br />\n<br />\nBureaucrats claim authority over areas of culture \u2014 e.g., education and the arts \u2014 over which they have no expertise, and over which, perhaps, no one can have expertise. Their decisions increasingly serve their own interests ( READ AS ROTHSCHILDs INTERESTS ) rather than the interests of their society.<br />\n<br />\nDemocracy and the bureaucracy it spawns thus come into conflict with one another. Weber wrote, \"Democracy as such is opposed to the 'rule' of bureaucracy.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe administrators become a rule-giving class promoting its own power. They keep their procedures secret, keeping to themselves the knowledge that grants them a superior social position. The people find themselves increasingly powerless. They find themselves at the mercy of those they did not elect and cannot influence.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>Bureaucrats become autocrats. The people become their subjects.<br /><br />ELECTED LEADERS MAY COME AND GO..</b></span><br />\n<br />\nBureaucracy, Weber concludes, is among the hardest of social structures to destroy. It becomes a powerful weapon in the hands of those who control it.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD RULED !<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_85MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_85BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_85B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_86B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5480411387350895453\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_86M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1527542820461#c5480411387350895453\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2018 at 2:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_86MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nThose really in control, moreover, are not necessarily those nominally in control. Heads of state and other elected officials may come and go. The bureaucracy chugs on, impervious to their policies and goals.<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile, the moral principle that cases should be judged with equal justice for all falls by the wayside. The bureaucracy favors itself and its political allies, who vote in favor of larger budgets and greater spheres of authority.<br />\n<br />\nThis is the paradox of progressivism. In the name of democracy, it creates a bureaucracy threatening democracy.<br />\n<br />\nThe Progressive paradox is \u2018the curse of bigness,\u2019 . It is the deleterious effects of the expansion and centralization of business and government. As organizations grow, they become increasingly inaccessible and procedurally rational. Their capacity to remain accountable to their constituents is inversely proportionate to their efficiency.<br />\n<br />\nExpert bureaucrats rely on complicated schemes like insurance or subtle changes in promulgated regulations, which make it difficult for non-experts to engage as equals in ascertaining the relationship and judging their efficacy between policy measures and policy goals.<br />\n<br />\nBULLSHIT MODERN ECONOMICS IS ROTHSCHILDs ECONOMICS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWeber\u2019s analysis is a portrayal of the DEEP STATE .<br />\n<br />\nAmerica finds itself struggling against a bureaucracy displaying all the negative features he warned about. The deep state demands a greater share of the economy. It extends its reach beyond even education and the arts \u2014 to bedrooms and bathrooms. It insists on credentials which seem to reflect no real expertise but exclude people of the \"wrong\" social background.<br />\n<br />\nThe moral case for bureaucracy \u2014 that cases be decided with equal justice for all \u2014 falls away as well. The bureaucrats form an alliance with political parties ( Lutyens deep state is packed with JNU comnies with NO love for the watan ) which increasingly defines itself as the party of the deep state and strives to increase its authority over us.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the people finally get fed up and elect someone who understands the problem and promises to fight for them, the deep state does everything it can to ignore, undermine, and, if possible, destroy them.<br />\n<br />\nWe may not yet be experiencing \"a polar night of icy darkness,\" trapped in an \"iron cage,\" as Weber feared, but we are surely ensnared in an overlapping series of \"Weberian webs.\"<br />\n<br />\nWe seem unable to escape. What can we do?<br />\n<br />\nWeber\u2019s writings offer little hope. But there are hints at strategies for breaking out of the web. We need to make officials accountable to the people. For this there must be LIGHT ..<br />\n<br />\nCENTRAL LUTYENS MINISTRIES HAVE BEEN BOMBARDED WITH COMMENTS FROM THIS WEBSITE.. THEY IGNORED IT AT THEIR PERIL. NOW THEY ARE RUNNING SCARED.<br />\n<br />\nThe bureaucrats will do their best to keep that from happening. Under the Obama administration we saw serious misbehavior go unpunished again and again. It was meant to be that way with&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SES</span></b>&nbsp;created as a Hegelian Dialectic after WATERGATE.<br />\n<br />\nPursued ad hoc, the strategy is hopeless.<br />\n<br />\nReform needs to be structural to have a chance.<br />\n<br />\nWhat can we do?<br />\n<br />\nThe civil service should not be independent. Its objectivity is already a sham; one party has captured it. The voters need to be able to make their voices heard. Trump should be able to drain the swamp.<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK MODI TO PROFILE EACH AND EVERY LUTYENS BABU WHO HAS A NICE BUNGLOW FOR HIMSLEF, NICE SALARY, NICE BRIBES , BEDDED DOWN FR COSY RETIREMENT..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY \u2013FROM NOW ON, YOU BASTARDS WILL HAVE EXPIRY DATES TATTOED ON YOUR FOREHEADS<br />\n<br />\nBureaucrats should have term limits. All but a few essential agencies should too. A permanent bureaucracy threatens democracy. Reforms have no chance unless they challenge its permanence.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_86MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_86BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_86B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_87B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1076739932955733751\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_87M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1527543049153#c1076739932955733751\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2018 at 3:00 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_87MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3--<br />\n<br />\nWe need educational reform. Bureaucracy promotes specialization. It generates educational institutions \u2014 serving it and expressing its interests. We need to restore a broad education, one which cultivates as well as trains; expressing and instilling our civilization\u2019s values and DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nWe don\u2019t need commie theory to be taught in JNU .<br />\n<br />\nIt is better to shut down these strains like COMMIE SOCIAL SCIENCES which breeds CUNTS like BHINDOW SEAT and PROMOSSANN seeking Kanhaiya Kumar.<br />\n<br />\nRead all 11 parts of the post below--<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThat means taking control of education away from the bureaucracy ( and their mentors like DEEP STATE COMMIE Romila Thapar )and returning it to the people.<br />\n<br />\nMax Weber was the first to endorse bureaucracy as a necessary feature of modernity, and by the late 19th century bureaucratic forms had begun their spread from government to other large-scale institutions.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO MAX WEBER.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO HIS BOSS JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO ROMILA THAPAR \u2014 SHE DOES NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND GERMAN EJWS MARX AND WEBER ..MAHAMRUS OF SOCIOLOGY ..<br />\n<br />\nTRUE JOKE: SOMEONE ASKED ROMILA BABY\u2014WHY ARE YOU NOT MARRIED. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">United States, became the first society in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing the laws they live under!</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD AUR USKA DEEP STATE AGENTS KEE JAI !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAJJA HAI-- KISSI KOH KUCH NOHIN POTHA !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHAAL THODA MISTI DOHI KHAA !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM JUST TELLING 1%...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">59.03 %</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seed-zD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 2, BELOW--</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_24.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_24.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-InIqil_16lc/WrOBrceZ0WI/AAAAAAABZsA/YWbKP4Hlg-ECjivkI2AuQbkRp1MnL9x8wCLcBGAs/s1600/PhoRto0135.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"967\" data-original-width=\"768\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-InIqil_16lc/WrOBrceZ0WI/AAAAAAABZsA/YWbKP4Hlg-ECjivkI2AuQbkRp1MnL9x8wCLcBGAs/s320/PhoRto0135.jpg\" width=\"254\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></b><br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "191", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4974448448624284988/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "9193565802134686742", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-03-19T23:29:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-03-27T15:13:07+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTIyMTQzNzg3MDQxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/9193565802134686742", "title": "COMMENTS OVERFLOW FOR INOPERATIVE LOAD MORE BUTTON -- 14", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE CUNTS DON\u2019T EVEN KNOW WHAT IS HAPPENING !</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-43453713\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-43453713</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vf1SC9qwlCA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/vf1SC9qwlCA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_200TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_456B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8126272214402329114\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_456M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html?showComment=1521214408080#c8126272214402329114\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 16, 2018 at 9:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_456MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDUE TO METHANE LEAKS FROM US FRACKING THE GULF STREAM IS NOW METHANE LADEN MAKING IT WARMER AND CAUSED IT TO SHIFT ITS ORIGINAL COURSE WHICH EXISTED FROM THE BEGINNING OF TIME..<br />\n<br />\nThe Gulf Stream influences the climate of the east coast of North America from Florida to Newfoundland, and the west coast of Europe<br />\n<br />\nA warmer Arctic could halt the Gulf Stream, which brings warmer water and weather to north-western Europe. There\u2019s no land at the North Pole \u2014 it\u2019s a frozen ocean.<br />\n<br />\nIn winter in the Arctic it is complete darkness yet temperatures spiked 7.2 deg C The sun set in October 2017 and won\u2019t be seen until March 2018 , yet the thermometer reads like summer. Temperatures should be sub zero but are instead above the freezing point.<br />\n<br />\nThe extent of frozen seawater floating in the Arctic Ocean reached new lows in January / February in 4 decades of satellite monitoring.<br />\n<br />\nThe arctic was 6.1 degrees Celsius warmer than usual on February 2018<br />\n<br />\nFebruary 2018 also saw the greatest loss of Arctic sea ice since man came on earth.. Record-low levels of sea ice in the Bering Sea and the Arctic are shattering all known records.<br />\n<br />\nWarming Arctic decreases the strength of the jet stream. This air current acts like a tourniquet keeping Arctic air from bleeding out over North America.<br />\n<br />\nThe extreme weather that has brought snow and bitter cold to much of Europe in recent days is part of a remarkable temperature inversion that has also enveloped the Arctic with unprecedented warmth.<br />\n<br />\nThinner, receding ice allows the ocean\u2019s heat to escape more readily into the atmosphere, which the Arctic\u2019s highly stable lower atmosphere traps near the surface during the polar night. As a result, winter surface air temperatures have warmed more in the Arctic compared with the global average.<br />\nThinner sea ice is more mobile and deforms more easily from winds and currents. In February, southerly surface winds blew sea ice away from the northern shore of Greenland, causing the largest expanse of open ocean in winter ever recorded by satellites. S imilarly, the Bering Sea experienced extreme sea ice retreat this winter.<br />\n<br />\nWith more open ocean, major wind storms generate large waves that cause damaging coastal erosion, endangering oceanside towns.<br />\n<br />\nIn January 2018, the eastern US and Canada suffered a record-breaking \u201cpolar vortex\u201d that brought plunging temperatures and led Niagara Falls to freeze.<br />\n<br />\nA polar vortex is a mass of cold air that sits above the Earth\u2019s north and south poles. This cold air is controlled by a large pocket of low pressure, which rotates in an anti-clockwise direction at the North Pole and clockwise at the South Pole.<br />\n<br />\nA polar vortex is an upper level low-pressure area lying near the Earth's poles. There are two polar vortices in the Earth's atmosphere, overlying the North and South Poles. It ALWAYS exists near the poles, but weakens in summer and strengthens in winter. The term \"vortex\" refers to the counter-clockwise flow of air that helps keep the colder air near the Poles.<br />\n<br />\nThe jet stream is strongest in winter, when it has the greatest effect on weather in more densely populated parts of North America and Eurasia.<br />\n<br />\nWhen it rolls along in relatively steady waves, normal weather ensues, with spells of cold, snow and intermittent warm-ups.<br />\n<br />\nBut when it coils far to the south, bitter cold Arctic air spills southward along with it. Wriggling like a garden hose, each southward kink in the wind tends to be balanced out by a northward bend somewhere else. That can lead to the western states, even Alaska, being unusually warm and dry while the middle of the country and the eastern states freeze.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_456MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_456BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_456B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_457B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2429252259195472635\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_457M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html?showComment=1521214425624#c2429252259195472635\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 16, 2018 at 9:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_457MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNorthern jet stream would start shifting southward, which would bring cold polar air with it, causing colder and snowier North American winters. Loss of Arctic sea ice shifts the jet stream further south than normal resulting in increased rain during the summer in northwest Europe.<br />\n<br />\nNormally, when the vortex is strong and healthy, it helps keep a current of air known as the jet stream traveling around the globe in a pretty circular path. This current keeps the cold air up north and the warm air down south.<br />\n<br />\nBut without that strong low-pressure system, the jet stream doesn\u2019t have much to keep it in line. It becomes wavy and rambling. Put a couple of areas of high-pressure systems in its way, and all of a sudden you have a river of cold air being pushed down south along with the rest of the polar vortex system.<br />\n<br />\nWhen polar ice melts, more warmth escapes from the ocean into the air \u2014 which can affect the atmosphere up to 30km high, weakening the polar vortex.<br />\n<br />\nThis allows frigid air to break out of the Arctic and threaten Russia and Europe with cold extremes<br />\n<br />\nLarge quantities of methane are stored in the Arctic in natural gas deposits, permafrost, and as undersea clathrates. Permafrost and clathrates degrade on warming, thus large releases of methane from these sources<br />\n<br />\nThe release of methane from the Arctic is in itself a major contributor to global warming as a result of polar amplification.<br />\n<br />\nSea ice, and the cold conditions it sustains, serves to stabilise methane deposits on and near the shoreline, preventing the clathrate breaking down and outgassing methane into the atmosphere, causing further warming.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1036074235602000831\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_104M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; USA KNOWS \u2026<br />\n<br />\n- AFTER BOMBING NORTH KOREA TO THE STONE AGE -- THESE NORTH KOREAN SUBS CAN REDUCE USA TO THE STONE AGE..<br />\n<br />\nLARGE NATIONS LIKE RUSSIA -- THEY HAVE LAND BASED SECOND STRIKE CAPABILITY --UNLIKE CHUTKU NATIONS LIKE ISRAEL WHO CAN BE RAINED WITH MISSILES AND CONVERTED INTO A GAPING RADIOACTIVE HOLE..<br />\n<br />\nSMALL NATIONS CANT DEFEND THEMSELVES FROM NUCLEAR MISSILE RAIN -- LARGE LANDMASS IS A MUST TO SURVIVE A PRE-EMPTIVE FIRST STRIKE..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN USA RAINED 59 TOMAHAWK CRUISE MISSILES ON A SYRIAN AIRBASE --RUSSIANS TRIED OUT ELECTRONIC JAMMING ON THE FIRST 50% ( AND THEN ALLOWED THE BALANCE TO HIT )..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA MUST USE OUR OWN CHIPS.. WE NEED A 6 BILLION FABLAB-- TAIWAN COULD HELP..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS CHIP JAMMING ?..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8s4sKAMgYsU<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khibiny_(electronic_countermeasures_system)<br />\n<br />\nThe Khibiny EW system can create a deceptive electronic environment and help break through an enemy\u2019s layered air defenses\u2026<br />\n<br />\nJAMMING IS BETTER THAN SMASHING DOWN AN INCOMING MISSILE..<br />\n<br />\nKhibiny reflects an interrogation signal aimed at the aircraft by a radar from the ground or from another aircraft, and completely distorts it\u2026<br />\n<br />\nKrasuha-4 EW system allows almost every radio signal within a radius of 200 miles to be blocked\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN MODERN WARS ONLY AN IDIOT WILL TRY TO KNOCK OUT PUNCH AN INCOMING MISSILE IN THE AIR \u2013 USING A STUPID PATRIOT MISSILE . ..<br />\n<br />\nMISSILES / FIGHTER JETS / DRONES ARE KNOCKED OUT BY FRYING ITS ELECTRONIC CHIPS FROM A SATELLITE \u2026-- OR HIJACKING ITS CHIPS.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU HIJACK A CHIP, THE ENEMY DRONE IS YOURS - TO BE REPROGRAMMED AND USED AGAINST THE ENEMY\u2026<br />\n<br />\nEvery Zionist fighter jet manufacturer has a system to hijack the microprocessors by a KILL SWITCH that is activated by remote control\u2026<br />\n<br />\nEvery fighter jet has more than a 1000 chips - It is impossible to detect which one is the TROJAN HORSE CHIP\u2026<br />\n<br />\nUSA is worried about Chinese chip invasions and US Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), the Pentagon's R&amp;D wing, has a secrecy program named \" Trust in Integrated Circuits \"..<br />\n<br />\nThis US Trust program has already started its prequalifying rounds by sending to three contractors four identical versions of a chip that contained unspecified malicious circuitry. . .<br />\n<br />\nIt is practically IMPOSSIBLE to exhaustively test chips with BILLIONS of logic gates.- . .<br />\n<br />\nA mobile phone can be tested to check out if the phone's various functions work. Any extraneous circuitry that doesn't interfere with the chip's normal functions won't show up in these tests. And it is IMPOSSIBLE to detect this. . .<br />\n<br />\nTesting of chips is done \u2013say one in a thousand. ..It is IMPOSSIBLE to test every single chip .<br />\n<br />\nThis is why we must have our own chips with Russian / Taiwan help . ..<br />\n<br />\nTesting of a suspect chip, involves hundreds of man hours of grinding away a thin layer of the chip, put the chip into a scanning electron microscope, and then take a picture of it, repeating the process until every layer of the chip has been imaged. . .<br />\n<br />\nSpotting a tiny discrepancy amid a chip's many layers and billions of transistors is IMPOSSIBLE and the chip is destroyed in the process. . .<br />\n<br />\nFor ICs destined for mission-critical systems,.. - It is IMPERATIVE to test every chip without destroying it. . .<br />\n<br />\nA kill switch is any manipulation of the chip's software or hardware that would cause the chip to die outright -- To shut off a TEJAS 2 missile-launching electronics for example. .<br />\n<br />\nUsers will NEVER be aware of the malicious intrusion.. -- The enemy could use it to bypass battlefield radio encryption. . .<br />\n<br />\nIranians have found a way out of this. ..- This is why Zionists are worried\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_114BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; The fault, is IMPOSSIBLE to detect. . .<br />\n<br />\nThe chip fails due to electromigration: as current flowed through the wire, eventually the metal atoms would migrate and form voids, and the wire would break\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf the chip goes into a defense satellite, where it's supposed to work for 20 years but fails after 2 years -- you have a very expensive, inoperative satellite\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTo create a controlled kill switch, they add an extra logic to a microprocessor, which can be done either during manufacturing or during the chip's design phase. . .<br />\n<br />\nA saboteur could substitute one of the masks used to imprint the pattern of wires and transistors onto the semiconductor wafer .. so that the pattern for just one microchip is different from the rest\u2026<br />\n<br />\nModern fighter jets use field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs) .- A generic chip that can be customized through ENEMY software. . .<br />\n<br />\nIf you put the FPGA in a military system, someone else can reprogram it. .Libya and Syria has faced these problems\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBuilding a kill switch into an FPGA could mean embedding say 500 transistors within its billions. - Malicious chips have back doors. . .<br />\n<br />\nAn enemy who embeds a kill switch in every commercial router could devastate the whole national security without ever targeting the Defense Department directly. . .<br />\n<br />\nThe timer could be programmed with a single command - The whole defence mechanism fails. . .<br />\n<br />\nChip alteration can even be done after the device has been manufactured and packaged, provided the design data is available\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFocused-ion-beam etching machine ( FIB ) shoots a stream of ions at precise areas on the chip, mechanically milling away tiny amounts of material like Microsurgery with the beam acting like a tiny scalpel to remove material, cut a metal line, and make new connections\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThey can dig several layers to get to the intended target. - It is IMPOSSIBLE to detect.<br />\n<br />\nThey can reroute signals to the transistors that are already in place because chips commonly contain large blocks of unused circuitry, leftovers from previous versions of the design\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSoft X-ray tomography can be used to penetrate the chip for inspection but not strong enough to do irreversible damage\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThere is a technique called Boolean equivalence checking to analyze what types of inputs will generate certain outputs. This process can be reversed - to detect monkey play\u2026<br />\n<br />\nUnlike India, Pakistan has refused to allow KILL CHIPS in their defence mechanism both offensive and defensive. ..<br />\n<br />\nAt a recent hearing, a U.S. House Committee on Foreign Affairs addressed Pakistan's ongoing refusal to let the United States help it secure its nuclear arsenal with American technology\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf a country buying arms is NOT in NATO member -- they'll fit KILL CHIPS, so that that instrument cannot be used against NATO. ..<br />\n<br />\nAny time they can take their own toys down, by pressing a button in their bed room from under a blanket\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAgain, India must take Putin's help and build our own CHIPS.<br />\n<br />\nYou spend BILLIONS on a nuclear submarine fitted with a signature revealing chip -- it cannot hide underwater\u2026 Not one submarine owned by India can hide today\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOur nuclear submarines must have our own chips\u2026<br />\n<br />\nA submarine which can be POLLED and cannot hide - Is as good as dead in a war\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAnytime this submarine can be taken down -- every metre of its progress will be monitored\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_109MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_109BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_176b+seedexBD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5526233568967720180\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html?showComment=1521464561679#c5526233568967720180\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 19, 2018 at 6:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe World Bank defines NPO\u2019s as \u201cprivate organizations that pursue activities to relieve suffering, promote the interest of the poor, protect the environment, provide basic social services, or undertake community development.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP NOW-<br />\n<br />\nI have a Punjabi friend ( 4 striper ) . His Punjabi wife ( daughter of a TOP rank Armed force officer \u2013General / Admiral rank -- ?? ) confessed to me that their only son is a mental retard.. However she was very proud that though he is a restaurant waiter, he manages by writing down quickly\u2014 the food orders.<br />\n<br />\nMany years later I met him again.<br />\n<br />\nHe boasted that his son owns a latest model BMW car, and he showed me the picture .<br />\n<br />\nI kept quiet\u2014 maybe he had forgotten what his wife told me about her retarded son . He said he now heads an NGO.<br />\n<br />\nI COULD NOT BELIEVE THAT MY GOODFRIENDS ( THIS PUNJABI ) COUPLE WERE DOING FRAUD.. I DUG INFORMATION OUT OF THIS TALKATIVE WOMAN WHEN HER HUSBAND WAS NOT AROUND.<br />\n<br />\nSO SO SO-- These organizations do not exist for profit motive, hence called as Non Profit Organizations?<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nMOST FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs DO SUBVERSION FOR MONEY AND HEY, THEY GET EXEMPTED FROM INCOME TAX.<br />\n<br />\nYou see-- these organizations do the work which ought to have been done by the government; therefore it is termed as Non Governmental Organizations.<br />\n<br />\nYou see-- NGO\u2019s has charitable objects. Doing something good to others without expectations is charity. It is a selfless fuckin\u2019 act.<br />\n<br />\nExamples?--Non Profit Organization in India caring for disadvantaged elderly senior citizens--or restore children\u2019s rights.<br />\n<br />\nTrust, Society and Section 8 Company can seek registration u/s 12A to claim exemption under provisions of Income Tax Act\u20191961, if certain conditions are satisfied. Section 12A deals with registration of trust and section 12AA deals with procedure for registration of trust.<br />\n<br />\nNotwithstanding the fact that trust, society and section 8 companies are registered as per their respective acts, the registration under section 12A is necessary to claim exemption under Income Tax Act<br />\n<br />\nOnce the registration is granted to the trust, it will be hold good till the cancellation of registration. There is no provision which requires any renewal of registration.<br />\n<br />\nAudit is also prerequisite for claiming exemption under section 11 and 12\u2014 but there is a MAFIA helping out through loopholes<br />\n<br />\nFOREIGN FUNDED NGOs WHO SELL HARVESTED INDIAN KIDNEYS TO KOSHER FOREIGN FORCES ARE NOW THE GOOD SAMARITANS<br />\n<br />\nONCE A SHIPBOARD OFFICER OF MINE ( HE IS A TOP RANKING SHIPPING GOVT OFFICER ) ASKED ME TO DONATE TO HIS NGO FOR RETARDED CHILDREN..<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID THE DONATION WILL BE TAX FREE. I HAD FOUND OUT THAT HIS OWN SON IS A RETARD AND HENCE PRETENDED IGNORANCE \u2026<br />\nI DONATED A GOOD AMOUNT , BECAUSE HE WAS A GOOD OFFICER ( ORIYA GUY ) WHEN HE SAILED UNDER ME. LATER THE BANK MANAGER KEPT INSISTING THAT I MUST GET TAX BENEFIT FOR THE CHEQUE.. I JUST TOLD HIM\u2014YEAH\u2014LATER ..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDS ( LYNNE AND EVELYN ) CAME TO INDIA TO START THEIR OWN NGOs AND THEY DONATED THEIR LAREGE PORTAITS TO BE HUNG IN THE NGO OFFICES..<br />\n<br />\nCriminal businessmen and evil politicians who take bribes ( quid pro quo ) set up Trusts to launder their own un-taxed funds. By setting up a Trust and passing their own funds to it (usually after passing it through the accounts of others and in their names), builders, politicians ( shell companies ) and other unscrupulous individuals\u2014they legitimize their black money\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4224405916424189004\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html?showComment=1521464613728#c4224405916424189004\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 19, 2018 at 6:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nSubsequently, these funds are diverted for the benefit of the Trustees or whoever is the real person behind the trust. With the sheer number of NGOs in India, it is difficult to monitor effectively whether they are actually applying their income to the purposes for which they have been set up, as mentioned in the first point above.<br />\n<br />\nFurther, salaries to employees and other running expenses can also be easily inflated and diverted. Every once in a while we hear about NGOs where the supposed beneficiaries (children, elderly or animals) are ill-treated while the premises of the NGO is being used as a personal residence by the staff or Trustees and trust funds are used to purchase expensive cars and computers\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBut the most egregious misuse of the exemptions available is in the way certain NGOs issues receipts to donors purely to allow them to evade taxes. These unscrupulous NGOs issue receipts for much higher amounts than actually received to one person, allowing him or her to claim a large deduction u/s 80G, and then make up the difference by taking the money from their actual sponsor, who is only to happy to convert his black money into white by passing it into the Trust\u2019s account under another name\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOperating a commercial enterprise and disguising it as an NGO. Many schools and hospitals are run along strictly commercial lines, charging high fees and making a tidy profit. However they are being constituted as Trusts so as to avoid taxation.<br />\n<br />\nThink about every time a school takes a \u2018donation\u2019 over and above the fees. This is a donation to a Trust\u2019s corpus fund, but is tax-exempt. Similar examples would abound. Similarly, many religious places of worship make a lot of money from selling religious literature, idols, incense-sticks, food and so on, without paying a paisa of tax on the profit by taking advantage of the loopholes in tax law surrounding NGOs\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBoard of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI was formed in December 1928 by Jew Rothschild as a society, registered under the Tamil Nadu Societies Registration Act. The BCCI logo is derived from the emblem of Rothschild-- the Order of the Star of India. BCCI does not depend on the Government of India for its finances. SAB MIL BHAANTKE KHAATE HAIN \u2013 WE ALL KNOW !...<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nBCCI had avoided taxes on its income, claiming exemption as a charitable organisation. Although the Income Tax Department withdrew this exemption in 2007-08, BCCI only paid PEANUT taxes..<br />\n<br />\n--maybe MR THIN UPPER LIP CAN THROW MORE LIGHT ON THIS !<br />\n<br />\nA PRIVATE NGO BCCI RULES OVER CRICKET LIKE AN EMPEROR.
