Since Wiki says he was part of bhakti movement, it seems there's something amiss.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_231BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_244T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_244TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_244B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_231b+seedDzD\" kind=\"d\"><img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_231b+seedDzD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5437409416618331495\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_244M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html?showComment=1521481912862#c5437409416618331495\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 19, 2018 at 11:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_244MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nJew Rothschild's historians branded Thunchaththu Ezhuthachan ( died 1575 AD ) the FATHER OF MALAYALAM LANGUAGE ..and this is what is still being taught in Kerala schools.<br />\n<br />\nMind you-- this FAKE fellow ( who never existed ) has NOT written a single book. <br />\n<br />\nWhen I was taught about Thunchath Ezhuthachan , I asked my teacher--did he write any Malayalam books ?<br />\n<br />\nAnd he got pissed off with me for asking STUPID questions. All I am supposed to know is that Thunchath Ezhuthachan baby was a great writer.<br />\n<br />\nAll that is attributed to him are some translations--like Adhyatma Ramayanam for propadanda that the FAKE BHAKTI movement was strong in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nAnd yes -- he wrote about the FAKE twins of Sita , Luv and Kush .<br />\n<br />\nWe in India never heard of Sita's twin boys Luv and Kush till the white invader came to India<br />\n<br />\nMalayalam is the oldest language after Sanskrit. For several millenniums our jatakams ( horoscopes ) have been written in Malayalam.<br />\n<br />\nThunchath Ezhuthachan Malayalam University was created in Kerala by Christians --and this university sings the praises of Hermann Gundert<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Chancellor of Thunchath Ezhuthachan Malayalam University is the Governor of Kerala and the Pro-Chancellor is the Minister of Education of Kerala. How nice !<br />\n<br />\nThe university has instituted a Herman Gundert Chair at the T\u00fcbingen University, Germany. THE ANSWER WAS YOUNG MUSLIM STUDENTS...<br />\n<br />\nI AM SURE FAROOQ COLLEGE WILL HAVE IBN BATTUTTA IN THEIR CURRICULUM<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/ibn-battuta-at-calicut-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>IBN BATUTTA HAD A BREAST FIXATION...</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIN CALICUT MUSLIM WOMEN DISPLAYED THE BREASTS-- OPEN..<br />\n<br />\nIBN BATTUTTA DID HOOO HAAA -- AND THE CALICUT KING BANISHED THIS QADI TO MALDIVES...<br />\n<br />\nIN MALDIVES AGAIN HE DID TOO MUCH HOOO HAAA ABOUT MUSLIM WOMEN NOT COVERING THEIR BREASTS AND GOT KICKED OUT FROM THERE TOO.<br />\n<br />\nIbn Battuta's legal training was modest -- and that too only in the Maliki tradition of jurisprudence, ...<br />\n<br />\nWE WROTE THE KORAN AND HERE WAS A PRETENDER TEACHING HIS FATHER HOW TO FUCK.<br />\n<br />\nMaliki school is one of the four major madhhab of Islamic jurisprudence within Sunni Islam. It was founded by Malik ibn Anas in the 8th century..<br />\n<br />\nMaliki school's sources for Sharia are hierarchically prioritized as follows: Quran and then trustworthy Hadiths (sayings, customs and actions of Muhammad); if these sources were ambiguous on an issue, then `Amal (customs and practices of the people of Medina), followed by consensus of the Sahabah (the companions of Muhammad), then individual's opinion from the Sahabah, Qiyas (analogy), Istislah (interest and welfare of Islam and Muslims), and finally Urf (custom of people throughout the Muslim world if it did not contradict the hierarchically higher sources of Sharia).<br />\n<br />\nThe major schools of law (madhhab) were mutually conflicting. . The four most important of them are:--<br />\nShafi'i (Egypt, Mashriq, Hijaz, Yemen)<br />\nMaliki (Maghreb and West Africa)<br />\nHanafi (Central and South Asia, the Balkans, Turkey)<br />\nHanbali (most common in the Gulf counties)<br />\n<br />\nFatawa E Alamgiri had strict adherence to the Hanafi madhhab of Abu Hanifa\u2014a rich silk / fine cotton merchant from Caicut..<br />\n<br />\nSultan Mahmud Ghaznawi ( died 1030) was the first ruler in India who introduced the Hanafi madhhab --he was the author of a book, al-Tafrid, in the Hanafi fiqh..<br />\n<br />\nThe Ottomans, recognized the Hanafi as the exclusive official school in their empire.<br />\n<br />\nA madhhab is a school of Islamic law, and each madhhab is based on a systematic methodology of interpreting the Qur\u2019an and Prophetic sunna.<br />\n<br />\nFollowing a madhhab is not an end in itself; rather, it is a means to follow the Qur\u2019an and Sunna in a sound, systematic, and sustainable manner.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hanafi madhhab is called the \"followers of opinion\", denoting a perception of their greater reliance on logic and reasoning, as opposed to the label \" HARDCORE followers of the hadith\" (ashab al-hadith) applied to the Shafi\u02d3i and Hanbali madhahibs<br />\n<br />\nSchools, such as the Zahiri madhhab, were known for their eschewing of reason and logic, relying instead on the \"literal HARDLINE \" interpretation of authoritative sources.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; below is in one of my old blogs which I penned 8 years ago<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION:<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nFour decades ago, when i was a young boy, I took a bus from Mangalore to Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nOn the passage , the radiator of the bus cracked at midnight somewhere in the middle of no man's land.<br />\n<br />\nI remember, I got hold of another youngster to help me out.<br />\n<br />\nI wanted <b><span style=\"color: red;\">CHOONA</span></b> LIME, SUGAR, FRESH MOTHER'S MILK and RAW KERALA BANANA.<br />\n<br />\nI got everything except the milk.<br />\n<br />\nFinally despite being threatened by the husband of a pretty young lady in burkha nursing a baby, I got the milk.<br />\n<br />\nThis kind and intelligent lady felt that I was doing something right,to save the situation ( in a unsafe area ) and squeezed it into a glass\u2014 despite her husband giving her HAJAAAR tough looks .<br />\n<br />\nThe guy whom I chose to assist me , whispered \u201c Another woman has powder milk-- hum log maar khaane waala hai \u201c<br />\n<br />\nI said \u201c NOPE \u2013that will lack hormones and will NOT make heat resistant strong adhesive putty \u201c<br />\n<br />\nI made a strong adhesive solution which held the hot radiators leak till the next radiator welding workshop in a small town .<br />\n<br />\nChoona was the cement.<br />\n<br />\nSugar was the binder<br />\n<br />\nHormones in fresh \u2013repeat \u2013 fresh mother's milk did the magic catalysis --surprised?<br />\n<br />\nRaw Kerala banana was the resin.<br />\n<br />\nOn ship's which carry corrosive salt we coat the steel of the ship's cargo hold with lime , sugar and cows milk.<br />\n<br />\nAfter that once the salt is discharged, takes at least 300 bars of water pressure from a HP wash Kew machine to get the white compound off the rough steel surface.<br />\n<br />\nSuch a sharp water blade can slice off a human arm clean.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_27b+seedBAskD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_27b+seedBAskD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" His grandfather JEW Jerome Bignon ( died 1656 ) was tutor to King Louis XIII..<br />\n<br />\nJEW Jean-Paul Bignon was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society in 1734.<br />\n<br />\nRoyal Society was founded in 1660. THIEF Isaac Newton was a PRESIDENT of Royal Society and found his Calculus from the Kerala School of Math from the library of the Royal Society.<br />\n<br />\nNobody knows that an Indian SIR Venkatraman Ramakrishnan is the current President of the Royal society.. And indeed we should never have succeeded if we had not had Brahmans who are white Christians hidden among them -- The most extraordinary part is that those who are the depositaries of the Veda do not understand its meaning; for the Veda is written in a very ancient language and the Samouscroutam (that is the Sanskrit in Malayalam ) which is as familiar to their learned men as Latin is to us is not sufficient without the help of a commentary to explain the thoughts as well as the words of the Veda.--- The Veda is learnt by heart at first without any attempt at understanding it. It is only after the test has thus been mechanically engraved on the tablets of the memory that the more learned among the Br\u00e2hmans endeavour to understand it under the guidance of their teachers and with the help of ancient commentaries. All this is in accordance with their ancient law-books and exists still as the recognised system of education in several parts of India particularly in the south. Some schools go even so far as to maintain that a text of the Veda if not understood is more efficient at a sacrifice than if it is understood by the person who recites it. I doubt whether any other priesthood has gone so far in their admiration of ignorance\"UNQUOTE</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CUNT CALMETTE</span></b><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"> DID NOT KNOW THAT EFFICACY OF VEDIC SRUTIS WAS IN THE SOUND ( SHABDA BRAHMAN ) AND NOT IN THE MEANING .. THE MEANING IS ONLY TO INSTILL A SENSE OF GRATITUDE.</b></div>\n<br />\nMarco della Tomba ( who studied Sanskrit ) who was in India between 1757 and 1774 confesses that he was never allowed to see a manuscript of the Vedas. He expressed doubt that the Vedas in written form even existed<br />\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>ONCE JEW ROTHSCHILD KNEW THE VALUE OF BRAHMANAS ( PART 2 ) AND ARANYAKAS ( PART 3 ) HE STOLE THE ORIGINALS AND SHIPPED IT TO GERMANY</b></span></div>\n<br />\nJesuit JEW Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Pons ( an expert in Sanskrit ) was in Kerala scrounging for Sanskrit texts in Math and Astronomy. This is nonsense. Vararuchi was Raja Bhoj's religious and Vedic knowledge minister in 2800 BC<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC . Today this ancient university is a Muslim mosque. Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. More important and older universities like Kodungallur and Bhoj Shala Dhar has been deleted from history.<br />\nMEZHATHOL AGNIHOTRI WAS BORN MORE THAN 48 CENTURIES AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parayi_Petta_Panthirukulam</span><br />\n<br />\nVararuchi never had a MAD son named Naranath Bhranthan ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naranath_Bhranthan</span><br />\nPakkanar never existed .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakkanar</span><br />\nPerumthachan is NOT the son of Vararuchi.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perumthachan</span><br />\nThiruvalluvar was a Tamilian , NOT a Malayali. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 = <span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. The NEW\nAttorney general K K Venugopal, had argued that right to privacy cannot be a\nfundamental right\u2026 The nine judges, through six concurring opinions held that\nprivacy is a constitutionally protected right that emerges from the right to\nlife and liberty guaranteed by Article 21 of the constitution, which is\ninseparable from the right to live with dignity\u2026 Article 21 prohibits the\ndeprivation of the above rights EXCEPT ACCORDING TO A PROCEDURE ESTABLISHED BY\nLAW. .. JUDGES DID NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG\nWHEN 5.1 LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS WERE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED AND SUBJECTED TO\nGENOCIDE\u2026 THOUSANDS OF HINDU TEMPLES WERE RAZED DOWN IN KASHMIR. .. THESE\nMELORDS JUMPED WHEN A BABRI MAJID ( MECCA OF HINDUS ) WAS RAZED DOWN.. HULLO PM\nMODI, THE CONSTITUTION IS A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT. .. IT IS NOT ETCHED ON ROCK The\nConstitution''s provisions have consciously been worded in generalities, though\nnot in vague terms, instead of making them rigid and static with a fixed\nmeaning or content as in an ordinary statute, so that they may be interpreted\nby coming generations of citizens with the ONWARD MARCH OF TIME, to apply to\nNEW AND EVER CHANGING AND DEMANDING SITUATIONS, making the Constitution a\nliving and an organic document\u2026 Rigidity tends to check progressive legislation\nor gradual innovation\u2026 ONLY A FLEXIBLE DYNAMIC CONSTITUTION CAN SURVIVE THE\nTEST OF TIME. \u2026 IN 1947 WHO WOULD EVEN IMAGINE OF DIGITIZATION OF INDIAN\nECONOMY AND OF SOMETHING CALLED GST \u2026 RIGHT TO LIFE as guaranteed under Article\n21, has by interpretation been expanded to progressively mean a whole lot of\nhuman rights.. A constitution is not a parchment of paper, it is a way of life\nand has to be lived up to\u2026 Eternal vigilance is the price of liberty and in the\nfinal analysis, its only keepers are WE THE PEOPLE\u2026. THE CONSTITUTION BECOMES\nNULL AND VOID IF IT ACTS AGAINST THE WATAN.. THE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND\nVOID IF IT GOES AGAINST THE PRINCIPLE OF DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ).... The\nprocedure of amendment in the constitution is laid down in Part XX (Article\n368) of the Constitution of India. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 6\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 5-- This\nprocedure ensures the sanctity of the Constitution of India and keeps a check\non arbitrary power of the Parliament of India and also EXTREME JUDICIAL\nOVERREACH by Collegium Judiciary which is NOT sanctioned by the Constitution\n..The framers of our Constitution and WE THE PEOPLE did not intend the\njudiciary to be \u201csuperior\u201d to elected Parliament and the elected executive, but\nintended it to be the sentinel on the qui vive should the other two wings\noverstep the boundaries of their jurisdiction or omit to discharge their duty\nas public trustees\u2026 THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY DO NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL\nWHEREWITHAL TO APPLY BODMAS\u2026 Under Article 145(1), the Supreme Court can make\nrules for regulating the practice and procedure of the court, which is\nessentially a legislative function. .. However, such power can be exercised\nONLY REPEAT ONLY with the EXPRESS APPROVAL OF THE PRESIDENT and is SUBJECT to\nthe provisions of any law made by PARLIAMENT\u2026 Collegium Judiciary CANNOT\nexercise adjudicatory power, without any CHECKS AND BALANCES \u2026 This would be\ndestructive of the basic feature of democracy, and if not forthwith remedied,\nwould dilute the very essence of a democratic form of governance\u2026 The ILLEGAL\nCOLLEGIUM JUDICIARY has never ever been accountable in the manner that the\nelected executive is accountable.. These Melords keep pointing fingers without\nany sense of accountability.. It is a constitutional imperative that an\nauthority must be accountable if it wields power.. Since the appointment of\njudges is an executive function and not an adjudicatory function,\naccountability follows as its inseparable concomitant. .. Presently, in matters\nof judicial appointment, the accountability seems to lie neither with the\njudiciary nor with the executive.. Such a situation is without precedent, in\nour country or elsewhere\u2026 The \u201cprimacy\u201d of the judiciary was neither intended\nnor provided for by the Constituent Assembly\u2026. There are NO checks and balances\nin selection of Judges \u2026 The Collegium judiciary has developed the mindset that\nit is above the law... Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) classified dog shit as a dangerous pollutant in the same category as toxic chemicals \u2026\u2026.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDog shit in potable water affects the brain\u2026.. Dog shit spreads parasites including hookworms, ringworms, tapeworms and Salmonella\u2026. When infected dog shit comes into contact with your lawn, the shit will eventually \"disappear\", but the parasite eggs can linger for years!...&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWhen a human or animal comes into contact with that soil through everyday activities like walking barefoot, gardening or playing, they risk infection from those eggs ... even years after the poop is gone. And a lot of Indians have split heels\u2026.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDog sh1it teams with E. Coli and other harmful bacteria including fecal coliform bacteria, which causes serious kidney disorders, intestinal illness, cramps and diarrhea in humans. (There are 23.5 million fecal coliform bacteria in a single gram of dog shit!) ..&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDog shit contains roundworm larvae, which cause blindness. If a human ingests a roundworm larva, it can migrate through the body causing disease to the brain, lungs, kidneys, liver, heart or eyes.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSo when people (especially children) touch soil, or anything that has been in contact with dog shit then touch their mouths, they can become infected. .. Women who are pregnant are at risk of several zoonotic diseases from dog shit\u2026.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT , NOT TO ALLOW THIS VAIN WOMAN TO SPREAD DISEASES IN INDIA\u2026. THIS IS THE ANTHIM SHODASA SAMSKARA..<br />\n<br />\nCremation of the human body is a sacrifice. It is called ANTYESTI and is performed to the chanting of Vedic Sanskrit mantras....<br />\n<br />\nThere are sixteen rituals (Shodasa samskaras) prescribed by scriptures and adhered across the land of Bharath for 40 millenniums.<br />\n1/Garba Aadhana - Pre consummation rites which purify the parents<br />\n2/Pumsavana - Rites for the carrying mother<br />\n3/Simantonnayana - Prenatal rite for the protection of carrying mother and her womb<br />\n4/Jatakarma - Natal rite purifying the new born<br />\n5/Namakarana - Naming Ceremony<br />\n6/Nishkramana - Exposing the infant to outside world<br />\n7/Annaprashana - First Feeding of solid food<br />\n8/Chaulam - Tonsure<br />\n9/Karnavedhana - Piercing the ears<br />\n10/Aksharaabhyasa or Vidyaramba - Beginning of Education<br />\n11/Upanayana - Opening the eye of wisdom. Lit. bringing near the Guru, scripture and God. Investiture of Sacred Thread.<br />\n12/Vedaarambha - Initiation into the Vedic Education<br />\n13/Keshanta or Ritusuddhi - Whole body Shave for boys or Nuptial rites for girls<br />\n14/Samaavartana - Convocation or Completion of Education<br />\n15/ Vivaha - Marriage<br />\n16/ Anthyeshti - Funeral Rites<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER FOOLED LINGAYATHS INTO BURYING THEIR DEAD BODIES.. THEY WERE TOLD TO BURY THEMSELVES UPRIGHT (LIKE JIVAN MUKTS ) TO GET MOKSHA ..<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF BASAVA OR YOGI VEMANA TILL THE WHITE INAVDER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/cp-brown-and-yogi-vemana-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_86BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; I venture to pronounce them all very defective, fallacious and unsatisfactory to an inquisitive searcher after tmth; and only tending to convey a very imperfect and injurious resemblance of a people, who from the earliest times have been an ornament to the creation if so much can with propriety be said of any known people upon earth\".<br />\n<br />\nHolwell wrote \u201c'Pythagoras and Plato came to India and borrowed the doctrines of the unity of Godhead, ... from the Brahmins of India\u201d. \"</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS WRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM \"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE EVERYTHING -- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE CODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE LOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014 I COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING PARTNER IN THIS PROJECT.&nbsp; HE WAS HONEST TO ADMIT IT .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY SON INSISTED AND WROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES REQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs NAME</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS A MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A MATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING IDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM AN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN CLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN THE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS PRICELESS FINDINGS . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In November 2003, Divya Narendra and the\nWinklevoss twins approached Mark Zuckerberg about writing code for the idea of\nFacebook.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Divya Narendra emailed Zuckerberg saying,\n\u201cWe\u2019re very deep into developing a site which we would like you to be a part of\nand ... which we know will make some waves on campus.\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Within a couple of days,\nMark Zuckerberg was talking to the HarvardConnection team<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the evening of November 25, 2003, the\nDivya Narendra and the Winklevosses met with Zuckerberg in the dining hall of\nHarvard's Kirkland House, where they explained to an enthusiastic Zuckerberg,\nthe HarvardConnection website, the plan to expand to other schools after\nlaunch, the confidential nature of the project<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">During the meeting, Mark Zuckerberg allegedly\nentered into an ORAL contract ( NEVER TRUST A WHITE JEW WITH ORAL CONTRACTS )\nwith Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses and became a WORKING partner in\nHarvardConnection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He was given the private server location and\npassword for the unfinished HarvardConnection website and code, with the\nunderstanding that he would finish the programming necessary for launch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mark Zuckerberg allegedly chose to be compensated\nin the form of<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> sweat equity</span></b>. ( remember Shashi Tharoor and Sunanda Pushkar ? )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On December 17, 2003, JEW THIEF Mark\nZuckerberg met with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses in his dorm room,\nallegedly confirming his interest and assuring them that the site was almost\ncomplete.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the whiteboard in his room, Zuckerberg\nallegedly had scrawled multiple lines of code under the heading \u201cHarvard\nConnection.\u201d However, this would be the only time they saw any of his work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">On January 11, 2004, Mark Zuckerberg HIJACKED\nthe ship and registered the domain name thefacebook.com.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW THIEF Zuckerberg met again with the\nHarvardConnection team. However, he allegedly never mentioned registering the\ndomain name thefacebook.com nor a competing social networking website, rather\nhe reported progress on HarvardConnection, told them he would continue to work\non it, and would email the group later in the week.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">December 9, 2017 at 11:24\nAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On February 4, 2004, THIEF Mark Zuckerberg\nlaunched thefacebook.com, a social network for Harvard students.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On February 6, 2004, Divya Narenda got a\nSHOCK when he first-learned of thefacebook.com while reading a press release in\nthe Harvard student newspaper The Harvard Crimson.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On February 10, 2004, the Winklevosses ( took\nover the suing part ) and Divya Narendra sent Zuckerberg a cease and desist\nletter. They also asked the Harvard administration to act on what they viewed\nas a violation of the university\u2019s honor code and student handbook.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They lodged a complaint with the Harvard\nAdministrative Board and university president JEW Larry Summers; however, both\nviewed the matter to be outside the university's jurisdiction<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">President Summers advised the\nHarvardConnection team to take their matter to the KOSHER KANGAROO courts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 2004, ConnectU filed a lawsuit against\nFacebook alleging that creator Mark Mark Zuckerberg had broken an oral contract\nwith them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The law suit declared that Zuckerberg had\ncopied their idea and illegally used source code intended for the website he\nwas hired as a WORKER to create<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A settlement agreement for both cases was\nreached in February 2008, reportedly valued at LOW $65 million.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 2013, the Winklevoss twins said they owned\n$11 million worth of Bitcoin--and today they are BILLIONAIRES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">IF INDIA HAS TO NIP OUT PAKISTAN AIDED TERRORISM IN KASHMIR , ARTICLE 370 AND 35A MUST GO..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">WE DO NOT NEED TO RUN TO ANY COLLEGIUM JUDGE\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">WE DO NOT CARE FOR THESE UNCONSTITUTIONAL COLLEGIUM JUDGES..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Article 370 of the Indian constitution is an article that grants special autonomous status to the state of Jammu and Kashmir.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">The article is drafted in Part XXI of the Constitution: Temporary, Transitional and Special Provisions.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">The State's Constituent Assembly was empowered to recommend the articles of the Indian constitution to be applied to the state or to abrogate the Article 370 altogether.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">After the state Constituent Assembly dissolved itself without recommending abrogation, the Article 370 was deemed to have become a permanent feature of the Indian Constitution.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE ELECTIONS TO THE JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY IN 1951 WERE RIGGED.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">They exploited Article 370, and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Article 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">PARAMOUNT CLAUSE: \" ETHNIC CLEANSING \" - OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; Kashmir\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Nehru and Sheikh Abdullah made sure that the Permanent Residents of Jammu &amp; Kashmir shall exercise all rights all over India\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Nehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, THOUGH Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; (f) to acquire, hold and dispose of property; and (g) to practice any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business\u201d.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">It follows that what is needed is not just the abrogation of Article 370 but also the revocation of Article 35A. This is the only course left to enable the refugees from West Pakistan and other Indians to exercise citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and integrate it fully into India.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">In October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">It explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Since the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">BALLS !</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">WHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..</span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_24.html?showComment=1522142909202#c6985590787369165189\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 27, 2018 at 2:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br /><br /><br />Democratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country.<br /><br />Article 368 is the only way to amend the Constitution,.. Not the President.<br /><br />The marginal note of Article 368 states; \u201c Power of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore \u201d.. Which means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution.<br /><br />Sub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that: --<br />\u201c An amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...\"<br /><br />The President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through the bypass of the entire Constitutional mechanism nor does Article 370 give power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br /><br />The parliamentary route of lawmaking was bypassed when the President incorporated Article 35A into the Constitution. Article 368 (i) of the Constitution empowers only Parliament to amend the Constitution. The President acted outside his jurisdiction.. Article 35A is void because the Nehru government did not place it before Parliament for discussion..<br /><br />Article 370 grants special status to Jammu and Kashmir, while Article 35A empowers the state legislature to define permanent citizens.<br /><br />Article 370 and Article 35A of the Indian Constitution are an \"unnecessary baggage\" of the past and hence these laws be repealed..<br /><br />Restricting citizens from other States from getting employment or buying property within Jammu and Kashmir is a violation of fundamental rights under Articles 14, 19 and 21 of the Constitution\u2026<br /><br />Article 370 (along with Article 35A) is an anachronistic decree that has outlived its utility, militates against India\u2019s sovereignty, and discriminates against both Indians and Kashmiris by mutually excluding each other from syncretic growth. It is redundant, and constitutionally discarded into the dustbin of history.<br /><br />THE TERM \" SUBJUDIDE \" DOES NOT APPLY TO INDIA.. AS WE DON\u2019T HAVE A JURY SYSTEM..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</span><br /><br />WE DON\u2019T WANT THIS LOOPHOLE TO BE USED BY IDIOTS\u2026<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_197B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "208", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/9193565802134686742/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "25573406353975377", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-03-17T11:43:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-04-01T19:27:29+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTU0MTI3MDQ5MDgxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/25573406353975377", "title": "FATAWA E ALAMGIRI , kosher document of Rothschild created to wreck the mighty Moghul empire of Aurangzeb , Part 5 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 4, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_13.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_13.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS PROPAGANDA BY\nROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; The arrival of William Bentinck as the\nGovernor-General of British India in 1828, marked a shift towards universal\ncivil code, whose administration emphasized same law for all human beings,\nindividualism and equal treatment to help liberate, empower and end social\npractices among Hindus and Muslims of India that had received much public\ncoverage in Britain through the publications of Christian missionaries and\nindividuals such as Thomas Macaulay.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Governor-General\nDalhousie, in 1848, extended this trend and stated his policy that the law must\n\"treat all natives much the same manner\". Over time, between\n1828-1855, a series of British parliamentary acts were passed to revise the\nAnglo-Hindu and Anglo-Muslim laws, such as those relating to the right to\nreligious conversion, widow remarriage, and right to create wills for\ninheritance.&nbsp;&nbsp; In 1832, the British\ncolonial government abolished accepting religious fatwa as a source of\nlaw.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1835, the British began creating a criminal\ncode that would replace the existing criminal code which was a complex\nconflicting mixture of laws derived from Muslim texts (Quran) and Hindu texts\n(Shastras), and this common criminal code was ready by 1855. .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The changes\ntriggered discontent, call for jihad and religious war, and became partly\nresponsible for the 1857 Indian revolt against the British rule. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
