Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521592788856#c7145574635893838974\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:09 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nParayi Petta Panthirukulam is a FAKE story\u2014it never happened ..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE TWELVE CHILDREN WHO WAS BORN FORM THE SAME WOMB OF A SINGLE UNTOUCHABLE \u201cPARAYA\u201d WOMAN TO KERALA HERO VARARUCHI , IS A COCK AND BULL STORY ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOSE DAYS THERE WS NO CASTE SYSTE\u2014ONLY VARNA SYSTEM EXISTED<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVararuchi, the great Kerala hero was named by the British historians as one of the 9 gems of Emperor Vikramaditya . This is nonsense. Vararuchi was Raja Bhoj's religious and Vedic knowledge minister in 2800 BC<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC . Today this ancient university is a Muslim mosque. Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. More important and older universities like Kodungallur and Bhoj Shala Dhar has been deleted from history.<br />\nMEZHATHOL AGNIHOTRI WAS BORN MORE THAN 48 CENTURIES AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parayi_Petta_Panthirukulam</span><br />\n<br />\nVararuchi never had a MAD son named Naranath Bhranthan ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naranath_Bhranthan</span><br />\nPakkanar never existed .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakkanar</span><br />\nPerumthachan is NOT the son of Vararuchi.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perumthachan</span><br />\nThiruvalluvar was a Tamilian , NOT a Malayali. Vararuchi was a Malayali.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n########################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 =&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_65M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521592996238#c4848674592747964571\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nThis brings us squarely into the discussion of what Words mean and indeed to the philosophical question of what Meaning itself means. A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. ROTHSCHILD WOULD USE HIM FOR VACCINATING HIS WHITE SOLDIERS.<br />\n<br />\nIN GRATITUDE ROTHSCHILD MADE JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL GOVERNOR OF BENGAL --SUCCEEDING ROBERT CLIVE--ANOTHER THIEF OF THE FIRST ORDER.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WE MUST THANK JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL FOR DECLARING IN ENGLAND TO THE PUBLIC THAT INDIANS ARE NOT A BUNCH OF SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nIT SHOCKED THE WHITE ENGLISH PUBLIC WHEN HE WROTE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Homer, Virgil, Lucretius, Ovid, Lucian availed themselves of the simple cosmology of Brahma and derived their myths of creation from the Hindus. --from these Hindoos our Mitton copied -- Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, borrowed their mythology and cosmology from the doctrines of the Indian Hindoo\"<br />\n<br />\nHolwell in his Preliminary Discourse to the Religious Tenets of the Gentoos&nbsp;said :&nbsp; \"Having sediously perused all that has been written of the empire of&nbsp;ndostan, both as to its ancient as well as more modem state; as also the various&nbsp;accounts transmitted to us, by authors in almost all ages ... I venture to pronounce them all very defective, fallacious and unsatisfactory to an inquisitive searcher after tmth; and only tending to convey a very imperfect and injurious resemblance of a people, who from the earliest times have been an ornament to the creation if so much can with propriety be said of any known people upon earth\".<br />\n<br />\nHolwell wrote \u201c'Pythagoras and Plato came to India and borrowed the doctrines of the unity of Godhead, ... from the Brahmins of India\u201d. This statement was deleted by Jew Rothschild ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />John Zephaniah Holwell</span>&nbsp;thus established the great antiquity of the Indian people and their literature. He, expressing himself against superficial studies, emphasized the need for a new orientation to Indian studies.<br />\n<br />\nIn this context he told not to depend only on the application of European standards to the study of India's past\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAT LEAST WE HAVE A HONEST JEW IN SURGEON JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL--UNLIKE HIS MATHEMATICIAN GRANDFATHER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c214556610071273335\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399892786#c214556610071273335\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi k,<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.smh.com.au/national/mathematician-reveals-hidden-5-7m-year-cycle-behind-the-date-of-easter-20180328-p4z6qd.html</span><br />\nTHE CUNT IS MAKING ROCKET SCIENCE OUT OF SIMPLE ASTROLOGY<br />\n<br />\nEaster, also called Resurrection Day is a Christian holiday celebrating Jesus Christ returning from the dead.<br />\n<br />\nEaster is not held on the same date every year. This is called a moveable feast. Western churches, like the Roman Catholic Church, use the Gregorian calendar, while Eastern churches, like the Eastern Orthodox Church, use the Julian calendar. In 2015 Easter was celebrated on April 5 for both the Gregorian calendar and Julian calendar.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Jesus Christ never existed\u2014but was cooked up by Roman Emperor Constntine the Great at the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD, which included an astronomer sage from Kerala&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE STUPID \u201cPOPE TO BE\u201dWANTED EASTER TO BE THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER THE FULL MOON AFTER THE VERNAL EQUINOX.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nVishu is the second biggest festival in Kerala and it ushers in the Malayalam new year<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian calendar was designed to keep the vernal equinox on or close to March 21, so that the date of Easter is celebrated on the Sunday after the full moon.. Read this line TWICE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EASTER IS CELEBRATED BY CHRISTIANS BETWEEN LAST WEEK MARCH TO LAST WEEK APRIL.</span></b><br />\nTHIS YEAR FOR WESTERN CHURCH IT IS APRIL 1ST AND FOR EASTERN CHURCH ARRIL 8TH<br />\nIn 1818 the Paschal Full Moon fell on Saturday March 21 (the equinox). Therefore, the following day, March 22, was Easter. It will not fall as early again until 2285, a span of 467 years. The next earliest Easter between 1818 and 2285 (March 23) occurred in 1845, 1856, 1913 and 2008, and will occur again in 2160--a 11, 57, 95 and 152-year gap, respectively.<br />\n<br />\nThe earliest dates for Easter in the Eastern Orthodox Church between 1875 and 2099 are, 22 March 1915 and 22 March 2010. Both dates are equivalent to April 4 in the Gregorian Calendar.<br />\n<br />\nDespite using calendars that are apart by 13 days, Easter 2014 fell on the same date. According to the Western (Gregorian) calendar, the first Paschal Full Moon after the Spring Equinox (March 20) fell on Monday, April 14, 2014. The following Sunday, April 20, was, therefore, Easter Day.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian Calendar was created so that annual astronomical events, specifically the vernal equinox (used to determine when Easter is), would on average keep their places in the calendar year over time.<br />\n<br />\nThere are two ways of finding how long it takes the sun to complete its apparent revolution in the heavens, or, in other words, how long it takes the earth to make a complete revolution around it.<br />\n<br />\nOne of these consists in observing the exact time at which the sun reaches the equinoxes. In ancient times astronomical observers were able to do this by noting the days when the sun rose exactly in the east or set exactly in the west. By observing the rising and setting from day to day, they could find not only the day, but almost the hour in which the sun was on the celestial equator<br />\n<br />\nThe period between two returns of the sun to the same equinox is called the solar year or equinoxial year. The other way of finding the length of the year consists in observing the interval of time between two passages of the sun past the same star in the heavens; for example, the period between two of its passages past one of the stars<br />\n<br />\nThe ancient Kerala astronomers got the same result by using the moon as an intermediate object to measure from. The moon could be seen before sunset and its distance from the sun determined. Then, when the star appeared after sunset, the distance from the star to the moon was measured.<br />\n<br />\nAllowing for the motion of the moon during the interval, the apparent distance between the sun and the star could thus be learned from day to day. In this way it could be found how many days it was between the times at which the sun was at the same distance from any given bright star.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_66B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_67B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1418662716273968311\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_67M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399955591#c1418662716273968311\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThis would be the period of apparent revolution of the sun in the celestial sphere, or, as we now know it to be, the period of one revolution of the earth in its orbit. This period is called the sidereal year, because it is fixed by the stars.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH HIPPARCHUS AND. PTOLEMY LEARNT IN THE KONDUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN )<br />\n<br />\nWith our exact modern observations we have found the lengths of the years to be:--<br />\n<br />\nSolar year/ 365 d. 5 h. 48 m. 46 s.<br />\nSidereal year/ 365 d 6 h 9 m 9 s<br />\nDifference/ 20 m. 23 s.<br />\n<br />\nThis difference shows that the position of the equinoxes among the stars is changing from year to year-- nearly one degree in 70 years.<br />\n<br />\nThe tropics of Cancer and Capricorn mark the extreme north and south latitudes where the Sun can appear directly overhead. Because the vernal equinox moves back along the ecliptic due to precession, a tropical year is shorter than a sidereal year (in 2000, the difference was 20 m 23 s<br />\n<br />\nThe number of mean solar days in a vernal equinox year has been oscillating between 365.2424 and 365.2423 for several millennia and will likely remain near 365.2424 for a few more. This long-term stability is pure chance, because in our era the slowdown of the rotation, the acceleration of the mean orbital motion, and the effect at the vernal equinox of rotation and shape changes in the Earth's orbit, happen to almost cancel out.<br />\n<br />\nEarth's pole aligns with different pole stars throughout its precessional period. Polaris is Earth's current north-pole star. Earth's 25675 -year precessional cycle is also referred to as \"Earth's Great Year.\"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEarth's axis is tilted 23\u00b0 27' with respect the plane created by Earth's orbit around the Sun (the ecliptic plane)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n#######################################################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nNovember 29, 2017 at 7:36 PM<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.academia.edu/upgrade?feature=name_mentions&amp;trigger=mentions-reminder-readers<br />\n<br />\n318 people recently read one of the papers that mentions the name \"Ajit Vadakayil\"<br />\n<br />\nHEY<br />\n<br />\nTHESE GUYS WANT 2500 RUPEES PER MONTH<br />\n<br />\n###########################<br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED TO ELABORATE MORE ON HOW I CAUGHT WHITE MEN STEALING FROM KERALA ASTRONOMY -- DURING THE PERIOD ANCIENT GREEKS STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR 2300 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nUNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--I AM A CERTIFICATED MASTER MARINER-- AN EXPERT IN CELESTIAL NAVIGATION<br />\n<br />\nTHE POINT WHERE EQUINOCTIAL ( CELESTIAL EQUATOR ) CUTS THE ECLIPTIC WAS CALLED \"THE FIRST POINT OF ARIES \" BY KERALA ASTRONOMERS DURING THE PERIOD 2500 BC , WHEN ANCIENT GREEKS KNEW SHIT ABOUT ASTRONOMY . THE STAR IS MEDAM ( HAMAL )<br />\n<br />\nIN 1 AD , THE POINT OF INTERSECTION OF EQUINOCTIAL AND ECLIPTIC CHANGED TO PISCES ( MEENAM IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT ) AND THIS WILL REMAIN SO TILL 2150 AD<br />\n<br />\nASK ANY MALAYALI WHAT DO YOU SAY FOR FISH--HE WILL SAY MEEN<br />\n<br />\nTHE NAMES BELOW WERE ASSIGNED BY KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY WHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS DOING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE<br />\n<br />\n7. Kumbham February 16th - March 15th ( WATER PITCHER )<br />\n8. Meenam March 16th - April 15th ( FISH )<br />\n9. Medam April 16th - May 15th ( GOAT-RAM )<br />\n10. Edavam May 16th - June 15th ( BULL )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_67MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_67BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_67B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_68B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5980659306347420181\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 2---</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">THE BIBLE STORY COSMIC ALLEGORY SKELETON WAS SUPPLIED BY KERALA SAGES WHO WERE EXPERT ASTRONOMERS .</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JUST READ THE \"APUN BHI COSMIC ALELGORY\" PART OF THE POST BELOW--WHICH EXPLAINS THE THREE WISE KINGS ON CAMELS , THE STABLE WERE JESUS WAS BORN, HOW MOSES LOST HIS BALLS OVER THE GOLDEN BULL( TAURUS ), BLOWING OF THE RAM HORN ( ARIES ) , HOW JESUS FED TWO FUCKIN\u2019 FISHES TO THOUSANDS ( PISCES ) , HOW JESUS SAYS \"FOLLOW THE MAN WITH THE WATER PICTURE\" ( AQUARIUS ) , THE RESURRECTION OF JESUS AFTER 3 DAYS , THE CROSS ETC .</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WHITE CHRISTIAN DOES NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS SKELETON WAS PROVIDED FOR THE BIBLE BECAUSE ALL HINDUS GODS WERE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ( EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE KERALA SAGE ATTENDED THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA IN 325 AD, CALLED BY THE ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTIN THE GREAT --WHERE HE WARNED THE EMPEROR NOT TO ALLOW THE STUPID POPE TO THROW THE SPANNER IN THE WORKS (FOR EASTER) AND MOVE AWAY FROM THE ACCURATE SIDEREAL SYSTEM.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER ALL THE COUNCIL WAS CALLED TO DELETE THE EXISTENCE OF KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA--WHO WAS CONSIDERED GOD BY ROMANS</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The celestial equator is a great circle on the imaginary celestial sphere, in the same plane as the Earth's equator. In other words, it is a projection of the terrestrial equator out into space. As a result of the Earth's axial tilt, the celestial equator is inclined by 23.4\u00b0 with respect to the ecliptic plane.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ecliptic is an imaginary line on the sky that marks the annual path of the sun. It is the projection of Earth\u2019s orbit onto the celestial sphere.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FIRST POINT OF ARIES ( VERNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE SOUTH TO NORTH ON ECLIPTIC) CORRESPONDS WITH THE GREENWICH MERIDIAN ON PLANET EARTH AND SO LONGITUDE IS DERIVED FROM THIS AFTER A CELESTIAL SIGHT USING SEXTANT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">180 DEGREES OPPOSITE IS THE \"FIRST POINT OF LIBRA\" ( AUTUMNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE NORTH TO SOUTH ON ECLIPTIC ) WHICH CORRESPONDS TO THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE. AGAIN THIS POINT IS NO LONGER IN LIBRA , BUT IN VIRGO DUE TO PRECESSION</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">November 29, 2017 at 7:44 PM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On the vernal (spring) and autumnal (fall) equinoxes, day and night are nearly the same length ...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">An equinox is regarded as the moment in which the plane of Earth's equator passes through the center of the Sun's disk, which occurs twice each year, around 20 March and 23 September.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS VISHU CELEBRATED ONLY IN KERALA FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS ---BECAUSE THOSE DAYS ONLY KERALA SAGES KNEW ASTRONOMY .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; You see Chaitanya baby revealed to Goswami baby that he is an avatar of Krishna ( BALLS !)<br />\n<br />\nGoswami baby created the Radha Raman Temple--which was actually an old Vishnu temple retro installed -- with a shaligram deity of Krishna alongside Radharani.<br />\n<br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO SPREAD THE TRUTH<br />\n<br />\nHARE RAMA OF THE CHANT BY ISKON -- HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SRI RAM.<br />\n<br />\nCHANTING THIS BULLSHIT MANTRA OF HARE RAMA ( RADHA ) HARE KRISHA DOES YOU NO GOOD<br />\n<br />\nRadha-vallabha is another fake sect--where Krishna is called the consort of Radha. Here Radha is the deity-- Krishna is just a side-kick<br />\n<br />\nShri Radhavallabhlal temple at Vrindavan was a Vishnu temple converted to Radha and Krishna idol - a 2 in 1 .<br />\n<br />\nIN SANKHYA JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS USED HIS AGENTS LIKE PRABHUPADA TO SUBSTITUTE SHIVA / SHAKTI -------WITH KRISHNA ( A MERE AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AND A FAKE MISTRESS RADHA .<br />\n<br />\nPOISON INJECTED VERSES BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nradha purna-sakti, krsna purna-saktiman<br />\ndui vastu bheda nai, sastra-paramana<br />\nmrgamada, tara gandha yaiche aviccheda<br />\nagni, jvalate yaiche kabhu nahi bheda<br />\nradha-krsna aiche sada eka-i svarupa<br />\nlila-rasa asvadite dhare dui-rupa<br />\n<br />\nSri Radha is the full energy, and Lord Krsna is the possessor of full power.<br />\n<br />\nThe two are not different, as evidenced by the revealed scriptures. They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. Adi 1.79,80)<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- All this bull about Radha being a mistress of Lord Krishna and all his thousands of Gopikas whom he flirted with , are all poisons injected into Hinduism by the white Christian invader. Kalidas who invented Radha never existed. Krishna did NOT have 16000 virgin gopikas in vrindavan rather 16000 are dhatus of shasrara chakra . SAHASRARA CHAKRA is a 1000 petalled lotus -- each with 16 kalas or aspects --this works out to 16000 .<br />\n<br />\nthis is NOT some girl who has sex with Lord Krishna --taking turns to HUMP.<br />\n<br />\nNarakasura kidnapped 16000 damsels --and Lord Krishna saved these damsels in distress. this is just an allegory.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_56MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_56BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_56B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_57B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5759304704119782162\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_57M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"After reposing me on a bed of tender grass, he lay on my chest all the time, and on making embraces and kisses, he hugged me and swill my lower lip, graspingly... now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0905\u0932\u0938 \u0928\u093f\u092e\u0940\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0932\u094b\u091a\u0928\u092f\u093e \u092a\u0941\u0932\u0915 \u0906\u0935\u0932\u093f \u0932\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0915\u092a\u094b\u0932\u092e\u094d,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u092e\u091c\u0932 \u0938\u0915\u0932 \u0915\u0932\u0947\u0935\u0930\u092f\u093e, \u0935\u0930 \u092e\u0926\u0928 \u092e\u0926\u093e\u0926\u094d \u0905\u0924\u093f \u0932\u094b\u0932\u092e\u094d .. \u096a..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"I was cooing and moaning in lust like a koel and a pigeon, he, who has mastered every art of Love, was pondering... and then, my flowers in my hair crushed and braids tousled, the scratch-marks of his nails arose on my busty bosoms... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u091a\u0930\u0923 \u0930\u0923\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0923\u0940 \u0928\u0942\u092a\u0941\u0930\u092f\u093e, \u092a\u0930\u093f \u092a\u0942\u0930\u093f\u0924 \u0938\u0941\u0930\u0924 \u0935\u093f\u0924\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u092e\u0941\u0916\u0930 \u0935\u093f\u0936\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0916\u0932 \u092e\u0947\u0916\u0932\u092f\u093e \u0938\u0915\u091a \u0917\u094d\u0930\u0939 \u091a\u0941\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0928 \u0926\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d .. \u096c..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"My anklets that usually jingle in my feet started jingling more as he copulated with me in different conjoining sex postures, and while at it the golden chain in my girdle fell down, while he grasped my hair bun to give a dole of kiss, such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0930\u0924\u093f \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0938\u092e\u092f \u0930\u0938\u093e \u0905\u0932\u0938\u092f\u093e, \u0926\u0930 \u092e\u0941\u0915\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0924 \u0928\u092f\u0928 \u0938\u0930\u094b\u091c\u092e\u094d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0928\u093f\u0903\u0938\u0939 \u0928\u093f\u092a\u0924\u093f\u0924 \u0924\u0928\u0941 \u0932\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0938\u0942\u0926\u0928 \u092e\u0941\u0926\u093f\u0924 \u092e\u0928\u094b\u091c\u092e\u094d .. \u096d..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u0938\u0916\u0940 \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d ... (\u0927\u0943\u092a\u0926)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"I, with my vine-like curvacious and delicate body lay on bed of tender grasss, relaxing delightedly because of sexual union he too was weakened, and his lotus like eyes were half-closed, though while laying on lawn, there again arose passion in him for me... such as we were, now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT EVERY DESH DROHI LITERARY FEST THE WHITE MAN CAME AND RECITED SEXUALLY LOADED JAYADEVA VERSES OF GEETA GOVINDA&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY HEARD OF JAYADEVA ( BORN 1170 AD ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JAYADEVAs FAKE VERSES ARE INSERTED INTO GURU GRANTH SABIB--THE HOLY BOOK OF SIKHS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD USED JAYADEVAs FAKE VERSES TO INSTITUTIONALIZE DEVADASI WHORES IN ORISSA TEMPLES. EVERY TEMPLE HAD DANCE HALLS FOR MAHARI ODISSI DANCE ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHARIS DANCED TO THE EXPLICIT SEXUALLY LOADED GEETA GOVINDA VERSES OF THE FAKE JAYADEVA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; &nbsp;THE WRITTEN VEDAS WERE IN THE CUSTODY ON KERALA NAMBOODIRIS AT THE BANKS OF THE RIVER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nNOW LISTEN\u2014THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL PART OF THIS COMMENT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN 4000 BC ,RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP DUE TO A TECTONIC SHIFT AT THE GLACIAL MOUTH IN THE HIMALAYAS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE BROTHER OF KRISHNA BALARAMA TOOK HIS GIGANTIC PLOW ( FOR LEVERAGE ) AND SHIFTED THE SARSWATI WATERS TO GANGA AND YAMUNA \u2013LEAVING ONLY THE UNDERGROUND SARASWATI RIVER FLOWING..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA WOULD WITNESS THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARSWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE KURUKSHETRA WAS COULD START , VISHNU TOOK AN AVATAR AS PARASHURAMA TO KEEP THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS SAFE\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA LEAD THE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS BACK HOME FROM SARSWATI RIVER BANKS WITH THE VEDAS AND UPANISHADS .. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522714517699#c533883434781593434\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 3, 2018 at 5:45 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_98MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nTHIYYAS WERE THE ORIGINAL ROYALS OF KERALA\u2014 LATER JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED A CRYPTO JEW VARMA CLAN WHO BECAME KERALA ROYALS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WERE NO VARMAS BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA\u2026 THIYYAS, WERE DEMOTED TO \u201c COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPERS\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nSAME WAY MAHARS ( BR AMBEDKARs CLAN ) WERE NOT DALITS\u2026 MAHARS WERE RULING CASTE OF MAHARASHTRA \u2026 MAHARASTRA IS THE RASHTRA OF MAHARS\u2026. LATER CHITPAVAN JEWS BECAME RULING CLASS. ..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A SYSTEM WHERE ONLY THE ELDEST NAMBOODIRI BROTHER COULD OWN FERTILE LAND IN KERALA \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND WHICH IS INDIAs BIGGEST PROBLEM TODAY AND REASON FOR FARMERS SUICIDES..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER ( SOCIAL STATUS, KNOWLEDGE , LAND AND WEALTH ) AND BECAME DECADENT IN THE PERIOD FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nDANAVAS OF KERALA HAS BEEN THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF KNOWLEDGE FOR THIS PLANET.. I AM A DANAVA ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A KERALA NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA , CUT THE STRENGTH FROM UNDER THE FEET OF HIS OWN CLAN AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA.. .. HE FELT NAMBOODIRIS WERE SEXUALLY DECADENT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE GOES THE FALSE THEORY THAT THERE WAS NO CONCEPT OF BHARAT IN THE ANCIENT DAYS..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONDITION SET BY PARASHURAMA \u2013THAT THESE 4 ORIGINAL HINDU MUTTS COULD BE HEADED ONLY BY A VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE ) KNOWING KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFF\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LONG TRADITION WAS BROKEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA\u2026 EVEN THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS HAS CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS WITH PALE EYES WHO TROUBLED DALITS.. ALONG WITH MORE THAN A THOUSAND FAKE MUTT PONTIFFS WHO WERE THE BRIBED AGENTS OF THE WHITE INVADER\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN ANOTHER 15 YEARS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW A BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM\u2026 ALL BR AMBEDKAR/ EVR PERIYAR STUDENTS UNION LEADERS ARE FUNDED AND CONTROLLED BY WHITE JEWS \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR PERIYAR WERE AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD AND DID NOT WANT THE WHITE INVADER TO LEAVE INDIA\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nYES THE COOK ON A SHIP CAN ASPIRE TO BE CAPTAIN.. BUT FIRST HE MUST PASS AN EXAM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE CANT HAVE QUOTA FOR DALITS IN ISRO OR A QUOTA FOR DONKEYS ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT TEACH A DONKEY TO SING \u2014 WISDOM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS THERE IS QUOTA SYSTEM , THERE WILL BE BRAIN DRAIN FROM INDIA \u2026. NO HORSE WILL AGREE TO BE LORDED OVER BY A DONKEY ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nBY ALL MEANS GIVE FREE EDUCATION TO DALITS\u2014BUT IT MUST STOP THERE \u2026 GIVING JOB RESERVATIONS AND EVEN PROMOTIONS WILL NOT HELP BHARATMATA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">OUR CONSTIITUTION DEMANDS THAT ALL CITIZENS BE TREATED THE SAME..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDALIT LEADERS LIKE KANCHA ILAIAH AND JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS MUST NOT LONGER LIE THAT DALITS WERE SUPRESSED FOR MILLIUNIUMS ..<br />\n<br />\nIT HAPPENED ONLY IN KERALA , NOT THE REST OF INDIA\u2026<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">UNTOUCHABILITY IN KERALA WAS TO PRESERVE , NOT SUPRESS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_98MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_98BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_98B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2889325542601838581\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_99M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: large;\">Sanatana Dharma allows only SHRADDHA ( enlightened faith ) \u2013never BHAKTI ( blind faith out of dogma ) \u2013self verification is paramount for Hindus..&nbsp;</span><br />\nShraddha is not something that we can command; it has to happen..<br />\n<br />\nIn having Shraddha, there is trust, faith, reverence, devotion, openness, and freedom. In fact, this is the trust where there is freedom.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is a Sanskrit/ Malayalam word -- an unshakable conviction in our journey.<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN THE FOLLOWING WEBSITES--<br />\nSHATRUGHAN SINHA<br />\nYASHWANT SINHA<br />\nARUN SHOURIE<br />\nLK ADVANI<br />\nJASWANT SINGH<br />\nMURLI MANOHAR JOSHI<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nPMO<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MOMOTO AND KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCBSE CHIEF<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABHA KANT<br />\nMANEKA GANDHI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nEDUCATION MINISTER<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF ALL DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA-- EVERY WHICH WAY.<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO CO-OPERATE. Rothschild created and backdated BASAVA. This sect now buries their dead bodies and are NOT Hindus anymore.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THERE CAN BE NO LITERARY FEST WITHOUT EXTENSIVE DISCUSSIONS OF THE FAKE RADHA, FAKE KUV KUSH , AND THE FAKE BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES.</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; After he died, the Emperor Shah Jahan forced UNCLE Shantidas ( Shah Jahan called him MAAMA ) to take back the expensive FAKE jewels and refund the money.<br />\n<br />\nArvind Mills belongs to Shantidas baby\u2019s descendants\u2014 Lalbhai Dalpatbhai. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --CAN YOU TELL 2% ?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWOOKAY !</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAt the turn of the 17th century the richest traders of Ahmadabad were Gujarati crypto Jew Jain merchants who were agents of Jew Rothschild.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt was in the last decade of the reign of emperor Akbar that&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">Shantidas Jhaveri&nbsp;</span>was bom in the house of Sahasrakiran, a crypto Jew Jain scion of the royal Rajput house of Sisodias of Udaipur.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Sisodias were the last Rajput dynasty to form an alliance with the Mughals</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBhoj Raj the husband of the bhakti poet-saint Rothschild\u2019s fake creation Meerabai ( Radha re-incarnation ) never existed ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAfarman issued by Jahangir in 1622 in which \"Jawahari\" was added to Shantidas name signifying his association with jewel business. This is the Zaveri Jeweller shit you hear today..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn 1627 the English factor referred to him as \"the deceased king's (Jahangir) Jewelers\"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn one of his farmans Shah Jahan mentioned Shantidas as the \"beopari\" (merchant) and a loyal \"Jawahari\" (jeweller) of the court..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe farman mentioned the havelis (mansions), shops and gardens in Ahmadabad owned by him.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe farman ordered the administrators of the province that none should occupy the assets of Shantidas and instructed that there should be no interference in realizing the rents from the shops and warns against any molestation of his property.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn yet another farman Shahjahan reaffirms and directs that the entire property possessed by Shantidas should pass on to his heirs without interference in case of his death.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAs a mark of patronage the emperor conferred a robe of honour upon Shantidas in 1658.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn 1658 CROOK Shantidas supplied FAKE DIAMONDS ( evaluated by Shah Jahan for a second opinion ) Shah Jahan warned him against this practice.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Rothschild used Shantidas as an agent banker .</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn 1621, he built a magnificent Jain temple known as 'Chintamani temple' in locality of Bibipura. In 1645 Prince Aurangzeb during his tenure as the Subedar of Gujarat converted this temple into a mosque.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Virji Vora&nbsp;</span>name appears for the first time in the English commercial literature in 1619, in the reference to \"Hacka Parrack, being servant to Virgee.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u201cVora merchant of this cities\", who was recommended for courteous usage of all the Rothschild\u2019s ships</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVirji Vora was also called 'Baharji Bohra'. He signed letters to Rothschild as 'Virji Vohra Kendua',</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Virji baby had a mansion in Calicut. He bought pepper on a large scale from Malabar. Using Jewish strategy and tactics crypto Jew Virji baby manipulated the spice markets</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEngrossing the entire commodity by his syndicate BRAND was one such strategem. Virji Vora bought the entire consignment of cloves brought the Dutch at Surat at the rate of Rs. 45 per maund. And he resold the cloves at the rate of Rs. 62 and Rs. 65 per maund. In view of the predominance of Virji Vora no other merchants dared to buy the goods brought by Rothschild at Surat.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of Virji Vora's commercial ventures in Calicut is recorded by the English in great detail. \u201c HI understood that Virji Vora yearly sends down his people hither to Callicut with cotten and opium by which hee doth not [gain?] less than double his money to those people hee buyeth his money to those people hee buyeth his pepper off [and] afterwards disposeth of his pepper to us double what it cost him; for I fmde pepper to be worth here but 15-1/2 and 16 fanams the maund, which is not half the rate he usually valleweth it to our people in Suratt\".'</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBAAP RE !</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAt one place his mercantile dominance is described as follows :</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\"Here in Surratt all merchants, as well town dwellers as those that come from abroad, are so overawed by the overgrown greatnesse of verge Vora that, if it be a commodities which he is a ccustomed or doth intend to buy, no man dares look upon it nor the broker (even our owne, which have sole dependence upon your business) dare not accompanie such a merchant into our house\"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_53BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_53B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_54B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5653356806920993918\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_54M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/fake-champaran-satyagraha-of-gandhi.html?showComment=1523456899892#c5653356806920993918\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 11, 2018 at 7:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAIYOOOOO !.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVirji Vora promised to provide pepper at Calicut in 1641 but when the English factors approached his agent he again promised to deliver the said, quantity of pepper at Ponnani.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nUpon the promised supply being at last received, the quantity was found to be less than promised and the quality as bad.'</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe English factors wrote :</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\"The Potency of Virji Vora (who hath been the usual merchant, and is now become the sole monopolist of all European commodities) is observed to bear such a sway amongst the inferior merchants of this town that when they would often tymes buy [and give greater prices] they are still restrayned not daring to betray their intents to his knowledge and their own sufferance, in so much that the tyme and price is still in his will and at his own disposure\".'</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTOBA TOBA</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVirji Vora exerted such influence over the merchants of Surat that the English came to regard him as \"the most injurious man to your trde in all the MoguUs dominions; for what ordinary banian merchant dare come to the English howse to look upon corral or any other commodity, hee by his potency and intimacy with the Governor forgeth somewhat or against the poor man utterly to ruine him; so that no merchant in the towne are displease him by coming to our howse to look upon our commodity, except some or other some tyme whome hee sends purposely to bid for a commodity (that he is about) little or nothing openly to make weary of our commodities\".</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAYYOOOOOOOOOOOOO</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVirji Vora suffered a great setback when Shivaji sacked Surat in 1664. A contemporary says that Virji Vora lost \"six barrels of gold, money, pearls gems and other precious wares\".' William Foster estimated his loss to \u00a3 50,000.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVirji baby invested funds in credit or purchase or merchandise solely guided by profit. He drew an advantage by exerting pressure on his debtors to sell to him at discount, and used extension of credit to invest funds obtained by sale of commodities at particular places.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBeing a banker he had the further advantage of transferring funds by bills (hundis) more easily than ordinary merchants. For purposes of both trade and finance, he had factors (gumashtas) at various places, among which Ahmadabad, Agra, Golconda, Calicut and overseas in the Red Sea and the Persian Gulf</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCrypto Jew&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">Mulla Abdul Ghafur,</span>&nbsp;a Bohra muslim merchant from Surat was a shipping agent of Rothschild. He was the middle man operator of more than 2 dozen ships of Rothschild.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Mulla Abdul Ghaflir had mansion full of underage boys ( he was a anal sex receiving gay ) and girls ( for rich white Jew partners ) for sex \u2014protected by&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">giant black Sidi African assassins</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n' Abdul Ghafiir died without a son in 1718. Abdul baby left a fortune of \u201csix krors of Rupees\u201d (over six million sterlings) in those days</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPAAPI PETH BAR GAYA \u2013 2% SEH ?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8055463786420148402\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_185M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_73M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1525996869030#c3498136755581129753\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 5:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_73MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2026\u2026\u2026.</b></span><br />\nI AM PENNING THIS MOST CRITICAL POST FOR THE BLIND MEN OF HINDOOSTAN WHO ARE FIGHTING OVER THE QUINTESSENTIAL ELEPHANT..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES, THE IGNORANT ISI, THE FOOLISH THINK TANKS , THE PEABRAINED BENAMI MEDIA ETC , ARGUING ABOUT WHY TAJ MAHAL IS DIRTY FROM OUTSIDE AND INSIDE..<br />\n<br />\nONLY ONE MAN ON THIS PLANET CAN GIVE YOU THIS ANSWER--HIS NAME IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( IF I AM BOASTING, SO BE IT !) -- HENCE LISTEN UP..<br />\n<br />\nPure white marble used in building Taj Mahal is the result of metamorphism of a very pure (silicate-poor) limestone or dolomite protolith\u2026<br />\n<br />\nMost of the exterior marble slabs you see on Taj Mahal is ripped off from inside rooms of an older palace which stood there several centuries before JEW Shah Jahan and his JEWESS wife Mumtaj Mahal existed ..<br />\n<br />\nThis is an areas where ancient Nuclear explosions took place --and hence carbon dating will show later dates... This science is so sure that if you do carbon dating in a place where a fresh nuclear explosion took place like Bikini Atoll in Pacific--the carbon dating will show several centuries into the FUTURE ( instead of past )..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONSPIRACY TO SHUT DOWN MATHURAL OIL REFINERY-- BY DESH DROHIS IN THE PAYROLL OF THE WHITE MAN -- STATING THAT THE REFINERYs CHIMNEY EMISSIONS MAKE THE TAJ MAHAL DIRTY..<br />\n<br />\nOIL PUMPED INTO THE VADINAR ( GUJARAT ) DEEP SEA SBM TERMINAL FROM HUGE TANKERS GO ALL THE WAY TO MATHURA REFINERY BY PIPELINE WITH BOOSTER PUMPS ENROUTE.. THE SHIP WHICH I SERVED AS SECOND MATE WAS THE FIRST TO PUMP 280,000 TONNED OF RASTANURA CRUDE OIL INTO VADINAR..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DISTANCE FROM MATHURA OIL REFINERY TO TAJ MAHAL ( TO THE SOUTH EAST ) IS JUST 48 KM.. THIS PIPELINE FROM VADINAR DEEP SEA TERMINAL TO MATHURA REFINERY IS ABOUT 1800 KM LONG.. A MASSIVE INVESTMENT FOR THE PROSPERITY OF BHARATATA ..<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME I WAS A YOUNG OFFICER ( 1977 ) AND I SAID BULLSHIT -- WHEN I HEARD THE TOP IOC OFFICIALS TALKING ABOUT SHUTTING DOWN MATHURA REFINERY TO SAVE TAJ MAHAL - I CALLED THEM CUNTS !<br />\n<br />\nNow --<br />\n<br />\nI have carried huge 30 to 35 ton marble blocks from Sicily Italy ( Reggio Calabria ) to Kuwait , for making statues for the Kuwait Emir's palace. These marble blocks were unpolished and you would think it was a huge block of white chalk or limestone.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS THE YEAR 1981 , AND I WAS 37 YEARS YOUNGER.. A BACHELOR..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAD HEAVY DERRICKS FROM 40 TONNES VALLES TO 125 TONNES JUMBOS ..<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION : ON THE SAME SHIP I LOADED A NUCLEAR PLANT FOR SADDAM HUSSAIN ( ITALY ) AND LANDED IT DIRECTLY INTO TRUCKS AT AL-KUWAIT PORT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHIP HAD TWEEN DECKS ( UPPER AND LOWER ) INSIDE THE HOLD-- WHICH MEANT DOZENS OF HUGE HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS TO LIFT THE HATCH COVERS AND TWIN DECK COVERS..<br />\n<br />\nMY CAPTAIN WAS A MALAYALI IDIOT ( WE CALLED HIM FUCK-KNOWS-STEPHANOS ) WHO CAME UP FROM THE RANKS-- AND SO WHEN IT CAME TO USING BRAINS , I AS A THREE STRIPER CHIEF OFFICER HAD TO USE IT TO SAVE THE VENTURE--EVERY TIME.. MY CREW / COMPANY ( SCI ) LOOKED UP TO ME..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">BELOW-- WHAT I DESCRIBED AT HAMBURG DRY DOCK WAS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED TO THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP IN MUMBAI LOCKS WHICH CAPSIZED RECENTLY..&nbsp; &nbsp; READ A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT DATED 6TH DEC 2016..&nbsp; &nbsp; I HAD TO COMMENT BECAUSE OUR INDIAN NAVY IS FULL OF CUNTS SANS HONOUR ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WANTED THE TOP LAYER OF THE MARBLE BLOCK TO BE COVERED WITH LARGE PLASTIC SHEATH WRAPPING.. THIS COSTED TIME AND MONEY---AND THE SHIPPERS WERE UNWILLING TO DO IT..<br />\n<br />\nAS THE CHIEF MATE I SAID I WILL NOT SIGN THE MATES RECEIPTS--THERE WAS A STAND OFF --AND FINALLY I WON..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WHAT I SAID WAS --\"ONE DROP OF HYDRAULIC OIL DRIPPING ON MARBLE DURING THE VOYAGE ( SQUIRTING PAST LEAKY SEALS IN HIGH TEMPERATURE / ROUGH SEAS ) WOULD BE SUCKED INTO THE MARBLE SLAB LIKE ABSORBANT BLOTTING PAPER RENDERING IT UNFIT FOR POLISHING..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_73BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; WHEN THIS HAPPENS DIRT AND OIL ENTERS THE MICRO PORES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY , WHEN I MOVED INTO MY NEW HOME TWO DECADES AGO-- I SAW HUGE WHITE RAJASTANI MARBLE SLABS IN THE KITCHEN -- I GOT THEM RIPPED OFF AND CHANGED TO HIGHLY POLISHED SUPERIOR GRANITE WHOSE UNPOLISHED PORES WERE SMALLER ..<br />\n<br />\nALL CALLED ME CRAZY-- I SAID, I KNOW WHAT I AM DOING...THESE SURFACES WOULD BE CONSTANTLY COVERED BY OIL AND HARSH DETERGENTS..AND WOULD BE A DIRTY YELLOW EYE SORE SOONER THAN LATER ..<br />\n<br />\nWISDOM: WHEN YOU USE WHITE MARBLE SLABS--ENSURE THAT THE SURFACE IF HIGHLY POLISHED ..THIS IS EASIER DONE ON HORIZONTAL SURFACE WITHOUT GROOVES--AND ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO DO ON CURVED DOMES...<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">A COARSE UNPOLISHED MARBLE SURFACE HAS PITS WHICH HOLDS FOREIGN MATERIAL..</b></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nI WAS THE FIRST TO INTRODUCE \"PASSIVATION\" ON STAINLESS STEEL CHEMICAL TANKERS USING NITRIC ACID-- TO BUILD UP AN ANGSTROM THIN VENEER OF CHROMIUM OXIDE.. I HAD A RUNNING BATTLE WITH THE WHITE POWERS WHO RULED THE SEAS.. I WON..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE CARRY TOXINS LIKE MDI ( WHICH KILLED IN BHOPAL ), CARINOGENS LIKE BENZENE, STRONG ACIDS LIKE SULFURIC ACID, STRONG ALKALIES LIKE CAUSTIC POTASH , WHITE WINE, POTABLE RUM, ORANGE JUICE ETC..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/passivation-on-stainless-steel-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS POST ( ON TRUCKS ) IS FOR INDIAS FOOD AND TRANSPORT MINISTERIES.. IT WENT IGNORED.. LUYTENS DESH DROHI BASTARDS WHO ARE BHOOKA FOR A PIECE OF JUDAS SILVER\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">THIS BLOGSITE WILL SEND THESE LUTYENS TRAITORS TO JAIL\u2014THEY SHALL WAIT..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/08/tanker-lorries-carrying-liquids-in-bulk.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHEAVY DUTY ACIDIC DETERGENT CLEANERS SPOIL THE SURFACE OF POLISHED MARBLE..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHO THEY UNEARTHED THE GOLD AT PADMANABHA SWAMY TEMPLE IN KERALA.. ONE OVER SMART MALAYALI PUJARI USED STRONG AMWAY DETERGENT ON A BLACK GREASY VISHNU IDOL-- AND THE IDOL SUDDENLY STARTED SHINING LIKE GOLD..<br />\n<br />\nNOW ABOUT FLYING BROWN ALGAE..WHICH MADE THE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL MELORDS GO INTO A TIZZY..<br />\n<br />\nWHITE TAJ MAHAL DOMES CAN BE DARKENED BY NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM CNG CARS, NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM LPG COOKING CYLINDERS, DIESEL EXHAUSTS OF TRUCKS, DUST STORMS EMANATING FROM PAKISTAN SIDE, ACID RAIN WHOSE FOUNTAIN HEAD IS OIL REFINERIES IN THE SAUDI ARABIAN DESERT OR POLLUTION EVEN FURTHER AWAY..<br />\n<br />\nCALIFORNIAN WINE IS SHIT - BECAUSE&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">POLLUTION FROM CHINA TRAVELS ACROSS THE PACIFIC OCEAN IN 3 DAYS FLAT LIKE A HIGH ALTITUDE BALLOON</span></b>&nbsp;AND RAINS DOWN ON THE WEST COAST OF USA.. INSTEAD OF UNDERSTANDING THIS THE CUNTS IN USA ASKED ASKED SHIPS TO REDUCE SPEED AND USE LIGHT DIESEL OIL INSTEAD OF HEAVY FUEL OIL..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT IT 7 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/american-pollution-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY I NEVER DRINK FRENCH OR CALIFORNIAN WINE-- I PREFER CHILEAN WINE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; IT IS ORGANIC ( NOT INORGANIC LKE SIDDHA MEDICINES )\u2014VANASPATI/ VANSPATYA/ AUSHADI/ VIRUDHA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDravyaguna (pharmacology) deals comprehensively about rasa , guna , virya, vipaka and prabhava (pharmacokinetics and pharmcodynamics) of herbs\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThere are five concepts of the substance, namely:--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nrasa (taste),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ngu\u1e47a (properties),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nv\u012brya (potency),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nvip\u0101ka (rasa after digestion and metabolism)</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nand prabh\u0101va (specific pharmacological effect),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014which determine and explain the pharmacological behavior of a substance.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br FROM JERUSALEM AND BATUMI SPICES WERE LOADED AGAIN ON SHIPS DESTINED FOR EUROPE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOTH SALALAH AND GWADAR WERE PRIVATE PORTS OF THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DHOFAR IS THE ANCIENT KINGDOM-- SOUTH PART OF OMAN AND NORTH PART OF YEMEN.</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Race is a genetic distinction, and refers to people with shared ancestry and shared genetic traits.
