THIS WAS ROTHSCHILDs PROPAGANDA AS JEW HITLER WAS ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..<br />\n<br />\nJEWS OF EUROPE ( BASED FROM GEORGIA ) WERE MOSTLY LEFT HANDED HOMOSEXUALS , AND THEY ADOPTED THE SYMBOL OF SHIVA / SHAKTI MERGE , THE SIX POINTED STAR..<br />\n<br />\nARYANS ARE NOT BLUE EYED BLONDE EUROPEANS... ARYANS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WHO KNEW SANSKRIT AND VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE... THEY EXCELLED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY AND WERE VISITING PROFESSORS FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING ) TO TAXILA/NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR AND FOREIGN UNIVERSITIES LIKE ALEXANDRIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MATH KNOWINGCREAM OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( NAMBOODIRIPADS ) WERE BHATTATHIRIPADS .. ARYABHATTAs REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD ... ARYAN WAS A TITLE ( MAN OF KNOWLEDGE )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS WERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS OF KERALA...WHO WERE RULING CLASS. THIYYAS ARE DANAVAS... DANU IS THE MOTHER OF DANAVAS ..<br />\n<br />\nMaya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kashyapa's 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati. Danu, the Hindu primordial goddess, is mentioned in the Rigveda ( penned down 7000 years ago ) , as mother of the Danavas. Kashmir is named after Kashyapa..<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA is the creator of the MAYAN calendar.. He made the Indraprastha palace ..in which Duryodhana fell down in a pool of water in the hall of illusions ..<br />\n<br />\nKala [Time] created yonder heaven, and Kala made these realms of earth,<br />\nBy Kala, stirred to motion, both what is and what shall be, expand, (...).Kala created living things and first of all Prajapati,From Kala self-made KASHYAPA, from Kala Holy Fire was born.--\u2014\u2009<b>Atharvaveda, Book XIX, Hymns L51-53 ( 5000 BC )</b><br />\n<br />\nADITI is mentioned 81 times in Rig Veda..The Vedas went on oral rute for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago..Aditi is the mother of DEVAS ( example Indra ) and was also a wife of Kashyapa..<br />\n<br />\nSons of Danu ( DANAVAS ) and sons of Aditi ( DEVAS ) were opposite forces .. In Samudra Manthan the DANAVAS held the head of Vasuki the snake and DEVAS held the tail to churn the comic ocean..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJERUSALEM AND BATUMI ( GEORGIA/ KHAZARIA ) WERE SEA PORTS FROM WHERE THE JEWS ( MIDDLE MEN OF SPICES ) TOOK CALICUT KINGs SPICES AFTER OVERLAND ROUTE JOURNEY --LOADED IT ON SHIPS AND TOOK IT TO EUROPE FOR SALE.<br />\n<br />\nFROM SALALAH ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT VIA MECCA OASIS TO PALESTINE..<br />\n<br />\nFROM GWADAR ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT TO BATUMI GEORGIA AND CONSTANTINOPLE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE JEWS OF CONSTANTINOPLE WERE CRYPTO. THEY STILL ARE .. THE FIRST REAL DEEP STATE WAS IN TURKEY WITH CRYPTO JEWS CONTROLLING AND MUSLIMS RULING..<br />\n<br />\nYOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD NOT MARRY OR OWN LAND..WHILE THE ELDEST BROTHER COULD HAVE 4 WIVES AND OWN ALL FERTILE LAND..<br />\n<br />\nMOHAMMADs FATHER WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO WAS PUJARI OF SHIVA TEMPLE ( KAABA )..WHEN MOHAMMAD MADE HIS NEW RELIGION THE FIRST THING HE DID WAS ALLOWING ALL YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS TO HAVE 4 WIVES...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE ORIGINAL JEWS OF PALESTINE ARE ALL IN KERALA , OR DEAD OR CONVERTED..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE NO ORIGINAL JEWS IN KHAZARIA .. THESE ARE ALL A GANG OF CRIMINALS / HOMOSEXUALS ( WHITES ) WHO WERE WARNED TO ADOPT A RELIGION OR PERISH ..&nbsp; &nbsp;THESE ARE THE \"<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SEMITES</span></b>\". India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; INCLUDING PATRON FOUNDER SIR SYED AHMAN KHAN WHO WAS AN AGENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS JEW AGENTS HIS HIGHNESS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN AND AGHA KHAN III</span></b>&nbsp;AS FRONTS FOR FUND COLLECTION AND TO DO PROPAGANDA FOR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD MADE CRYPTO JEW SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE CONFERENCES FOR MORE THAN A DECADE.. HE WAS THE FIRST VC OF AMU..<br />\n<br />\nJEW SIR AGA KHAN WAS MADE THE PRO-CHANCELLOR OR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;KAIKHUSRAU JAHAN</span></b>&nbsp;, BEGUM OF BHOPAL WAS THE CHANCELLOR OF AMU. .. IMAGINE A WOMAN CHANCELLOR OF A MUSLIM UNIVERSITY--ONLY ROTHSCHILD COULD HAVE PULLED THAT OFF.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN BEFORE WORLD WAR 1 STARTED ROTHSCHILD MADE HER THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE LADIES ASSOCIATION.. SHE WAS MADE DAME GRAND CROSS OF THE BRITISH EMPIRE.. BAAP REH !<br />\n<br />\nHER SON JEW&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HAMIDULLAH KHAN&nbsp;</span></b>WAS AN AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD..HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF THE CHAMBER OF PRINCES.&nbsp; &nbsp;SIR HAMIDULLAH KHAN HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF AMU FOR 5 YEARS ..&nbsp; HAMIDULLAH KHANs GRAND DAUGHER WAS MARRIED TO NAWAB OF PATAUDI (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAREENA KAPOORs FATHER-IN-LAW</span></b>&nbsp;)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;SIR MUHAMMED IQBAL&nbsp;</span></b>( POET ) IS PAKISTANs NO 1 CITIZEN..<br />\n<br />\nAt Heidelberg Germany, one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, James Long .<br />\n<br />\nWith them Sen establish a TRAITOR \"British Indian Association\" filled with Bhadaraloks , Pir Ali \u201cbrahmins\u201d , white people and Anglo Indians ( RAPE PRODUCTS OF WHITE MAN AND THEIR MAID SERVANTS ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1866 Sen delivered an address on Jesus Christ, Europe and Asia, in which he proclaimed that \"India would be for Christ alone who already stalks the land\"<br />\n<br />\nVivekananda was a member of a Freemasonry lodge in 1883.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild published ( 1896 ) and propagated Vivekananda\u2019s book Raja Yoga.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893.<br />\n<br />\nFor the next three years Vivekananda would be shown to several western doctors in USA , England and Europe to treat his terrible diseases\u2014and all the while he lectured too.<br />\nRothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.<br />\n<br />\nCOMMIE AGNIVESH IS ALSO SWAMI.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA IS GUILTY OF ALLOWING HINDUISM TO BE BRANDED AS FULL OF SUPERSTITION \u2014 WHEN THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SUPERSTITION , OTHER THAN WHAT HIS MASTER ROTHSCHILD INJECTED- USING HIS FAKE CREATIONS AND FAKE MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs MEDIA PROPPED HIM UP<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA HAD VERY LITTLE PRANA WITHIN AND SUFFERED FROM 33 MAJOR ILLNESSES. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">#####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Al Biruni<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">AL fuckin\u2019 BIRUNI STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY AND TOOK ELABORATE NOTES WITH HIM -WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING, AS HE WAS NOT VERY BRIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Biruni was a Sanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors adept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote Wikipedia -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own. He just lifted and patented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">As regards Alzhazen\u2019s OPTICS, the wolrd must know we Indians were masters in TOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION \u2013 the ultimate in optics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/total-internal-reflection-capt-ajit.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ptolemy stole from the astronomical data from Surya Siddhanta . The white historians had the gall to LIE that Varahamihira 2660 BC stole from Ptolemy of 155 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">He went back and patented SWASTIKA ( dhruv / Polaris and sapt rishis/ great bear ) in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">We never affixed author\u2019s names on our books of knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Kodungallur university BLACK BALLED all stealing Greeks . And ancient Greek knowledge suddenly dried up like water in the hot desert sands..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">##########################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Zakariya al-Razi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muhammad fuckin\u2019 ibn Zakariya al-Razi studied in Kodungallur University in 886 AD. He left behind several translated to Arabic manuscripts on medicine and surgery ( Al Mansuri ) and astronomy. This knowledge of Susruta and Charaka was sold to him for gold . All the manuscripts he left behind were ready made translated knowledge from Kodungllur university ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">###############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Nasir al-Din al-Tusi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Nasir al-Din fuckin\u2019 al-Tusi studied in Kodungallur University in 1260 AD. He is called the father of Trigonometry This is nonsense . He was NOT a bright student and he was given translated Math knowledge ( Kit\u0101b al-Shakl al-qatt\u0101 ) from the Kerala school of Math in exchange for gold. , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">FROM 800 AD TO 1450AD KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING EARNED HUGE AMOUNT OF GOLD FOR SELLING READY MADE TRANSLATED KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; MOHAMAMD ALI JAUHAR WAS A JEW WHO WAS BURIED IN JERUSALEM.. I HAVE SEEN HIS KOSHER GRAVE..<br /><br />JEW MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR AND JEW GANDHI CAME TO KERALA TO WHIP UP THE KHILAFAT MOVEMENT IN SUPPORT OF THE JEWISH TURKISH OTTOMAN SULTAN.. THE LAST 70% OF THE OTTOMAN SULTANS OF TURKEY WERE JEWS PRETENDING TO BE MUSLIMS..<br /><br />THIS WAS A SLIMY MOVEMENT TO DRIVE A WEDGE BETWEEN MUSLIMS AND HINDUS OF KERALA..<br /><br />THIS LED TO THE MOPLAH REVOLT..<br /><br />The Kerala half breed Muslims ( mappilas ) turned against the North Kerala Hindus and drove away one lakh hindus ( official estimate ) as there was no water to drink.<br /><br />Countless Hindus were beheaded and every well, pond, river and water body was full of rotting corpses . All Hindu lands were usurped by the Muslims .<br /><br />The mappilas stocked their mosques with food , water , long spears and khilafat swords -and this was NO knee jerk attack, but a pre-meditated and long planned one .<br /><br />The MALABAR SPECIAL POLICE was formed by the British --who were angry as some white women and children were murdered by the mappilas .<br /><br />This unit of 800 police were DESH BHAKTS , all KALARI EXPERTS all more than 6 feet in height and well built .<br /><br />Along with the nippy Gurkha regiment ( all shorties ) they ran after the poor mapplias with swords and kurkhris and captured all of the MOPLAH REVOLT mutineers .<br /><br />the british took revenge for the murder of the whites --<br /><br />On 20th Nov 1921, they packed up a train compartment full of the worst mappilas and most of them died on the passage from Tanur Kerala to Podanur Tamil Nadu jail .<br /><br />When the compartment was opened the mappila prisoners had clawed and eaten each other-- due to a type of wet paint inside the compartment --they went berserk due to the fumes and lack of oxygen .<br /><br />RETRIBUTION OF THE MOST SEVERE KIND .<br /><br />Before the birth of Islam all Kerala mappilas were Hindus.. They ran the spice caravan route from Salalah to Mecca to Jerusalem..<br /><br />After the birth of Islam the mappilas metamorphosed to offsprings of foreign Muslim man and local Hindu women .. Today all mappilas are Muslims ..<br /><br />GANDHI WAS AN EVIL MAN, A TRAITOR FROM WITHIN .. THE FIERCE GUARD IN UNIFORM STANDING OVER HIM, TOLD HIM TO STOP.. HE DID NOT.. HE CONTINUED RUBBING.<br />\n<br />\nHE FURIOUS GUARD BEAT HIM BADLY WITH THE WHIP-- THE WHIP END TORE HIS CLOTHES AND RIPPED HIS SKIN, STILL HE CONTINUED.. THEN THE GUARD KICKED HIM OFF..<br />\n<br />\nI ASKED HIM-- MUSLIMS SAY HINDUS ARE IDOLATORS ..WHAT IS A MUSLIM PILGRIMS WHO GOES TO MECCA ? HE KNEW THE ANSWER--BUT DID NOT SPELL IT OUT TO ME.. , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">On March 13, 2018, Parliament\u2019s lower house,\nthe Lok Sabha, passed without debate funding demands from 99 Indian government\nministries and departments, including two bills and 218 amendments.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Sumitra Mahajan, speaker of the Lok\nSabha\u2013controlled by the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP)\u2013used a parliamentary\nprocedure called the \u201cguillotine\u201d, which empowers her to pass grants without\ndiscussion.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The most shocking among the demands passed\nwasl foreign funding to political parties, which will allow them to escape\nscrutiny with retrospective effect for 42 years.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The amendment substitutes \u201c26th September,\n2010\u201d in the FCRA Act with \u201c5th August 1976\u201d. In so doing it legalises all\nforeign funding to political parties over 42 years and protects the parties in\nquestion from judicial inquiry.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html?showComment=1521120486614#c3239345901241701013\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 15, 2018 at 6:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_56MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WHAT IS GUILLOTINE?</b></span><br />\n<br />\nGUILOTINE WAS INTRODUCED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD \u2013 HE CONTROLLED THE HOUSE OF LORDS , AS ALL MPs WERE CHOSEN BY HIM.<br />\n<br />\nBUT IN THE ELECTED HOUSE OF COMMONS HE HAD THE POWER OF GUILLOTINE VESTED ON THE SPEAKER .<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs AGENTS WOULD FILLYBUSTER AND THE BHAAAM CAME THE SPEAKERS GUILOTINE<br />\n<br />\nDESH DROHI RULE : All outstanding Demands for Grants must be voted by the House without discussions once the guillotine is invoked. Once the pre-specified time for invoking the guillotine is reached, the member who is in possession of the house at that point in time, is requested by the Speaker to resume his or her seat following which Demands for Grants under discussion are immediately put to vote. Thereafter, all outstanding Demands are guillotined. Invoking the guillotine ensures passage of the Finance Bill. A Finance bill is Rothschild\u2019s brain child.<br />\n<br />\nEXCUSE : <b><span style=\"color: red;\">Guillotine </span></b>refers to the exercise vide which the Speaker of the House, on the very last day of the period allotted for discussions on the Demands for Grants, puts to vote all outstanding Demands for Grants at a time specified in advance. The aim of the exercise is to conclude discussions on financial proposals within the time specified.<br />\n<br />\nWHAT TYPE OF DEMOCRACY DO WE HAVE ?<br />\n<br />\nARE WE A BANANA REPUBLIC?<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI MEDIA SELECTS \u201cPOTHOLE JOURNALISTS\u201d WHO DON\u2019T KNOW ASSHOLE FROM ELBOW ABOUT ECONOMICS..&nbsp; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5413744557126736998\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_59M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html?showComment=1521123142994#c5413744557126736998\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 15, 2018 at 7:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_59MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSUMITRA MAHAJAN DOES NOT KNOW HER POWERS \u2013NOR DOES SHE ONOW HER OWN CODE OF CONDUCT<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPEAKER OF THE LOK SABHA IS A VERY POWERFUL POST.<br />\n<br />\nIn the warrant of precedence, the speaker of Lok Sabha, stand next only to the President, the Vice-President and the Prime Minister.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the members of Parliament represent the individual constituencies, the Speaker represents the full authority of the House itself. He symbolises the dignity and power of the House over which he is presiding.<br />\n<br />\nThe speaker of the Lok Sabha must be guided by the provisions of the Constitution and the Rules of Procedure and Conduct of Business in Lok Sabha<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution of India provides that the Speaker's salary and allowances are not to be voted by Parliament and are to be charged on the Consolidated Fund of India.<br />\n<br />\nThe speaker of the Lok Sabha is the ultimate arbiter and interpreter of those provisions which relate to the functioning of the House. His decisions are final and binding and ordinarily cannot be questioned, challenged or criticised.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH WOMEN MEIRA KUMAR AND SUMITRA MAHAJAN HAVE FAILED.. THEY HAVE FAILED TO EXERCISE THE VAST AUTHORITY UNDER THE CONSTITUTION AND THE RULES OF PARLIAMENT . NOWHERE ON THE PLANET DO WE HAVE A FISH MARKET LIKE LOK SABHA..<br />\n<br />\nNonsense like BAITH JAYEEYE \u2013 SHANTH HO JAYEEYE are unbecoming words from the mouth of a speaker. Can you ever expect a Judge in a court to mouth nonsense like this.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taVwibXCV6w</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_59MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZVNDEBPPoe4</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SPEAKER CAN ENFORCE DISCIPLINE AND DECORUM IN THE HOUSE BY ANY MEANS HE DEEMS FIT.<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS THE POWERS TO SUSPEND MPs WHO RUSH INTO THE WELL OF THE HOUSE, SHOUT SLOGANS AND SHOW POSTERS .<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPEAKER HAS THE POWERS TO DECIDE ON THE AGENDA TO BE DISCUSSES OR DEBATED<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPEAKER HAS TO ENSURE THAT ALL COMMENTS AND PEECHED MADE BY MPs ARE ADDRESSED TO THE SPEAKERs CHAIR.<br />\n<br />\nAdequate powers are vested in the office of the Lok Sabha Speaker to help him in the smooth conduct of the parliamentary proceedings and for protecting the dignity of the office.<br />\n<br />\nThe rules of the Indian Parliament indicate that the Presiding Officers in the two Houses are given vast powers by the rules.<br />\n<br />\nIt is the Presiding Officer who decides the admissibility of a Question; it is he who decides the forms in which amendments may be moved to the Motion of Thanks to the President's Address. With regard to moving amendments to a Bill, the permission of the Chair is required.<br />\n<br />\nIf a Bill is pending before the House, it is the Speaker who decides whether he should allow amendments to be moved to various clauses of the Bill or not. As regards regulating discussions in the House, it is the Speaker who decides as to when a member shall speak and how long he shall speak.<br />\n<br />\nIt is left to him to ask a member to discontinue her speech or even decide that what a particular member said may not go on record as part of the proceedings. If he is satisfied, the Speaker can direct a member to withdraw from the House for a specific period of time. A member who flouts his orders or directions may be named by the Speaker and in such cases, he may have to withdraw from the House.<br />\n<br />\nThe Speaker is the guardian of the rights and privileges of the House, its Committees and members When a speaker allows MPs to shout indefinitely and rush into the well of the house \u2013he is not doing his job. In such a case the speaker must be removed as per the rules.<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE A CAPTAIN ALLOWING HIS CREW TO RUN INTO THE WHEELHOUSE AND SHOUT SLOGANS. IF THIS HAPPENS AND CAPTAIN HAS NOT TAKEN DISCIPLINARY ACTION , THE CAPTAIN WILL BE SACKED AT THE NEXT PORT\u2014FOR BEING THE CAUSE OF LOSS OF SANCITY OF THE NAVIGATING BRIDGE<br />\n.<br />\nIt depends solely on the Speaker to refer any question of privilege to the Committee of Privileges for examination, investigation and report. It is through him that the decisions of the House are communicated to outside individuals and authorities.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_59BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedfQhD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_58T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedfQhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_58TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedfQhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_58TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedfQhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_58TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedfQhD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_58B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6300599098682844877\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_58M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html?showComment=1521123172958#c6300599098682844877\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 15, 2018 at 7:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_58MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM ONE--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It is the Speaker who decides the form and manner in which the proceedings of the House is published. He also issues warrants to execute the orders of the House, wherever necessary, and delivers reprimands on behalf of the House.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The entire Parliamentary Estate is under the authority of the Speaker. When a decision of the House is to be ascertained on a motion made by a member, the question is put by the Speaker before the House to obtain the decision. On questions of points of order, it is he who finally decides whether the matter raised is in order or not. The Speaker also has residuary powers under the Rules of Procedure.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All matters which are not specifically provided under the rules and all questions relating to the working of the rules are regulated by him. In exercise of this power and under his inherent powers, the Speaker issues from time to time directions which are generally treated as sacrosanct as the Rules of Procedure.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On matters regarding interpretation of constitutional provisions relating to the House or the Rules of Procedure, he gives rulings which are respected by members and are binding in nature. Under the Constitution, the Speaker enjoys a special position insofar as certain matters pertaining to the relations between the two Houses of Parliament are concerned. He certifies Money Bills and decides finally what are money matters by reason of the Lok Sabha's overriding powers in financial matters.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru, placed the office of the Speaker in India in the proper context when he said:&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Speaker represents the House. He represents the dignity of the House, the freedom of the House and because the House represents the nation, in a particular way, the Speaker becomes a symbol of nation's freedom and liberty. Therefore that should be an honoured position, a free position and should be occupied always by persons of outstanding ability and impartiality.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIKE ON A SHIP\u2014 THE CREW ( OR THE COMPANY ) DOES NOT WANT A CAPTAIN TO CRY\u2014 SAME WAY THE NATION DOES NOT WANT A SPEAKER TO CRY..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DO YOUR FUCKIN\u2019 JOB \u2014 OR RESIGN</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ministry of\nParliamentary Affairs (India) was created in 1949 as a department but later\nbecame a full ministry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Minister of\nParliamentary Affairs holds cabinet rank as a member of the Council of\nMinisters. The current minister is Ananth Kumar. The Ministry of Parliamentary\nAffairs works under the overall direction of Cabinet Committee on Parliamentary\nAffairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The minister must acts\nas liaison with leaders and whips of various parties and groups represented in\nParliament.. &nbsp;It is his fuckin\u2019 job to\nraise issues &nbsp;on procedural and other\nparliamentary matters. Why doe we have MPs rushing into the well of the house ?\nWhy are these &nbsp;solagn shouting MPs not\nnamed and punished or even debarred for doing it again and again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only are\ndisruptions a waste of Parliament\u2019s valuable time, these significantly taint\nthe image of this esteemed institution of democracy . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of these RAJYA\nSABHA &nbsp;MPs are in foreign payroll..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the Rules\nof Conduct and Parliamentary Etiquette of the Rajya Sabha, ------<i>\u201cThe House has the\nright to punish its members for their misconduct whether in the House or\noutside it.&nbsp; In cases of misconduct or\ncontempt committed by its members, the House can impose a punishment in the\nform of admonition, reprimand, withdrawal from the House, suspension from the\nservice of the House, imprisonment and expulsion from the House.\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/abolish-rajya-sabha-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/abolish-rajya-sabha-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE MOST PEA BRAINED MP\nINDIA HAS PRODUCED SINCE INDEPENDENCE IS A CHRISTIAN NAMED DERK O BRIEN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHECK OUT WHAT HE SAYS \u201c\nI AM CHRISTIAN FIRST\u2014AND THEN INDIAN\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mild offences are\npunished by admonition or reprimand (reprimand being the more serious of the\ntwo) since the man is a chosen by the people..&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Withdrawal from the\nHouse is demanded in the case of gross misconduct. \u2018Persistent and wilful\nobstructions\u2019 &nbsp;must cause the speaker to\nname and subsequently move a motion for suspension of the member. &nbsp;But hey, a member can be suspended, at the\nmaximum, for the remainder of the session only.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an extreme case of\nmisconduct, the House MUST &nbsp;expel a\nmember from the House. &nbsp;According to a\ncomment in the &nbsp;rule book, \u201cThe purpose\nof expulsion is not so much disciplinary as remedial, not so much to punish\nmembers as to rid the House of persons who are unfit for membership.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There have been several\ninstances in the past when the Parliament has exercised its right to punish members\nin the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>CHECK OUT SHURPENEKA</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS WOMAN RENUKA CHOWDHURY SHOULD HAVE BEEN NAMED AND SENT OUT OF THE RAJYA SABHA ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WHAT THE FUCK IS ALL THIS ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ja703gLo4eM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ja703gLo4eM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Discipline, decorum and dignity of Parliament\nare of paramount importance for the efficient functioning and success of\nparliamentary institutions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: Cambria, serif;\">CONTEMPT OF THE HOUSE&nbsp; ( RUSHING INTO THE WELL OF THE HOUSE/&nbsp; </b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><b>INSUBORDINATION</b></span><b style=\"font-family: Cambria, serif;\">&nbsp;TO SPEAKERS ORDERS / CHANTING SLOGANS / HOLDING PLACARDS ) MUST BE PUNISHED\nSEVERELY ,&nbsp; &nbsp;BY DEBARRING AN MP FROM CONTESTING ELECTION FOR TEN YEARS \u2013&nbsp; WITH LOSS OF ALL SALARIES AND PERKS DURING\nTHIS PERIOD..</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jawaharlal Nehru wrote on 4 October 1951,\n--that parliamentarians to maintain high standards of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">behaviour.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nehru&nbsp;wrote: QUOTE: &nbsp;If once the reputation of our\nlegislatures goes down, then democracy itself will be in peril. Therefore the\nreputation of these legislatures as also of our services, must be strictly\nguarded and any misbehaviour should lead to enquiry and action. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE CHIEF WHIP OF A POLITICAL PARTY MUST BE\nDEBARRED FROM PARLIAMENT FOR A YEAR OF HE CANNOT CONTROL HIS PARTY MEMBERS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I REMEMBER WE HAD A PARLIAMENT SESSION WHILE\nIN SCHOOL.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I WAS AGHAST ( AT THE AGE OF 14 ) TO HEAR OUR\nTEACHER TELLING US TO RUSH INTO THE WELL OF THE HOUSE AND THEN STAGE A WALKOUT<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SINCE I WAS THE CHIEF WHIP\u2014I SAID IMMEDIATELY\u2014\n\u201cWE WONT DO THAT\u201d</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">MPs are bound to vote according to the\ndirection issued by their political party, failing which they can be\ndisqualified from membership in the Lok Sabha. Such direction \u2013 called a whip<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">We must stop this BULLSHIT whip system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">DESH BHAKTS may not agree with their party\nleadership<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE MUST HAVE SECRET VOTE SYSTEM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
