Students involved are mainly commies from SOCIAL SCIENCES group. Shut down social sciences groups in JNU/ JU/ TISS etc&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Some faculty members too tried to escalate these protests through their active participation or supportive roles. These traitor foreign funded commie professors give more marks to students who agitate and vandalise\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the cities, the front \u201cmass organisations\u201d are generally manned by ideologues, who include academicians and activists, fully committed to the party line\u2026 Such organisations ostensibly pursue human rights-related issues and are adept at using the legal processes of the Indian state to undermine and emasculate enforcement action by the security forces.. \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We see the same faces in all CANDLE LIGHT VIGILS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They malign state institutions through propaganda and disinformation to further the cause of their \u201crevolution\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From these mass organisations, AGGRESSIVE individuals are selected, brainwashed for supporting and becoming members of the Maoist party. They get foreign funds ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Has anybody ever found out who foots the travel / hotel bills of Umar Khaid , Snehla Rashid and Umar Khalid ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 3--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_6B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9050446933952586098\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_7M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456639658#c9050446933952586098\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nOne important reason for the Maoists\u2019 focus on urban areas in the last few years is the recruitment ebb they are facing in tribal areas as tribals began to understand the hollowness of Maoist ideology.<br />\n<br />\nThe Maoist movement wants nothing short of a break-up of the Indian state. Its most insidious and dangerous arm is urban Naxalism.<br />\n<br />\nThe GURU of Fourth Generation Warfare, William Lind observes that \u201cif nation-states are going to survive, people in power must earn and keep the trust of the governed\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nThis fourth generation war is complex and long-term. It is decentralised, small in size and lacks hierarchy.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy is to make a direct attack on the enemy\u2019s (in this case, the Indian state) culture, including genocidal acts against civilians and wage a highly sophisticated psychological and cultural warfare, especially through media manipulation and lawfare.<br />\n<br />\nAll available pressures are used \u2014 political, economic, social and military. For this purpose, legal professionals are required, media professionals are required, creative people, varied intellectuals and academicians are required, and civil society leaders are required, especially those who are connected with NGOs. It begins with low-intensity conflicts where all the actors attack from different platforms.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2004, the Communist Party of India (Marxist\u2013Leninist) People\u2019s War, usually called People\u2019s War Group, merged with the Maoist Communist Centre of India and formed the Communist Party of India (Maoist), pledging to the ideology of Marxism-Leninism-Maoism. The party became a member of the Coordination Committee of Maoist Parties and Organisations of South Asia.<br />\n<br />\nThis new entity drafted a blueprint for their urban movement/activities. It is believed that Kobad Ghandy, who was arrested in September 2009 in New Delhi, played a major role in the preparation of this urban perspective plan.<br />\n<br />\nThe document admits that the enemy is very strong in urban areas and therefore should never be engaged with until the conditions are favourable. And to make them favourable, it suggests the exploring and opening of opportunities, and organising people through front organisations.<br />\n<br />\nTarget the \u201cvulnerable group\u201d of minorities, women, Dalits, labourers and students through influencers who work undercover for a long time and accumulate strength. The document stresses on uniting industrial proletariats and students, and using them as vanguards who can play a direct role in revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe city becomes the money source, shelter for cadre as transit points, source of weaponry and legal protection, medical aid, media attention and intelligentsia network.<br />\n<br />\nThe stronger the movement becomes in urban areas, the more likely it is to contribute to the agrarian revolution, in terms of providing leaders, men and material to the people\u2019s war.<br />\n<br />\nThe majority of the people in Maoist-affected areas and even their supporters and cadres have little to do with Maoism at the ideological level. They are only alienated and angry people with a sense of injustice, oppression and indignity.<br />\n<br />\nMaoists cleverly exploit this sentiment to their advantage \u2014 caste conflicts in Bihar, resentment against landlords in Andhra Pradesh, discontent against forest laws in tribal areas, unemployment amongst youth, radicalism among Muslims are all given the prescription of capture of power through the gun.<br />\n<br />\nWhile local grievances need to be effectively addressed through improved governance and ruthless accountability, there is an urgent need for creating mass awareness of the ultimate designs and consequences of what the extremists stand for.<br />\n<br />\nThe forest-based rebellion survives mostly on what Maoist ideologue Varavara Rao calls the \u201cmovement in urban areas\u201d. The network is in many cities, and sympathisers occupy prominent positions.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2251280051978801314\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456775181#c2251280051978801314\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nConsider logistics support. In 2006, the police seized empty rocket shells and rocket launchers in Mahabubnagar district, Andhra Pradesh. The kingpin, \u201cTech Madhu\u201d, later surrendered to the police, which led to the detection of an elaborate network the Maoists had built.<br />\n<br />\nThe network originated in the industrial centre of Ambattur, a Chennai suburb, where rocket parts were fabricated, and stealthily transported in private commercial carriers to different parts of the country. The network is spread across five states: Tamil Nadu, Andhra, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh and Odisha.<br />\n<br />\nIn the cities, an invisible naxal-intelligentsia-media-academia-NGO-activist nexus works as strategic fortification with the ultimate aim of taking over the Indian state to achieve Maoist rule. The Maoists have identified Pune-Mumbai-Ahmadabad as the \u201cGolden Corridor\u201d, Delhi-Kanpur-Patna-Kolkata as the \u201cGanga Corridor\u201d. And Chennai-Coimbatore-Bengaluru as \u201cTri-junction\u201d.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Key universities like Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), Jadavpur University (JU), Osmania University, Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) would work as R&amp;D centres of urban naxalism.</span></div>\n<br />\nMaoist documents mention three kinds of urban mass organisations: secret, open and semi-open, and legal \u201cdemocratic\u201d organisations.<br />\n<br />\nThe legal organisations are the most dangerous for national security, as they try to subvert constitutional authority surreptitiously by building mass support through subtle manipulation of grievances against the state.<br />\n<br />\nThough government can ban the other two types of organisations, it is almost impossible to ban these legal organisations as civil society, human rights and other vigilante groups rush forth and create a hue and cry that the rights of the common man are being denied.<br />\n<br />\nThese organisations work closely with disgruntled groups of trade unions, student bodies, women\u2019s fronts, caste abolition organisations, nationality organisations, writers\u2019 associations, lawyers\u2019 organisations, teachers\u2019 associations, cultural bodies etc.<br />\n<br />\nNaxals are operating under the garb of human rights NGOs. These are manned by ideologues, including academicians and activists..<br />\n<br />\nThe tactics employed are extremely effective and media attention-grabbing. These range from using aggressive agitations and propaganda, provoking Dalits to take up arms, to programmes on anti-capitalist policies, to defunct/ fake controversies in history..<br />\n<br />\nThe activists take up genuine issues \u2014 not with the aim to solve them but to create unrest and anger against the system, and make people believe in armed struggle.<br />\n<br />\nAny activist working under banners with hints of revolution, like \u2018sangharsh\u2019 and \u2018kranti\u2019 must be profiled\u2026<br />\n<br />\nVaravara Rao said at a news conference in JU on 26 Feburary 2010, \u201cOur support is growing among students of Kolkata. Though these students don\u2019t come from tribal areas, they understand the situation.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMany university campuses have been witnessing student unrest in the last few years. The common thread in all these institutes-turned-battlefields is a protest against the union government in the name of constitutional principles and democratic values.<br />\n<br />\nA closer look reveals that there is no suppression of \u201cdemocratic principles\u201d by the government. However, a picture has been painted so. Some faculty members too tried to escalate these protests through their active participation or supportive roles.<br />\n<br />\nAll this left the common man wondering \u201cHow did students turn anti-India?\u201d \u201cWhat is suddenly wrong with all these institutes?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn the cities, the front \u201cmass organisations\u201d are generally manned by ideologues, who include academicians and activists, fully committed to the party line and flush with foreign funds .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_8MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_8B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_9B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6970134341533421355\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456835307#c6970134341533421355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<br />\n<br />\nSuch organisations ostensibly pursue human rights-related issues and are adept at using the legal processes of the Indian state to undermine and emasculate enforcement action by the security forces. They also attempt to malign state institutions through propaganda and disinformation to further the cause of their \u201crevolution\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nFrom these mass organisations, individuals are selected, brainwashed for supporting and becoming members of the Maoist party.<br />\n<br />\nUrban areas are important for Maoists to get cadres who have the skill sets to perform military tasks; they are also critical for developing international networks, local intelligence, reaching medical aid to rural guerilla forces, as transit facility and for cyber warfare.<br />\n<br />\nOne more important reason for the Maoists\u2019 focus on urban areas in the last few years is the recruitment ebb they are facing in tribal areas as tribals began to understand the hollowness of Maoist ideology. Maoists are not getting recruits for their dalams (small units in their armed guerilla force). The number of surrenders has gone up manifold.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of students\u2019 and teachers\u2019 association with Maoism is as old as the movement itself. The Maoists\u2019 \u201cStrategy and Tactics of Indian Revolution\u201d document mentions the following about students\u2019 role:<br />\n<br />\nThe faces of urban naxalism are intellectuals, influencers and activists of importance. They indoctrinate the young by pretending to be concerned about social issues. However, they never make an attempt to find solutions to social problems. They only exploit the situation by organising protests and mobilising the impressionable youth.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">They COMMIE PROFESSORS encourage students to take admission in colleges and fail their examinations so that they can continue longer on the campus. ..</span></div>\n<br />\nThe students don\u2019t mind as they get a handsome salary for just rabble rousing ... They hope to become political leaders like Yechury and Daniel Raja soon.<br />\n<br />\nWanna see Daniel Raja\u2019s JNU daughter ? She hopes to be a Commie leader like her back faced father..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZTn0KTFoDs</span><br />\n<br />\nFor a student from a poor or marginalised background, a subsidised stay in a government hostel in a big city is a luxury which he laps up without questioning the ulterior motives of his mentors.<br />\n<br />\nWith the help of these students, the Maoists attract new students and organise \u201cboot study camps\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nUrban Maoists have employed multi-pronged tactics. They have infiltrated Maoist sympathisers in key public sector industries. It is not commie JNU babus anymore..<br />\n<br />\nThey have infiltrated critical departments like finance, military, police, power, IT, defence production and disrupt the activities from within by gaining control over the workers. Profile every union leader as a response..<br />\n<br />\nPassive protests and continuous grievances lead to a domino effect in an already disgruntled nation. They have infiltrates hospitals so that injured cadre can be treated in secrecy without police getting a whiff..<br />\n<br />\nUrban naxals are trained to bring a nation to its knees .<br />\n<br />\nNaxals are entrusted with the destruction of high-value targets like water/power or annihilation of individuals of importance. The identity of such members is unknown even to the local urban party structure.<br />\n<br />\nThe urban naxals have a unit for cyber warfare . The naxals are trained to use modern electronic means to infiltrate into the enemy\u2019s networks and collect vital information. These people are under the direct control of the highest party echelons. They are trained to generate cultural unrest with the help of propaganda platforms..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 6--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_9MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_9B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_10B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2974405746431847654\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456867457#c2974405746431847654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 5--<br />\n<br />\nThis is covert warfare where the enemy is invisible and the battle is for the control of civil society \u2014 through coercion, controlling the hearts and minds of the people.<br />\n<br />\nFourth Generation Warfare (4GW). This war is waged by a blurring of the lines between war and politics, combatants and civilians. If they have reached this stage, we have no one but our political leaders to blame..<br />\n<br />\n4GW is decentralised, small in size and lacks hierarchy so that they cannot be stopped.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy is to make a direct attack on the enemy's (Indian state) culture, including genocidal acts against civilians, and wage a highly sophisticated psychological and cultural warfare, especially through media manipulation and lawfare.<br />\n<br />\nAll available pressures are used \u2013 political, economic, social and military. For this purpose, legal professionals are required, media professionals are required, creative people, varied intellectuals and academicians are required, and civil society leaders are required, especially those who are connected with non-governmental organisations. It begins with low-intensity conflicts where actors attack from different platforms.<br />\n<br />\nHow did commies Kamalahassan, Prakash Raj , HardikPatel crawl out of the wood work?<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br />INDIA WILL IMPLODE FROM WITHIN SOONER THAN LATER..&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW THE BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nMODI GOVT MUST SHOW SPINE..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Urban Naxalism is India\u2019s biggest threat today.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nLet us not celebrate that we got rid of the RED CORRIDOR.<br />\n<br />\nIt can\u2019t be fought by the government alone. It has to be fought by exposing them, which is a responsibility of every citizen who wants India to succeed.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html</span><br />\n<br />\nRead all 8 parts of the post below\u2014<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL WITH THIS SHOCKING COMMENT MY REVELATIONS WILL JUMP TO&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">59.09 %</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nLAVANI DANCE WAS BANNED BY THE MAHARASHTRA CM BALASAHEB&nbsp; GANGADHAR&nbsp; KHER&nbsp;AS SOON AS INDIA BECAME INDEPENDENT IN 1947..&nbsp;</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CM KHER SAID THAT VULGAR SEXUALLY RISQUE LAVANI DANCE WAS NEVER BEEN PART OF MAHARASTRA CULTURE AND THAT IT WAS SPONSORED BY THE WHITE INVADER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY MAHASHTRAINS DO NOT EVEN KNOW THE REAL LAVANI MEANT FOR ENTERTAINMENT OF THE CHITPAVAN JEW PESHWAS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MAHAR LAVANI DANCERS USED TO BE PICKED UP FOR SEX AFTER THE DANCE PROGRAMME , MOSTLY BY WHITE MEN... THE CURRENT FORM IS \"CHAMIYA DANCE \" TO BOLLYWOOD TUNES IN MUMBAI BEER BARS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN THIS DEVADASI DANCE FORM WAS INVENTED 200 YEARS AGO, THE DANCERS PERFORMED IN FRONT OF JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE GOD BIROBA ( A PERVERTED SEXUAL PREDATOR FORM OF SHIVA CONVERTED TO A MORTAL )...</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DANCE SONGS WERE ABOUT HOWS SEX STARVED SHIVA PREYED ON SAPT RISHIS WIVES IN DEODHAR FOREST WHILE THEIR HUSBANDS WERE BUSY MEDITATING.</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHARISHI KARVE ( A CHITPAVAN JEW ) HAD HIS OWN LAVANI DANCE GROUP OF ATTRACTIVE WIDOWS FROM HIS DESTITUTE CENTRE WHICH CATERED TO WHITE BRITISH OFFICERS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">DEVADASIS WERE PICKED UP TO PROVIDE SEX FOR THE WHITE SOLDIERS IN KAMATIPURA / GRANT ROAD/ FARRAS ROAD AS SOON AS THEY HAD THE FIRST MENSES..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE FAVOURITE THEME WAS HOW THESE GIRLS TRIED TO HIDE THEIR FIRST MENSES FROM THEIR FAMILY AND NEIGHBOURS \"BUT THE RED BLOOD STAINS ON THEIR YELLOW PUJA DRESS GAVE THEM AWAY \"</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY MARATHI MOVIE MADE BY CHITPAVAN JEWS HAD A COMPULSORY LAVANI NUMBER DURING THE BRITISH RULE..</span></span><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; A jugalbandi between two lead actresses Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukone, both vying to be Bajirao\u2019s one true love..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">'Pinga' has MOST inappropriate choreography that borrows heavily from Lavani.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BR AMBEDKAR ADDED HIS OWN DOUBLE AGENT SPIN .. HE SPAKE \u201c Lavani is an exploitative and corrupt medium of performance through which women belonging to the Dalit MAHAR castes were sexually exploited, objectified and later on prostituted by upper caste men to whom these Lavani performers served as a major source of entertainment in the 19th century\u201d..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHARS AND CHITPAVAN JEW PESHWAS WERE BEDFELLOWS WITH ROTHSCHILD.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WHITE INVADER NEVER FOUGHT A SINGLE BATTLE WITH THE MUGHALS.. IT IS NOT RELATED TO OBJECTIVE SUCCESS.<br />\n<br />\nIN USA COMPANIES ARE RANKED AS TOP COMPANIES TO WORK FOR ON THE BASIS OF A MINDLESS CHECK LIST..<br />\n<br />\nIF THEY HAVE SEPARATE TOILETS FOR HOMOSEXUALS WITH \"GLORY HOLE\" BETWEEN TOILETS -- THAT COMPANY IS WORTH WORKING FOR.. THE INDIAN CHILD HAS NO NEED FOR REMOTE CONTROLLED DRONES..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI INDIAN MEDIA MUST BE CONTROLLED .. THEY DO BRAINWASH THAT A GIRL IS HAPPY WHEN SHE HAS THE FREEDOM TO GO TO SCHOOL WITH A CONDOM IN HER TIFFIN BOX.. IN INDIA WE HAVE VIRGIN BRIDES ... MY WIFE WAS A VIRGIN WHEN WE MARRIED..<br />\n<br />\nMONEY CANT BUY HAPPINESS ..WHAT DOES MAN NEED? -- DOH WAKT KA ROTI, SOMETHING TO COVER HIS PRIVATE PARTS AND A COMFY PLACE CALLED HOME..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/life-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/happiness-from-within-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BALLS TO PRANAB MUKHERJEE AND HIS \"CONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM \"..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nAND TELL PM MODI-- REPEATING THE NAME OF GANHI AND HIS CHARKHA CUTS NO ICE.. INDIANS HAVE MOVED ON AND LEFT ROTHSCHILD AGENT GANDHI FAR BEHIND..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_150b+seedz2oD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_150b+seedz2oD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8614357987879652241\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_90M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1529248949250#c8614357987879652241\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 17, 2018 at 8:52 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.organiser.org//Encyc/2018/6/17/Anti-India-Rant-in-Dubai.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO IMPUND THE PASSPORTS OF THESE DESH DROHIS<br />\n<br />\nOn 31 January 2017, E Ahamed suffered a cardiac arrest during the President\u2019s address to the joint sitting of Parliament.<br />\n<br />\nE Ahamed fell unconscious in Parliament\u2019s Central Hall during President Pranab Mukherjee\u2019s address.<br />\n<br />\nHe was in ICU in RML Hospital at Capital. On 1 February 2017, the hospital officially announced his death at 2.15 am ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ITALIAN WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED SON KEPT VIGIL<br />\n<br />\nONLY E AHAMED KNEW WHERE THE PARTYs FUNDS WERE STASHED.. THOSE FUNDS WENT POOOOOFFF ALONG WITH HIM...<br />\n<br />\nBOTH MOTHER AND SON TRIED STRONG ARM TACTICS- TO SEE E AHAMED BEFORE HE DIED.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE NOT ALLOWED BY THE DOCTORS.<br />\n<br />\nE AHAMED WAS A MUSLIM COMMIE-- FROM BRENNAN COLLEGE KANNUR-- A COMMIE DEN LIKE JNU WHICH HAS PRODUCED DESH DROHIS WHO HAVE NO LOVE FOR THE WATAN...<br />\n<br />\nTHE COMMIE STUDENTS UNION LEADERS WERE SPONSORED BY COMMIE UNIVERSITIES LIKE COLUMBIA..<br />\n<br />\nKERALA CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN STUDIED THERE AND WAS A COMMIE STUDENT UNION LEADER.<br />\n<br />\nBRENNAN COLLEGE WAS SPONSORED BY ROTHSCHILDs BASE MISSION.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH MY PARENTS WORKED AT COMMONWEALTH TRUST LTD, CALICUT WHOSE NAME WAS ORIGINALLY BASEL MISSION RUN BY CRYPTO JEW JESUITS..<br />\n<br />\nBASEL MISSIONS PRODUCED HANDLOOM TEXTILES AND ROOF TILES ( ONLY FOR EXPORT TO EUROPE ).. IN CALICUT WE KNOW OF JESUIT JEW MISSIONARY GEORG PLEBST.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE FREEMASON CLUB IN CALICUT WAS RUN BY BASEL MISSIONS CRYPTO JEWS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/freemason-lodge-of-calicut-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nONCE MY PARENTS VISITED MY SHIP BUILT IN ENGLAND AT COCHIN PORT , 3 DECADES AGO... MY MOTEHR SAW THE CABIN CURTAINS AND CLAIMED THAT THIS DESIGN WENT THROUGH HER DESK AND WAS DESIGNED BY ARTIST SREEDHARAM HER COLLEAGUE..<br />\n<br />\nI THOUGHT--LET IT BE-- LET HER BE IN HER ELEMENTS<br />\n<br />\nLATER I TOOK THE ASTER KEY AND OPENED THE LINEN LOCKER.. SHE WAS RIGHT.. THE LUXURY LINEN HAD THE \"COMTRUST --HARD TO BEAT \" TAG STITCHED ON. IT SHOWED A INDIAN DHOBI BEATING THE LINEN ON A ROCK..<br />\n<br />\nGerman Jew Rothschilds ship MALABAR anchored off Calicut in Oct 1834 and landed three Jesuit Jews -Samuel Hebich, John Lehner, and Christopher Greiner ..<br />\n<br />\nThey learnt Calicut handloom weaving.. In Calicut we had a textile factory and a roofing tile factory. My parents worked at the HQ next to Manachira pool of Calicut.<br />\n<br />\nBoth my sons studied at Hilltop school a huge bungalow on top of a hill overlooking the tile factory at Puthiyara Calicut , where a junior white skinned managerof Commonwealth Trust Ltd was in charge.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>Rothschild stated making Khakhi uniform cotton material in preparation for WW1 several years in advance.. mass production using the flying shuttle.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWhere a broad-cloth loom previously required a weaver on each side, it could now be worked by a single operator. Until this point the textile industry had required four spinners to service one weaver.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khiEAEqdkZY<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7O98vJ8VEF4</span><br />\nThe Khakhi dye was invented by John Haller. Haller extracted the sap of the bark of the semecarpus tree and gave his new colour the Kannada name \u2018khaki\u2019, which means \u2018dusty\u2019, because it looks like the ubiquitous brownish yellow dust of the Indians dirt roads.<br />\n<br />\nThe same sap was used for millenniums to create saffron robes for our sages\u2014which also used the rind of the cashew-nut tree and the extract of the heart wood of the catechu tree (Acacia catechu)\u2014which was an Ayurvedic medicine ( today used in Pan Masala ).<br />\n<br />\nIn 1938 a Christian missionary Rev. Weigle printed a bible in Malayalam and converted many locals to Christianity by giving sops. Calico fine cotton cloth which found great demand in China ( Admiral Zheng He ) was produced in Commonwealth Calicut.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/chinese-admiral-zheng-he-in-calicut.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_90BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1529248989294#c2204208992867612667\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 17, 2018 at 8:53 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_89MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\">CHRISTAIN CONVERTS GOT DOUBLE WAGES..AND THE INITIAL WORKERS WERE IN CALICUT , MANGALORE WERE 90 % CHRISTIAN..&nbsp; &nbsp; THEIR CHILDREN WERE ABLE TO STUDY IN BASEL&nbsp;</b><b>MISSION</b><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp;SCHOOLS LIKE BEM CALICUT.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE 10 % HINDUS WHO REFUSED TO CONVERT GOT THE MOST DIRTY AND ENERVATING JOBS.</b></span></div>\n<br />\nRothschild converted Indigo fields in Champaran to Opium fields for exporting Opium to China.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/fake-champaran-satyagraha-of-gandhi.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Commonweath Calicut produced the first INDIGO blue jeans for Levi Strauss.</span><br />\n<br />\nAt Kannur ( today called the city of looms and lore ) my wife\u2019s grandfather exported handloom textiles ( WEST COAST WEAVING ) in competition with the British. He employed only Hindus\u2014 because their quality of work was far far better.<br />\n<br />\nThe Malabar Christian college and YMCA Calicut were funded by Rothschild using Basel Mission funds.<br />\n<br />\nSAALA E AHAMED KA NAAM LEKHE , IDHAR TAKK PAHUNCH GAYA.<br />\n<br />\nIF I DON\u2019T WRITE IT\u2014 TRUTH IS LOST IN THE SANDS OF TME..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU THINK I STARTED BLOGGING ?<br />\n<br />\nMy revelations now jump to&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c848436323467207348\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255695582#c848436323467207348\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://twitter.com/mkatju/status/1012424805239349249<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MORON IS BACK ON SOCIAL MEDIA AFTER A HIATUS..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5 HUMPED COWS IN ONE ACRE OF LAND CAUSED INDIAs TOP SOIL TO BECOME SIX FEET DEEP AND HOLY --PRODUCING FOOD WITH GOLDEN MEAN ( 1.618 ) INHERENT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWITH GREEN REVLUTION OF DESH DROHI MS SWAMINATHAN AND RAMPANT USES OF ARTIFICIAL FERTLISERS --NOW OUR TOP SOIL IS JUST A FEW INCHES THICK--IT IS THIRST FOR WATER AND PRODUCED FOOD WHICH CAUSES DISEASES.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">90% OF HUMAN DISEASES ORIGINATE IN THE HUMAN GUT AS PER 6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThink of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026\u2026</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus\u2026\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nHumus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter..<br />\n<br />\nCOMPOST IS NOT HUMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi)\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026 Priceless snake grove soil was the BANK FOR AYURVEDIC HERBS ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026 Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nBetter soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026 Humus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWhile these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1413190284692248433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255759317#c1413190284692248433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. .<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND HIS MINISTERS MORE THAN 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?..<br />\n<br />\nMODI GIVES US MORE AND MORE JAANKARI ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEKDAR ..<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY MODI WAS RECITING SOME KABIRDAS SHLOKA (&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>HOY KOY SHIT</b></span>&nbsp;) ..<br />\n<br />\nKABIRDAS NEVER EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Today the census is a LIE\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INSERTION OF THE WARPED WORD SECULAR INTO THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS BEEN THE GREATEST FRAUD PERPETRATED ON INDIA SINCE INDEPENDENCE\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThis EVIL intrusion of the word SECULAR into the Constitution was made through the 42nd amendment in 1977 when democracy was dead, voice of the people was muzzled and ALL fundamental rights had been suspended . ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS \"HIJACKED WORD\"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SECULAR</span></b>&nbsp;AUTOMATICALLY BECOMES NULL AND VOID\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Forty-second Amendment of the Constitution of India, officially known as The Constitution (Forty-second Amendment) Act, 1976, was enacted during the Emergency by the government headed by Indira Gandhi which kicked into effect on 3 January 1977..<br />\n<br />\n42nd amendment is THE most controversial constitutional amendment in Indian history\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAgain--- The 42nd Amendment also amended the Preamble and changed the description of India from \"sovereign democratic republic\" to a \u201csovereign socialist SECULAR republic\u201d which was never the intention of the founding fathers when they drafted and passed the Constitution...<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE WAITRESS WENT ONE STEP AHEAD WHEN SHE FORMED THE NAC/ CVB WHERE SHE BECAME THE SUPER PRIME MINISTER OF INDIA. ..<br /><br />CVB IS COMMUNAL VIOLENCE BILL WHERE ONLY MAJORITY HINDUS ARE AT THE RECEIVING END..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSince Pakistan /Bangladesh was founded they have driven away almost all the Hindus by ethnic cleansing . Article 95 of the Constitution, which empowered the Deputy Speaker to act as the Speaker in case the post of Speaker was vacant used the term \u201cduties of the office of Speaker\u201d. The word \u201cpower\u201d was missing. But Article 65(3) used the word \u201cpowers\u201d in the context of the office of the President.<br /><br />So, it can be construed that \u201cthe Speaker does not have any penal power to punish a member by way of suspension or expulsion\u201d.<br /><br />IT TAKES A REAL IDIOT NAY TRAITOR DEEP STATE JUDGE ( IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES ) TO INTERPRET A RULE THIS WAY..<br /><br />WHAT IS ALL THIS ?<br /><br />THE SPEAKER HAS BEEN AFFORDED VAST DISCRETIONARY POWERS. WHEN IT COMES TO MAINTAINING DISCIPLINE..<br /><br />ENFORCE RULE 374 A , EVERY TIME A MP MISBEHAVES..<br /><br />DISCRETIONARY POWER OF THE SPEAKER FOR RUNNING THE BUSINESS OF THE HOUSE CANNOT BE MISUSED.<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html<br /><br />Two recent instances where discretionary power applied by speakers recently erupted controversies are-<br /><br />Permitting the Aadhaar Bill, to be introduced in the House as a money Bill by Speaker of the Lok Sabha.<br /><br />Refusing to allow a division of votes (the counting of legislators' votes) on the state budget by the Speaker of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly.<br /><br />WE WATCH<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..<br /><br />PUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES F--<br />SPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />SPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />PRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />VP OF INDIA<br />PMO<br />PM MODI<br />LAW MINISTER<br />CJI<br />ATTORNEY GENERAL<br />SUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />SWAMY<br />GURUMURTHY<br />MINISTER OF PARLIAMENTARY AFFAIRS</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GKtwEU_loB0/WqlvLabiX4I/AAAAAAABZgc/Vl9AgCJqFyEtPHv7d58k1QeBY1W2sPh5wCLcBGAs/s1600/AJIT%2B1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1600\" data-original-width=\"904\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GKtwEU_loB0/WqlvLabiX4I/AAAAAAABZgc/Vl9AgCJqFyEtPHv7d58k1QeBY1W2sPh5wCLcBGAs/s640/AJIT%2B1.jpg\" width=\"360\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></b><br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "197", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5285705880972570295/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4949746582810033230", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-03-13T19:10:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-07-05T15:47:04+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTMwNzg1ODI0MjA3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_13.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4949746582810033230", "title": "FATAWA E ALAMGIRI , kosher document of Rothschild created to wreck the mighty Moghul empire of Aurangzeb , Part 4 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 3, BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_11.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_11.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malik Bin Dinar id NOT\nreceive any information from Malik ibn Anas&nbsp;\nwho compiled the Muwatta, one of the oldest&nbsp; Sunni hadith collections.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muwatta was a legal\nwork to incorporate and join hadith and fiqh together. Fiqh&nbsp; is Islamic jurisprudence.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While sharia is\nbelieved by Muslims to represent divine law as revealed in the Quran and the\nSunnah (the teachings and practices of the Islamic prophet Muhammad), fiqh is\nthe human understanding of the sharia\u2014sharia expanded and developed by\ninterpretation (ijtihad) of the Quran and Sunnah by Islamic jurists (ulama) and\nimplemented by the rulings (fatwa) of jurists on questions presented to them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus conceptually,\nwhereas sharia is considered immutable and infallible, fiqh is considered\nfallible and changeable. Fiqh deals with the observance of rituals, morals and\nsocial legislation in Islam. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person trained in\nfiqh is known as a <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">FAQIH</span></span> .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Figuratively, fiqh\nmeans knowledge about Islamic legal rulings from their sources. A Faqih is an\nIslamic jurist, an expert in fiqh, or Islamic jurisprudence and Islamic Law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anas ibn Malik is\ndifferent from Malik ibn Anas.. Anas ibn Malik was the longest living of the\ncompanions of Muhammad and died at the age of 103. He is one of the major\nnarrators of hadith, and like all of the Sahaba<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KHATIB</span></span>, is a person\nwho delivers the sermon ( narration), during the Friday prayer and Eid prayers.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The khatib is usually\nthe imam (prayer leader), but the two roles can be played by different people.\nThere are no requirements of eligibility to become a khatib, although the\nperson must be a male who has attained the age of puberty. It is also required\nthat the khatib be in a state of physical purity (wu\u1e0du).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gofGuCPe19Y/WqfXo0yitnI/AAAAAAABZdA/GRcZ_cJHOvs45QFNTTkVpPxoZbYi_526ACLcBGAs/s1600/RIwMS%2BDufferin.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"274\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"438\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gofGuCPe19Y/WqfXo0yitnI/AAAAAAABZdA/GRcZ_cJHOvs45QFNTTkVpPxoZbYi_526ACLcBGAs/s640/RIwMS%2BDufferin.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Below: This troop carrier</span><b style=\"background-color: white;\"> RIMS DUFFERIN&nbsp;</b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"> delivered in 1905 was converted to a merchant training ship after WW1.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">It was one of the fastest ships duringe WW1.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN OUR TIME IN 1973, WE HAD A &nbsp;COXWAIN MAN NAMED KHATIF\u2014 MORE THAN 40 YEARS\nSERVICE &nbsp;( LAUNCH DOROTHY ) WHICH\nTRANSPORTED US FROM WHIP TO FERRY WHARF ( BHAUCHA DHAKKAH ).. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dufferin traditions lasted till 1976, when it\nbecame a ONE YEAR course on TS RAJENDRA .. &nbsp;After that the glorious traditions of STRENGTH\nAND HONOUR passed on like a baton was lost. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After 1976 , tThe training ship churned out\nPAAN chewing cunts like Kanhaiya Kumar \u2013who wanted SORE LEAVE ( shore leave )\nand PROMOSSANN ( promotion ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first Indian Chief of Naval Staff &nbsp;( appointed in April 1958) &nbsp;&nbsp;Admiral\nRam Dass Katari was a cadet of T.S Dufferin.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;He led the Indian Navy in the\nconflict during the liberation of Goa against the Portuguese Navy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/portuguese-inquisition-is-goa-by-jesuit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/portuguese-inquisition-is-goa-by-jesuit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">READ THE MEMOIRS OF A CADET WHO WAS ON DUFFERIN IN 1939 .</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://sayeedsjournal.wordpress.com/chapter-6-the-three-dufferin-years1939-41/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://sayeedsjournal.wordpress.com/chapter-6-the-three-dufferin-years1939-41/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN WE HAVE VVIP\nVISITORS WE DRESSED SHIP, HAD CEREMONIAL MARCH PAST AND SANG THE DUFFERIN ANTHEM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO ONE CUNT POLITICIAN ( CHIEF GUEST ) CRIED AFTER WE SAND THE ANTHEM\u2014 \u201cWHY DO YOU SAY YOU DON\u2019T HAVE FRIENDS\u2014I AM\nYOUR FRIEND\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014AND HE WENT ON AND ON\nFROTHING FROM HIS MOUTH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We\u2019re on the road,\nwe\u2019re on the road to anywhere,</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">With never a heartache,\nwith never a care.</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Got no home, got no\nfriends,</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thankful for everything\nthe good Lord sends.</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JESUS WAS COOKED UP AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF\nNICEA IN 325 AD BY ROMAN EMPEROR&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>HIS SON CONSTANTIN II WHO KILLED HIS FATHER IN\n337 AD ,&nbsp; WAS THE FIRST CHRISTIAN ROMAN EMPEROR.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>CONSTANTIN THE GREAT WAS POISONED BY HIS SON\nON 22<sup>ND</sup> MAY 337 AD\u2014AND HIS DEAD BODY WAS BAPTISED TO CHRISTIANITY WITH\nGREAT FANFARE..</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike many other\nrivers in Kerala, Chaliyar does not dry up during the drought season in March\nto May. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chaliyar originates\nin the Western Ghats range at Elambalari Hills in the Wayanad Plateau of\nKerala--where elephants drag logs into the river<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logs were floated down\nthe Chaliyar river from the forest areas in and around Nilambur to the various\nmills in Kallai of Calicut city. All these saw mills were owned by Jew\nRothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KORAPUZHA CONNECTED\nBEYPORE ( CHALIYAR RIVER ) TO KALLAI ESTUARY OF MAMPUZHA RIVER <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CANOLLY CANAL CONNECTED\nKALLAI TO CALICUT AND FURTHER NORTH TO PUTHIYAPPA HARBOUR --TO KORAPUZHA AND\nTHEN FURTHER NORTH TO KUTTIYADI RIVER <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE READ HUNDRED OF\nARTICLES PRAISING WHITE MAN HV CONOLLY \u2013 NOT ONE EXPLAINING THE INTENTIONS OF\nTHIS WHITE THIEF EMPLOYED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every\nIndian worth his salt has heard of Birbal, the advisor to Emperor Akbar for 31\nyears .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
