text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU SMRITHI -IX -101\nand III-60 : -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mutual friendship and\nfidelity is the highest Dharma to be observed by husband and wife, throughout\ntheir life. The family in which husband and wife have mutual affection and\nrespect always secures happiness and prosperity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(The West has 63%\ndivorce rate.&nbsp; The balance 37% have had\nmultiple sexual partners.&nbsp; Only the gays\n/dykes and the repulsively fat and ugly do NOT include in this 37% )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANU 4-239 -242 :-When\none departs from this world to the other World, neither father nor mother,\nneither son nor wife will accompany him. Only the \"Dharma\" practiced\nby an individual follows him even after death. A person takes birth alone and\ndies alone, he alone enjoys or suffers the consequences of his evil deeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manusmriti says that\nahimsa is the foremost among the dharmas that are common to all. It is included\nin the yoga of mind control. Ahimsa means much more than non-injury or\nnn-violence ; it implies not doing harm to others even by thought or word.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From ahimsa Hinduism\nimparted to the world the practice of vegetarianism:&nbsp; Yajurveda dictates -\"Do not injure the\nbeings living on the earth, in the air and in the water.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti says -\nYatra Naryastu Pujyante Ramante Tatra Devatah \u2013 \u201cWhere women are worshipped\nthere the angels tread\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This great law-giver of\nHinduism and first lawgiver on this planet defined the status of a wife and her\nequal rights thus:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a wife dies, her husband may marry\nanother wife. (Manu, Chapter V, Verse 168). If a husband dies, a wife may marry\nanother husband. (Manu,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a wife becomes fallen by drunkenness or\nimmorality her husband may marry another. (Manu, Chapter IX, Verse 80). If a\nhusband becomes fallen, a wife may re-marry another husband. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a husband deserts his wife, she may\nmarry another. (Manu, Chapter IX, Verse 76 )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Untouchability and\ncaste-based discrimination were unknown during the Varnashrama days. No one was\nborn high and no one low. You became what you are with your karma and what your\nare inherently worth . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A dimwit who cannot\npass a single exam in school has no reason to write the IIT entrance exam and\nhope to get Computer Science stream.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is easy to secure a\njob on quota but very difficult to hold on to it, unless you work for the\nuseless and corrupt Indian government offices or town municipality office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In times of confusion\nand crisis regarding what is right and what is wrong, one's own conscience is\nthe sole guide.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"In times of\ndoubt, O, son of Kunti [Arjuna], one must decide using one's own good\nsense\u201d-&nbsp; <b>Bhagawat Gita 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus respect and\nappreciate culture in terms of itself.&nbsp;\nWe are sensitive to cultural nuances .&nbsp;\nWe listen and we respect local values .&nbsp;\nWe understand that culture has a life of its own and is stronger than\nlife and triumphs over death.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We believe human beings\nhave feelings unlike machines. &nbsp;In an\nIndian company employees are seen as&nbsp;\nbread winners at home.&nbsp; There is\nNO concept of HIRE AND FIRE \u2013unless the fellow is insubordinate.&nbsp; Shared ethos has more weight than adherence\nto hard written rules and there is absence of deception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Divorce rate within\nHindus is the lowest in the world--it is a mindset . Marriage is NOT based on\nlust, but by sacred commitment of 7 pheras around a holy fire. No Hindu woman\nwill go for silicon implants to save her marriage. When a Hindu greets you with\na Namaste, he bows to the greatness in you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali Yoga sutra\n(1.33) -- Mind becomes purified by cultivating feelings of maitri (\nfriendliness, lovingness) which is a feeling towards others when others are\nhappy,&nbsp; Karuna ( compassion or mercy)\nfeelings towards others when others are suffering,&nbsp; mudita (gladness or good will) towards where\nthere are good things happening and upeksha (indifference, neutrality or\nacceptance) where there is bad things are happening or bad behavior from other\npeople.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma fosters a\nclimate of social and spiritual responsibility. Dharma is not a set of rules\nthat restrict your way of life or cramp your style. Dharma puts things in their\nproper place, allows your perspective and creates and maintains balance.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the&nbsp; Dharmashastras, dharma is examined from\nvirtually every imaginable angle,&nbsp; every\nperspective , from kingly duties, cultural norms, sexual relations, and\neveryday social rules such as manners and etiquette.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And mind you it is not\nthe ridiculous Emily Post type of snooty etiquette where a genteel lady with a shit laden unwashed asshole&nbsp; has to\ncrook her little finger while having tea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Bbr663m63I4/Wqkmdbzho8I/AAAAAAABZfM/XbxAR7vKcqgtJjYouYRQ0fg7gY_0hxnDgCLcBGAs/s1600/jhyteevubp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"125\" data-original-width=\"256\" height=\"312\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Bbr663m63I4/Wqkmdbzho8I/AAAAAAABZfM/XbxAR7vKcqgtJjYouYRQ0fg7gY_0hxnDgCLcBGAs/s640/jhyteevubp.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism teaches that\npeople who remain on the path of dharma lead successful, happy lives.&nbsp; It is the secret to divine joy on earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, with emigration\nand globalisation, and the assault of foreign funded TV on our culture, it is\nfar more difficult for Hindus to discern what practices are consistent with\ndharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is understood in\nHinduism as a universal law of cause and effect. Positive actions produce\npositive effects; negative actions produce negative effects. To act dharmically\nis to act in a karmically positive manner, therefore. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When one acts\ndharmically, one necessarily produces positive karma. This karma is cumulative:\none accrues karma, positive and negative, not only throughout the course of\none's life, but throughout the course of one's multiple rebirths. It is karma\nthat determines one's rebirths.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once your accrued karma log is cleared , on\ngod\u2019s sanction alone, you attain moksha, which is the final end to earthly\nsojourns.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma embraces every\ntype of righteous conduct covering every aspect of life essential for the\nsustenance and welfare of the indiavidual and society and includes those rules\nwhich guide and enable those to attain moksha (eternal bliss).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma nourishes our\nsociety and existence. One must carry out their duties without being attached\nto the results of their actions. Hinduism connects metaphysics, ethics, and\nontology. Ethics only makes sense if it is based on the nature of self and\nreality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This makes Hindu ethics\nunique in terms of other views that separate ethics as separate discipline.\nDharma is the greatest and the most valuable contribution to humanity by India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All our present day problems are a direct result of disregarding 'Dharma' ,\nunder the influence of a materialistic philosophy, ( dished out by foreign\nfunded media and TV )in the belief that it alone can usher in happiness and\nsecure the welfare of the people.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is a Sanskrit\nexpression of the widest import.&nbsp; There\nis no corresponding word in any other language\u2014for righteous conduct in every\nsphere of activity. Dharma sustains the society. Dharma ensures the well being\nand progress of humanity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient seers and\nmaharishis saw rights and responsibilities as two sides of the same coin and\ndecided to emphasize responsibilities and duty over rights,&nbsp; whereas other civilizations emphasized\nrights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They knew that when\nresponsibilities and duties are fulfilled, people receive their rights. For\nexample, when parents fulfill their duties and responsibilities for their\nchildren--their children receive their rights. The same principle applies for a\nnation and its citizens. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where people live in\nconformity with their dharma, the individual rights of all others are naturally\ngranted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS\nTO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON--&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">HER SISTER PRAMADA MENON IS A LESBIAN ACTIVIST</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nRead all 11 parts of the post below\u2014<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The belief in the\nexistence of the all-pervasive Divinity in the universe creates an attitude of\nacceptance, reverence, benevolence and compassion for all things and beings in\nthe mind of a Hindu.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He does not see any intrinsic evil in Nature. He sees the\nground, the sky, the trees, the hills and mountains, and the rivers all sacred.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu considers life\na divine pilgrimage from \"unreal to real, darkness to light, and death to\nimmortality.\"&nbsp; Being on this road of\npilgrimage, a Hindu has no intention to hurt anyone. He is thoroughly convinced\nthat whatever he does in this life will come back to him in the next life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus he must do good\nand be good now, as he will have to come back again and again in this world\nuntil all karma scores are settled. This is why a beggar with just a loin cloth\nas his property does NOT attack anybody on the streets , like in countries\nwhere Christianity rules.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Muslim countries\nthey are plain scared of losing their neck or limb.&nbsp; It is NOT morality which deters them-- just\nraw fear of severe painful retribution.&nbsp;\nThis is like you wife makes bed tea for you , because she is afraid of getting\nslapped -- NOT out of love.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Vmd4PBK9_YU/WqkpywTUjtI/AAAAAAABZfY/V8yOSv7NIYMg4lwF_Ul-O_2cWj2wocmvgCLcBGAs/s1600/Edseryh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"243\" data-original-width=\"208\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Vmd4PBK9_YU/WqkpywTUjtI/AAAAAAABZfY/V8yOSv7NIYMg4lwF_Ul-O_2cWj2wocmvgCLcBGAs/s400/Edseryh.jpg\" width=\"341\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT allowed to\nexploit human vulnerability as per Hindu dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma has attributes\nlike&nbsp; rationality, sense of duty,\njustice, peace, truthfulness, hospitality, kindness , respect, compassion,\nnon-violence, rectitude, humanity, spirituality, fairness , patience, self\nrestraint , tolerance, ethics, service to others, right to life , natural\njustice, virtue, morality, bonafide work and philanthropy.&nbsp; Dharma thus truly symbolises universal values\nof humanism and forms the basis of global ethics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tadrisho ayam\nanuprashno yatra dharmaha sudurlabaha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dushkamha\npralisankhyatum tatkenatra vysvasyathi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prabhavarthaya bhutanam\ndharmapravachanam kritam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yasyat\nprabhavasamyuktaha sa dharma iti nischayaha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is most difficult to\ndefine Dharma. Dharma has been explained to be that which helps the upliftment\nof living beings. Therefore, that which ensures the welfare of living beings is\nsurely Dharma. The learned rishis have declared that that which sustains is\nDharma.-- <b>Bhishma to Yuddhistra Mahabharata 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Respect for all\nreligions is Dharma.&nbsp;&nbsp; Dharma is\nuniversal, it applies to all whether they belong to any religion or not.&nbsp; It is a code of conduct for all human beings\nfor all time to come.&nbsp; It is eternal and\nunalterable just as you cannot alter the property of fire of burning and of\nwater of flowing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal of dharma is\nto raise the quality of life , ensure spiritual awaking and fulfill humanity\u2019s\ndestiny. To be a Hindu, you don\u2019t need any certificate from any temple, church\nor mosque or praying house .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You need not recite any\nverse.&nbsp; You need not believe in any\nparticular God or book.&nbsp; You simply have\nto have a conscience and be honest to yourself.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can anybody be a Muslim\nif he outrightly rejects Quran? Can anybody be a&nbsp; Christian if he outrightly rejects the holy\nBible ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can any Muslim in\nPakistan or Saudi Arabia say in public to other muslims that he wants to\nconvert to Christianity, and still hope to be alive the next day?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As long as a Muslim in in minority he wants a\nSECULAR government. But soon he will procreate like mice ( if conversions by\nforce are NOT happeneing ) and then as soon as he is in majority he wants\nSHARIA Islamic government with religious police to enforce . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But yes, one can be a\nHindu even if he outrightly rejects the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism\u2019s goal is to\nprovide a nurturing platform for all.&nbsp;\nHinduism allows different options to all of us at all times to choose\nwhat is naturally best for us and progress from there.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism existed when\ndivision of humans on basis of religion was non-existent. Hinduism is a\n\u2018celebration\u2019 of \u2018being human\u2019. Hinduism, is a synonym for \u2018being human\u2019.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic provisions\nforcefully declare equality among all human beings. They impresses that just as\nno spoke of a wheel is superior to another, no individual can claim to be, or\nregarded as, superior to others. This was the grand concept of equality in\nIndia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is the moral law\ncombined with spiritual discipline that guides one's life. Hindus&nbsp; onsider dharma the very foundation of life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prithivim dharmana\ndhritam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world is upheld by\ndharma- <b>Atharva Veda</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is like a cosmic\nnorm and if one goes against the norm it can result in bad karma. So, dharma\naffects the future according to the karma accumulated. Ethics is the supporting\nstructure of Hinduism. Within its framework of good conduct lie the joys of\nspiritual living and the depths of God consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Mankind is One\nFamily- <b>Rig Veda, 1.164.46</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu dharma has no\nfounder, the word Sanatana implies that it always existed.&nbsp; Dharma is anything that upholds or sustains a\npositive order. Hindus consider that loyalty to one's moral values is the\nhighest loyalty, and of all the losses, loss of one's character and conscience\nare the worst.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morality proceeds from\nthe inner spirit of man. In Hindu dharma , one's motive is as important in the\nperformance of an action as the action itself. Harmlessness to all life on\nearth is of the highest morality .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO LYING COMMIE JNU PROFESSOR NIVEDITA barren MENON</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus place greater\nemphasis on the attitude of the mind rather than on postulation of the\nelaborate theories of what is right and what is wrong as in other religions\n(like the ten commandments ).&nbsp; The purity\nof the heart is important.&nbsp; Sanatana\nDharma is not restricted to Indian boundaries but it is universal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is not just\nmere faith. It is the union of reason and intuition that cannot be defined but\nis only to be experienced.&nbsp; When we live\nin accordance with the divine law of dharma, we are in harmony with truth and\nmove toward spiritual advancement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since Christianity and\nIslam were born they have filled the earth with violence, drenched the soil\nwith blood again and again . They have destroyed&nbsp; civilizations, and sent whole nations to\ndespair.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world is now coming\nback to the mother of all religions Hinduism\u2014the west call as PAGAN.&nbsp; Hindusim is 400 centuries old, while\nChristianity is 16.7 centuries old and Islam is 14 centuries old. This is the\nonly religion without fundamentals or lack of compulsions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana as \u201ceternal\nmoral order\u201d encourages Hindus to seek truth wherever it might be found, each\nindividual must realize this truth through his or her own systematic effort.\nAncient India and her unique culture has survived so long, because Hinduism was\ndeveloped along Spiritual lines, NOT materialistic lines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four qualities that\nkeep a person the path of dharma are purity, compassion, austerity and truth-\nBhagawad Purana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The six inherent\nenemies in Man, namely Kama (desire), Krodha (anger), Lobha (greed), Moha\n(passion), Mada (infatuation) and Matsarya (enmity).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is indeed a world\nof difference between Dharma and religion . Dharma is a higher, overarching\nprinciple of life on earth. .&nbsp; The\nSupreme court of India&nbsp; defined Indian&nbsp; Dharma thus: \u201c\u2018Dharma\u2019 is that which upholds,\nnourishes, or supports the stability of the society, maintains social order and\nsecures the wellbeing and progress of mankind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0906\u0928\u0943\u0936\u0902\u0938\u094d\u092f\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0930\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compassion itself is\nultimate Righteousness (Mahabharat 3.373.76)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ekam sat vipraha,\nbahudha vadanti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Truth is one, the\nwise call It by various names.\"- <b>Rig Veda 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br /><br />POOR AISHWARIA RAI-- SHE THOUGHT SHE WAS WROTH IT, BEING AKBARs WIFE JODHA AND HIS SON JEHANGIRs MOTHER..<br /><br />HINDU RAJPUT PRINCESS JODHA NEVER EXISTED. .<br /><br />AKBARs WIFE AND JEHANGIRs MOTHER WAS ARMENIAN JEWESS MARIAM ZAMANI BEGUM...<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_17.html</span><br /><br />Mariam baby\u2019s sister JEWESS Juliana was a doctor in the royal harem of Akbar. .<br /><br />ARMENIAN JEW ABDUL HAI WAS MADE THE CHIEF JUSTICE OF AKBARs EMPIRE..<br /><br />JEW Domingo Pires was a Portuguese interpreter of Akbar\u2019s court, and he was sent to Goa in September 1579 to present royal invitations to Jesuits JEWS to come to Akbar\u2019s court for religious discussions. .<br /><br />By an imperial decree, Armenian merchants ( CRYPTO JEWS ) were exempted from paying taxes on the merchandise imported and exported by them, and they were also allowed to move around in the areas of the Mughal empire where entry of foreigners was otherwise prohibited..<br /><br />Emperor Akbar (1556\u20131605), the Mughal emperor, invited Armenians to settle in Agra in the 16th century and by the middle of the 19th century, Agra had a sizeable Armenian population..<br /><br />Upon the founding of the Armenian nation in 1991, many Armenian-Indians chose to return to their ancestral homeland. Now there are hardly 100 Armenians in India, mostly in Kolkata, where the Armenian College still functions..<br /><br />Akbar\u2019s successors Jahangir (1605-1627 CE) and Shah Jahan (1628-1657 CE) continued to encourage more and more Armenians into their kingdoms....<br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HARDLY ANYBODY KNOWS THAT MOGHUL EMERORS AFTER HUMAYUN ( BABURs SON ) WERE ALL JEWS..&nbsp; &nbsp;HUMAYUNs WIFE WAS A JEWESS..</span></b><br /><br />Humayun\u2019s wife and Akbar\u2019s mother was Hamida Banu Begum..<br /><br />Here is an extract from Israeli tourism conversation booklet..<br /><br />The Empress Hamida Banu Begum, mother of the Emperor! Welcome, my dear. ( \u05d6\u05d0\u05ea \u05d0\u05de\u05d5 \u05e9\u05dc \u05de\u05dc\u05da \u05d4\u05d5\u05d3\u05d5 \u05d4\u05de\u05dc\u05db\u05d4 \u05d7\u05de\u05d9\u05d3\u05d4 \u05d1\u05d0\u05e0\u05d5 \u05d1\u05e8\u05d5\u05db\u05d4 \u05d4\u05d1\u05d0\u05d4 ) ...<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Brother of Armenian JEW Petrus Arratoon , JEW Gorgkin Khan was commander in Chief of the army of Mir Qasim\u2026</span></div>\n<br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Adam Smith used this PEARL HARBOUR or LOUSITANIA type cause to start the Battle of Plassey in 1757, for East India Company to take over India. The battle itself is a white lie. .</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\nThe battle never took place. Siraj Ud Daula was killed before even a single shot was fired by his brother-in-law and army Commander Mir Jaffar, who was bribed by Rothschild employee Robert Clive..</div>\n</span><div>\n<br /></div>\nMir Jaffar Ali Khan Bahadur ( died February 1765) was the first Najafi Nawab of Bengal with support from JEW Rothschild..<br /><br />ARMENIAN JEWS WERE ALL AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD, JEW SASSOON AND JEW APCAR ARRATOON IN THE OPIUM DRUG BUSINESS. THESE ARMENIAN JEWS PRETENDED TO BE CHRISTIANS ..<br /><br />The Armenians settled in Chinsurah, near Calcutta, West Bengal, and in 1697 built a Church there. This is the second oldest Church in Bengal .<br /><br />JEW Mirza Zul Quarnain, was an adopted son of Akbar and his Armenian JEWESS wife. He was well versed in Malayalam and Portuguese..<br /><br />Emperor Jahangir conferred on him the title of Amir. Mirza baby was a conduit for Jesuit JEWS in Goa. Mirza was also a poet, singer and playwright, and he composed verses in Urdu and Persian\u2026<br /><br />The oldest marker of Armenian presence in Kolkata is the tomb of an Armenian JEWESS Rezabeebeh Sookia..<br /><br />Calcutta's famous landmarks, including Stephen Court on Park Street and Grand Hotel (today Oberoi Grand) are Opium money funded\u2026<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/drug-runners-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br /><br />In 1847, shortly after the Opium War, P&amp;O , Jardine and Apcar &amp;co ships were underwritten by Rothschild\u2019s Insurance company AIG ( I will come to this later )..<br /><br />The trading company of Apcar &amp; Co. was founded in 1819 by Armenian JEW Arratoon Apcar.. He handled the Opium ( exports to China ) of JEW Rothschild and JEW Sassoon\u2026<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_81BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_81b+seedpW7D\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_80T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_80TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_80TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_80TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_80TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_80B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9066034869315789321\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_80M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. He believed in the four social castes. So this means the white Christian invader did NOT inject the poison of caste system ,right?<br />\n<br />\nDekh bhaiyya -- eminent ancient poets like Kalidasa wrote about the caste system 1600 years ago..<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader did a fake back dated Aihole Inscription dated 634 AD, which mentions Kalidasa as a contemporary and a court-poet of King Vikramaditya ( who existed in 7000 BC ) .<br />\n<br />\nWell in this internet age , the poison injected inscription is now flushed into the sewage tank of Indian history.<br />\n<br />\nFAKE SHAKUNTALAs SON BHARAT NEVER EXISTED<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kalidasa-did-not-exist-jainism-is.html<br />\n<br />\nKalidasa\u2019s so called work , bear a strange resemblance to the Brahmin Sanskrit scholar Ashwaghosha literary works\u2014in which there was NIL eroticism.<br />\n<br />\nThe British went overboard in hailing Kalidasa as the Indian Shakespeare.<br />\n<br />\nWhy not -- the English verses of Kalidasa read exactly the way a British poet would write in times of Goethe.<br />\n<br />\nThis is NOT the style of Sanskrit poets of 600 AD.<br />\n<br />\nMr Horace Hayman Wilson was the first to translate Kalidasa into English in the year 1813. An excerpt from his so called reverse translation:<br />\n<br />\n\u201cPleased on each terrace dancing with delight<br />\nThe friendly peacock hails thy grateful flight:<br />\nDelay then, certain in Ujjain to find<br />\nAll that restores the frame or cheers the mind,<br />\nHence with new zeal to Siva homage pay,<br />\nThe God whom earth, and hell, and heaven obey:<br />\nFor at his shoulders like a dusky robe,<br />\nMantling impend thy vast and shadowy globe:<br />\nWhere ample forests, stretched its skirts below,<br />\nProjecting trees like dangling limbs bestow:<br />\nAnd vermeil roses fiercely blooming shed<br />\nTheir rich reflected glow, their blood-resembling red.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIs above verse an ancient Indian Sanskrit scholar style by any stretch of imagination?<br />\n<br />\nDr S. Radhakrishnan th ex-President of India and an eminent scholar wrote QUOTE `Whichever date we adopt for him ( Kalidasa ) we are in the realm of reasonable conjecture and nothing more. Kalidasa speaks very little of himself, and we cannot therefore be sure of his authorship of many works attributed to him. We do not know any details of his life. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/henry-ford-victim-of-jewish-retribution_6.html?showComment=1525602655041#c602849336857280194\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 6, 2018 at 4:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_15MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nINDEED !<br />\n<br />\n##########<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJanuary 4, 2018 at 11:38 AM<br />\n<br />\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nostradamus-predicted-in-21st-century-worlds-best-actor-will-be-from-india-jignesh-mevani-mocks-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/62361212.cms<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO BREAK THE BIGGEST BOMBSHELL OF 2018..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LEGEND OF CHRISTIAN NOSTRADAMUS WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ( FRENCH BRANCH )..<br />\n<br />\nNOSTRADAMUS WAS A JEW\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ HIS BOOK OF PREDICTIONS AT THE AGE OF 11.. THE BOOKS IS STILL IN MY HOME LIBRARY..<br />\n<br />\nHIS QUATRAINS ARE VAGUE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE HITLERs NAME WAS CONVERTED TO HISTER TO ACCOMODATE THE PREDICTIONS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL -- HIS ORIGINAL NAME WAS NOT HILTER ( BUT HEIDLER AS PER SCHOOL RECORDS )-- IT WAS GRANTED TO HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A PERFECT CASE OF CREATING TRUTHS VIA THE BACK DOOR..<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW1 AND WW2 --ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe book of predictions is Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting future events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">JEW NOSTRADAMUS WAS MADE POPULAR BY HIS ALMANAC WHICH WAS LIFTED FROM KERALA ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil declares today at 1105 AM, on 4th Jan 2018-- SATYA VACHAN that Nostradamus's predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH QUATRAINS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN VEDAS HAS SUCH COOKED UP VERSES INJECTED --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS WORKED VIA BACKDOOR BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs FREEMASONS --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_15MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Some books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Erika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Cheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Occasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. Mark 1:10; Luke 3:22; John 1:32). Luke says, \u201cAnd the Holy Spirit came down in a bodily shape, like a dove on Him.\u201d Because the Holy Spirit is just that\u2014spirit\u2014He is not visible to us. On this occasion, however, the Spirit took on a visible appearance and was doubtless seen by the people. The dove is an emblem of purity and harmlessness (Matthew 10:16), and the form of the dove at Jesus\u2019 baptism signified that the Spirit with which Jesus was endowed was one of holiness and innocence\u2026BLAH BLAH \u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">SAME WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD COOKED UP THE BIRD NONSENSE FOR AMARTNATH CAVE..IN THIS CASE PIGEON EGG ..
